40013051	“?Mukave, kami mikilea en tounah vasi keil enek, vuo …?” Ka meatin keil onen avit kesi mini avit, “Anatin, mekilea.”
40013052	Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Musil sakien enek, tiser ten mengkatien onen Mosis keil vasi koa amul akur revi hihiseien usil hiasuvien onen Ahi, keil asuval hetetamen tai koa tounah tetahos houlu mul en teim sen. Kei kilea vaha neim keke vakur tounah tetahos tai koa heite hau, vatal min tounah tetahos emun koa vi heite matu.”
40013053	Navong Iesu selus en tatavolien keil enek evus, kei lokovein out enek.
40013054	Kei va ris en out Nasaret, meteimal kati onen. Ekonek, Iesu va en eim tahihiseien ka rondan visein meatin keil eni. Ka navong along hihiseien keil onen, amutimanin ka aviteni min keil eris avit, “?Meatin ekek kur ileilien ka keihoen enek kave?
40013055	?Rovitei kei keke vi natin meatin koa muti eim enges? ?Ka rovitei titan Meri, ka tunali Tiemes, Iosev, Saemon ka Sudas?
40013056	?Ka rovitei ahinali vasi keil keke aro en out ekek ral min ir? !Anatin, kei vi tai en ir enges! ?Ka out kave varei kur tounah keil ekek?”
40013057	Sakini keil alei sesein Iesu. Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Meatin vasi keil avouhou en provet tai onen Ahi. Ka en meteimal kati onen ka vatiamal kati onen emun, onen keil alei seseini varei.”
40013058	Sakini en out enek, Iesu romumontei merikel keil vahi houlu veni demkatien one tovuol eni.
40014001	En avong enek, Asuv Herod Antipas koa losil kat provins ten out Kaleli raengon longlongien keil usil tounah koa Iesu mul mumoni.
40014002	Sakini, viteni min hetetamen keil onen vit, “Iesu enek vi Sion Baptis varei. Avaseini kei mat, ka moul eris ran matien. Ven koanik, kei mul mumon merikel keil.”
40014003	Asuv houlu Herod Antipas mundemko mukok veni kei varei san ren keke meatin keil tavaeen onen uva avuli kat Sion, apar kati, ka alingi en eim takeih. Kei mumoni mukok veni Sion sel kati keih vit, “Herod, sakien onom romaltei varei veni koretalihe ral min Herodias, ahin onen Pilip, koa vi tumali. Asa koa komumoni rali koteh mengkatien onen Ahi.”
40014005	Ka avaseini Herod vit vouas Sion vamat, kei romumontei veni metaun vurohien onen meatin keil veni amundemi keke Sion Baptis vi provet tai.
40014006	Ka en avong mal ten avong avasi asuv houlu Herod eni, amumon mari ale tai ka natnahin Herodias vol veni en meten meatin vasi keil. Sakini Herod si mok
40014007	ka mumon hatkatien takeih min atouli enek keke hesani mini asa varei hehisi.
40014008	Sakini, atouli enek va ven mama onen ka selus mini. Evus, mai ris ka viteni min asuv houlu Herod vit, “Keitinek, ek vati keke ku vini Sion Baptis. Evus, kisan vatin minau en out enek en tre tai.”
40014009	Navong Herod longe, kei longe tisa vis tisa mok. Avaseini en rovattei vou vini Sion, kei san ren keke meatin keil onen avoum vousil envatien onen atouli enek. En rovattei vamemou en meten meatin keil veni alonge mumon hatkatien takeih tuai.
40014010	Sakini meatin keil onen uva en eim takeih, ka ara koteh vatin Sion ran teiai onen.
40014011	Navong amumoni evus, aling vatin Sion mul en tre tai, ka akuri asani min atouli enek koa kuri suk va ven mama onen.
40014012	Navong meatin keil onen Sion alonge keke mat, umai avus teiai onen va, ka arahini. Evus, uva avit meseini min Iesu.
40014013	Navong Iesu raengon longlongien keke Sion mat, kei vut en vot ral min onen keil keke avalis uva en out seh tai koa meatin keil tovuol ien. Ka navong meatin keil araengoni, keil aka en taon keil one ka akaka amusili.
40014014	Sakini navong Iesu mea ran vot, kei les marmari vangi meatin keil amul arosini tuai. Navong les keil, en mahis keil ka sak revi koakeil one amesai.
40014015	Ka navong meteiai mul munu, meatin keil onen Iesu umai veni ka aviteni avit, “Out ekek vi out seh neli ka out mul vong ke. Tahos keke kisila marmari vangi meatin keil ihaha keke akilea avaha en meteimal keil ka avahul tei anien ae.”
40014016	Ka Iesu viteni min onen keil vit, “Ronasila lattei keil anahaha. Kami varei mihesan tei anien min keil iani.”
40014017	Ka avit kesi mini avit, “!Ei! ?Mehoumoni hemukave veni anien ar rovinvintei? Ekek, veret elim enges, ka mesau mun elu enges.”
40014018	Ka Iesu viteni vit, “Alkuri vamai minau.”
40014019	Evus, kei viteni min marmari vangi meatin keil keke avatondan en more out koa oumunai mul ien. Navong arondan evus, kei kur veret koa heite elim ka mesau elu, seipat vina nesa, ka san masmasien min Ahi veni. Evus, kei vul vahas veret keil ka sani min meatin keil onen keke avatiti veret enek vatal min mesau vaha min marmari vangi meatin keil.
40014020	Ka meatin keil vasi akanian ka vange vil revi. Ka navong meatin keil onen Iesu uva ris keke avakur soke anien, veiat teindan elu (12) vil mules.
40014021	Ka en avong enek, amo keil koa akanian rokol taosen elim (5000). Ka ahin ka titiali keil arvulitei keil.
40014022	Navong akanian evus, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen keke ilamu eni, iha en usi Mari Oai ten out Kaleli. Ka kei enges ro vasila marmari vangi meatin keil avahaha.
40014023	Navong sila meatin keil evus, kei mual vina nesa en vatihou tai kei sasen enges keke vahis. Ka navong vongien emai, Iesu enges ro en out enek.
40014024	Ka kei les vot mul luhu en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli ka onen keil avotini keih avahalis veni avisu min eang takeih tai.
40014025	En menauilan, out romulantei mau, Iesu mai ven keil, mul mual en oai suval mual en atan.
40014026	Ka navong meatin keil onen alesi mul mual en oai, keil ametau varei ka amis kai avit, “!Ei, ninin tai keinek!”
40014027	Ka hatte tas, Iesu selus min keil vit, “!Mihekeih! !Inau netin keinek! !Minametautei!”
40014028	Ka Pita vit kesi mini vit, “!Asuv, munak keik anatin, kihiteni minau moual en oai mahat venuk!”
40014029	Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “!Amai!” Sakini Pita mea ran vot ka mual en oai va ven Iesu.
40014030	Ka navong les tahe keil amariso ka longe keke eang muhuh keih, Pita metau ka mul visair vita en oai. Navong lesi mukok, kei mis kai vit, “!Asuv, kikataunau li!”
40014031	Hatte tas, Iesu san hen vuli kati ka vit, “!Demkatien onom havivi ramat! ?Vensa kormundesintei nau?”
40014032	Ka navong keilu luvut luva en vot, eang va netan.
40014033	Navong alesi mukok, meatin keil koa amul en vot uva netan min Iesu ka aviteni mini avit, “!O anatin eli, keik varei kovi Natin Ahi!”
40014034	Evus, keil amules amu koteh Mari Oai ten out Kaleli va vio … arokol ut en out Kenesaret.
40014035	Ka navong meatin keil ten out enek alei kilea en Iesu, asan selusien muloh rahit out vasi keil vesesal. Sakini, meatin keil alah koakeil vasi amesai umai ven Iesu.
40014036	Ka apeahi vamaen koakeil amesai avatokol kele eisin omon enges. Ka keil vasi koa arokoli, mesaien one va ran keil.
40015001	En avong tai, Farasi keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis aka Serusalem umai ka avis Iesu avit,
40015002	“?Vensa meatin keil onom armusil kattei sakien keil koa elda keil orer telamu asani min ir? !Veni onom keil arkastei he en sise koa muto, ka mukos, akanian!”
40015003	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “?Ka vensa varei kami mirali koteh mengkatien onen Ahi varei keke mikilea mimusil hihiseien onami enges?
40015004	Veni Ahi viteni vit, ‘Mihehouhou min tata ka mama onami keil.’ (Eks 20:12) Ka vit risi vit, ‘Meatin koa hesili tata vuo mama onen, kei uasi hemat.’ (Eks 21:17)
40015005	Ka kami, mivisein meatin keil keke akilea aviteni min tata ka mama one avahit, ‘Tounah keil onak koa nakilea makataun kamil eni, koanek naling koe tuai vi onen Ahi enges.’
40015006	Sakini, mivihisein meatin keil enek keke anahouhoutei mun min tata one vatal min tounah keil one. Sakini, hihiseien keil onami mul mumon selusien keil onen Ahi mai vi heisav enges.
40015007	!Kami mimutolas en hilivemi enges! Asa koa Ahi viteni usil kami ka en provet Aesea mal koa vit,
40015008	‘Meatin keil ekek avouhou minau ral min selusien keil one, ka tine mul soutin ranau.
40015009	Avaseini keil uva netan minau, ek rovattei mailea. Veni amul avisein meatin keil en hihiseien keil koa ka en meatin keil enges, ka aviteni min keil keke avi hihiseien keil kati onak!’” (Aes 29:13)
40015010	Evus, Iesu viles ka vise vangi meatin keil umai veni ka viteni min keil vit, “!Mihetaengon revi keke mivailea!
40015011	Rovitei tounah koa va neim en ongon meatin vasakini kei varmutotei en meten Ahi. !Vuo, sakras! Ka selusien koa mea ran ongon, kei enges kilea vasakin meatin varmutotei en meten Ahi.”
40015012	Navong alokovein meatin keil, meatin keil onen umai ven Iesu ka aviteni mini avit, “?Keik kokilea keke Farasi keil avuroh katuk navong along selusien onom?”
40015013	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Farasi keil enek asuval vatiai keil koa Tata onak en out nesa roluhtei, iahut lati hetal lite keil teni.
40015014	Mihelokovein keil iles. Keil asak visi avalamun meatin sav keil ka avi metovar enges. Ka munak metovar tai helamun metovar tamun, keilu vasi luhemotmot luhehita en vulvul tai.”
40015015	Ka Pita viteni mini vit, “Kihit kilea aneite ten tatavolien koanek min komai li.”
40015016	Evus, Iesu vis keil vit, “?!Kami emun, mirkileatei veah!?
40015017	?Mirkileatei keke tounah vasi koa va en ongomi vitas en vangomi, ka evus, mul mea ran avemi keke hehas hehi tahul?
40015018	Ka tounah koa miselus eni ral min ongomi kistal en tinomi, ka keil varei amul amumon meatin romutotei en meten Ahi.
40015019	Veni navong tin meatin tisa, kei kilea voumon vati sakien keil ekek: mundem usil tounah tatisa keil, mu vini meatin sav keil, mul venan ahin sav, mul mum tisa ral min ahin sav keil, mul venan tounah, mul luvos meatin sav keil en kot, ka mul purun isen meatin keil.
40015020	Sakien keil enek mul sakin meatin romutotei en meten Ahi. Ka munak meatin rokastei hen en sise koa muto mulamu en avong taanianien, koanek rosakintei meatin enek vamai varmutotei.”
40015021	Evus, Iesu lokovein out enek ka va vesesal en meteimal keilu ten out Taer ka Saedon.
40015022	Ka ahin Kenan tai koa ro en out enek, mai veni ka peahi vit, “!O asuv eli, Natin Deved! !Em hemahis nau li! Ninin tisa tai mul en natukahin ka mul vareis puruni.”
40015023	Ka Iesu roviten etai selusien mini. Sakini meatin keil onen Iesu umai veni ka aviteni mini avit, “Kisila lat ahin enek heha veni kei mules visohiso keih ven ir.”
40015024	Sakini viteni min ahin enek vit, “Ahi sila nau keke numai ven me-Isrel keil enges koa asuval sipsip keil koa avuol.”
40015025	Ka ahin Kenan enek mai ka retengeiril veni ka peah risi keih vit, “!O Asuv, kikataunau li!”
40015026	Ka kei vit kesi mini vit, “Romaltei keke avakur anien an titiali keil ka avasonis vaha min huli keil.”
40015027	Ka ahin vit kesi mini vit, “Asuv, koanek anatin eli. Ka huli keil emun koa amul rahiti akilea avaan soke anien koa asuv one kan rani.”
40015028	Evus, Iesu viteni mini vit, “!Ei mama! !Demkatien onom mariso! Asa koa kovis inau eni, kei hekistal hehi anatin.” Ka hatte tas, natnahin mai ris tahos.
40015029	Navong Iesu lokovein taon enek, kei ka onen keil uva amusil vali oai Kaleli. Ekonek, avina en usi hou tai ka arondan.
40015030	Ka marmari vangi meatin keil umai veni ka alah leimesai keil one: koakeil asakras avoual, metovar keil, koakeil ale kalkali, koakeil avi ameng, ka houlu emun koa amesai en mesaien savsav keil. Alah keil ka aling retai en keil vesesal en alen Iesu, ka kei sak revi keil vasi.
40015031	Ka navong meatin keil ales asa koa mumoni, amutimanin houlu veni koakeil avi ameng, aselus; koakeil ale kalkali, umai ris atahos; koakeil asakras avoual, amual; ka metovar keil, alele. Navong alesi, amasmas Ahi onen me-Isrel keil veni.
40015032	Evus, Iesu vise ruain meatin keil onen ka viteni min keil vit, “Ek mahis meatin keil ekek veni keil aro ral minau avong etel tuai ka anien ae tovuol. Ek rovattei masila lat keil avahaha ris teim ose navong amai kat keil, veni vahesa ave hememerau ka mete hemalikelik en sise.”
40015033	Ka meatin keil onen avisi avit, “!Ka romul en out volvol! ?Rehehotin anien en out kave keke rokilea rovahengan marmari vangi meatin keil ekek?”
40015034	Iesu vis keil vit, “?Veret ehis mikur kati?” Avit kesi avit, “Heite oulu (7) enges ka titi mesau vahis.”
40015035	Sakini Iesu viteni min marmari vangi meatin keil keke avatontan en atan.
40015036	Navong arondan evus, Iesu kur veret oulu (7) ka mesau vahis ka san masmasien min Ahi veni. Evus, kei vul vahasi ka sani min meatin keil onen keke avatiti vaha min meatin keil.
40015037	Ka keil vasi akanian ka vange vil revi. Ka navong meatin keil onen Iesu uva ris keke avakur soke anien keil, veiat oulu (7) vil mules.
40015038	Amo keil koa akanian en avong enek arokol taosen ehat (4000). Ka arvuli lattei ahin ka titiali keil.
40015039	Ka navong Iesu sila marmari vangi meatin keil avahaha, kei ka onen keil uvut en vot ka uva en out koa avise en Makatan.
40016001	En avong tai, Farasi ka Satusi keil umai ven Iesu keke avasak visi. Sakini avisi voumon mari tounah tai avalesi vatie lati keke kei ka ven Ahi anatin.
40016002	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Navong meteiai munu, kami mivit, ‘?Kolesi? Teilang vilhili. Mul rie lati keke an hetahos visuvong.’
40016003	Ka navong out mulan, kami mivit, ‘Kosa, ous hous veni teilang vilhili ka mahmah keil houlu.’ Milei kilea en sakien ten an keil, ka misakras mivalei kilea asa koa mul kur out en avong kosa.
40016004	Kami meatin keil ten avong kosa, emi vati mivales etai merikel keke mivakur anatin enau eni. Anatin, emi vati mivalesi veni mikalkali ka milokovein Ahi suval ahin tai koa lokovein meatin kati onen keke vamaen kei min meatin sav. Ka nirmumon etai merikel mihelesi, tanges varei mihelesi koa hehi merikel onen provet Siona.” Evus, Iesu lokovein keil, vut en vot ka va en out sav ral min onen keil.
40016005	Navong Iesu ka meatin keil onen arokol usi Mari Oai ten out Kaleli, meatin keil onen amundem kati keke e vobong avakur veret ae.
40016006	Ka navong amual uva, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Mihelei kat revi kami ven ‘is’ onen Farasi ka Satusi keil.”
40016007	Navong alonge, amul aviteni min keil eris avit, “Kei mul selus min ir usil is veni rorkur etai veret vahi ar.”
40016008	Ka Iesu long kilea asa amul aselus usili, sakini va vis keil vit, “!Demkatien onami havivi ramat! ?Vensa mimul miselus min kami usil veret koa tovuol?
40016009	?!Mirkileatei veah!? ?Emi vobongeni tuai keke navengan amo keil taosen elim (5000) en veret elim enges? ?Ka veiat ehis vilelau keke kami misieni?
40016010	?Vuo mukave en avong navengan amo keil taosen ehat (4000) en veret oulu (7) enges? ?Veiat ehis vilelau mules koa kami misieni?
40016011	?Sakini, vensa kami mirkileatei keke narselustei usil veret? Ka mihelei kat revi kami ven is onen Farasi ka Satusi keil.”
40016012	Sakini akilea suk keke rovitentei keke avalei kat revi keil ven is ten veret, ka ven hihiseien keil onen Farasi ka Satusi keil koa romaltei.
40016013	Iesu ka meatin keil onen amual uva, akistal vesesal en taon ten out Sesaria-Pilipae. Ka en out enek, kei vis onen keil vit, “?Meatin keil aviteni keke inau, Natin Meatin, navi isei?”
40016014	Ka avit kesi mini avit, “Meatin tei avit kovi Sion Baptis. Ka teisav avit kovi provet Ilaetsa. Ka tateisav emun avit kovi provet Seremaea telamu vuo provet sav emun.”
40016015	Ka kei vis keil vit, “?Ka mukave en kami? ?Mivit inau navi isei varei?”
40016016	Ka Saemon Pita mea vit, “Keik kovi Mesaea. Anatin, kovi Natin Ahi koa moul.”
40016017	Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “!Tokolkatien onen Ahi mul tuai enuk, Saemon natin Siona! Veni rovitei meatin keke vahothot enau minuk, ka Tata onak varei en out nesa mumoni.
40016018	Ka naviteni minuk keke kovi ‘Pita’ koa aneite teni vi ‘ahat.’ Ka en ahat koanek, numon Sios onak hel ien. Ka keihoen vasi ten matien sakras vamai vapuruni.
40016019	Nilingi en hem, ki keil ten hiasuvien onen Ahi. Sakini, asa koa koring koe en out netan, Ahi emun heting koe. Ka asa komaeni en out netan, Ahi emun hemaeni.”
40016020	Evus, Iesu vit koe min onen keil keih anahitentei min etai meatin keke kei vi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati keke hesani hemai.
40016021	En avong enek eva, Iesu vit kilea min meatin keil onen keke kei heha en out Serusalem. Ka navong itokol Serusalem, kei hekur mahien hehi houlu en hen elda keil, asuv keil onen pris keil, ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis. Kei vit meseini min keil keke uasi hemat, ka en avong hetel, kei hemoul eris ran matien.
40016022	Navong Iesu viteni mukok, Pita kur seheni havivi ka selus keih mini vit, “!Asuv, konaselustei namukonek! !Tounah enek sakras vakistal enuk!”
40016023	Ka Iesu viles, les Pita ka viteni mini vit, “!Komusil rendemien onen Temat, kiha ranau! Komul kosak visi keke kovoumonau masavoi en sise onak veni komusil rendemien onen meatin keil ten out netan enges, ka kormusiltei rendemien onen Ahi.”
40016024	Evus, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Munak meatin etai en vati vousil nau, kei hesesein moulien onen, hehous aiveave onen, ka housil kat nau.
40016025	Veni meatin koa en vati vahuli kat moulien onen, moulien enek hevuol rani. Ka munak hemaen moulien onen hevuol venau, kei hehotin moulien koa vi anatin.
40016026	?Asa tahos munak meatin tai kur tounah vasi ten out netan ka moulien onen mul vuol rani? !Tounah tovuol! Kei sakras vasan etai tounah keke vakur ris moulien onen.
40016027	“Inau, Natin Meatin, nimai ris hetal min muohien koa Tata onak hesani minau ka hetal min angelo keil onen. Ka en avong koanek, nisan retai en ui umen min meatin vasi keil housil asa koa keil amumoni.
40016028	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tei en kami koa mimul mimulomal ekok kosa, mihermattei mau ka mihelesi navong inau, Natin Meatin, nimai hetal min keihoen ten hiasuvien onak.”
40017001	Avong ahetai (6) muli va, Iesu kur Pita, Tiemes ka tunali koa Sion telmusili ka mulamu en keitel telvina nesa en mari vatihou tai, en out koa keitel telro saseatel enges.
40017002	Ekonek, tellele telles aven Iesu viles. Veinan vihil suval meteiai, ka eisin omon vilahil muoh vis muoh suval laet.
40017003	Evus, telmali telles Mosis ka Ilaetsa lumul luselus ral min Iesu.
40017004	Navong Pita les keilu, viteni min Iesu vit, “!Asuv, tahos imok keke komaitel metro ekok! Munak keik em hehati, numon votevav hetel: tai onom, tai onen Mosis, ka tai onen Ilaetsa.”
40017005	Ka navong Pita mul veah selus, mahmah tai koa vihil mai mutaluh koe keil, ka along rea tai ka eni koa vit, “Koanik vi Natkuli kati ka envatien onak mul ien. Nasi nau houlu veni. !Mithelong kati!”
40017006	Navong Pita keitel tellong rea enek, telmetau houlu ramat, telmotmot, ka naeatel vita rokol atan.
40017007	Navong telmul veah netan, Iesu mai, rokol keitel, ka viteni vit, “Telmea. Mitnametautei.”
40017008	Ka navong tellele vina nesa, telroles etai mun meatin, Iesu enges ro ral min keitel.
40017009	Navong telmita ris netan ran vatihou enek, Iesu meng kat keitel vit, “Mitnahitentei tounah koa mitlesi min etai meatin hetokol avong koa inau, Natin Meatin, nimoul eris ran matien.”
40017010	Ka telmali telvisi telvit, “?Vensa tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis aviteni keke Ilaetsa hemae helamu en Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati?”
40017011	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Anatin keke Ilaetsa hemae ka hesak mesein meatin keil ven amaien onen Mesaea.
40017012	Ka naviteni min kami keke Ilaetsa mai tuai ka meatin keil arlei kileatei. Keil amum tisa mini suval koa e vati. Ka en vati sakien enek, inau, Natin Meatin, emun nikur mahien en hen meatin keil.”
40017013	Navong Iesu viteni mukok, keitel tellong kilea suk keke mul selus min keitel usil Sion Baptis.
40017014	Navong Iesu keitel telsuvul ran vatihou enek, telvisu en vangi meatin keil. Ka meatin tai mai ven Iesu, retengeiril mini
40017015	ka vit, “Asuv eli, em hemahis natkuli veni kei kur mesaien leimatmat ka mahien onen tisa mok. Avong houlu kei mot va en ahang vuo en oai.
40017016	Ka nakuri mai ven meatin keil onom ka asakras avasak revi.”
40017017	Navong longe mukok Iesu viteni vit, “!Ekovei! !Kami meatin keil ten avong kosa, mikalkali ka demkatien onami tovuol vareis! ?Nito hetal kami hetokol nengeis? Avek mah en kami koa demkatien onami tovuol. Alkur ehon vamai venau ekok.”
40017018	Ka navong Iesu les ehon enek, vile lat ninin tisa koa mul ien ka va rani. Hatte tas, ehon enek mai ris tahos.
40017019	Katau, navong Iesu ro sasen meatin keil onen umai veni ka avisi avit, “?Vensa varei komai mesakras mevahile lat ninin tisa enek vaha?”
40017020	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Veni demkatien onami havivi ramat. Anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak mikur kat demkatien koa havivis suval titi uti mastard, mikilea mivahiteni min vatihou enek mivahit, ‘Kimea ran out ekok ka kiha ke va,’ ka kei heha. Munak demkatien onami mul, tounah tovuol vakeih mivoumoni.”
40017022	Amea ran out enek ka amual uva en provins ten out Kaleli. Ka navong amul amual, Iesu viteni min onen keil vit, “Hervitei tuetin, inau, Natin Meatin, isa lat nau niha en hen meatin keil ten out netan.
40017023	Keil uas nau nimat, ka en avong hetel teni, nimoul eris ran matien.” Navong meatin keil onen alonge mukok, amundemko houlu.
40017024	Avong tai, Iesu ka meatin keil onen amual ka akistal en taon ten out Kapaniam. Ekonek, meatin keil koa alah mani ten takis ten Eim Votut umai ven Pita ka avisi avit, “?Mukave? ?Tiser onom mul vul takis ten Eim Votut vuo rovultei?”
40017025	Ka Pita vit kesi min keil vit, “Anatin, kei mul vuli.” Ka navong Pita va neim en eim onen, roselustei veah ka Iesu visi vit, “?Mukave Saemon Pita? ?Komundem sa? ?Asuv houlu keil ten out netan alah takis ka duti ran isei? ?Alahi ran titae keil kati vuo alahi ran meatin sav keil?”
40017026	Ka Pita vit kesi mini vit, “Alahi ran meatin sav keil.” Iesu viteni mini vit, “Hemukonek, titae keil kati arvultei takis.
40017027	Ka avaseini keke Ahi koa vi Asuv Houlu en tounah vasi vi Tata oralu, lehul takis ten Eim Votut onen veni rotahostei lovoumon meatin keil enek avalele vatisa en ialu. Sakini kiha en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli ka kison huk onom. Mesau koa kisare helamu, kikoh vas ongon ka kihotin mani tai koa hevinvin en takis oralu. Kikuri ka kiha kisani min keil.”
40018001	En avong enek, meatin keil onen uva ven Iesu ka avisi avit, “?En hiasuvien onen Ahi, isei vi hetetamen imok?”
40018002	Iesu vise titiali tai ka mumoni mulomal en mete.
40018003	Evus, viteni min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak mihervilestei rendemien onami keke mihemai mihesuval titiali keil, kami misakras mivaha en out koa Ahi vi Asuv Houlu ien.
40018004	Sakini, koakeil amumon rendemien one va netan suval titiali koanik, keil ihi hetetamen imok en out koa Ahi vi Asuv Houlu ien.
40018005	Ka meatin koa hekur revi titiali tai koa mukok en isok, hesuval koa kei mul kur revi inau.
40018006	“Ka munak meatin etai hesakin meatin tai koa musil kat nau suval titiali ekek hemot en tisaen, Ahi hesan mahien koa hetisa mok mini. Hetahos imok keke ipar kat mari ahat tai en hiren meatin enek ka imarindu eni en huinev ten atas.
40018007	!Anatin keke tounah koa hesakin meatin hemot en tisaen il imai, ka hetisa vis hetisa mok en koakeil avi sise teni!
40018008	“!En vati rendemien enek, munak tai en kami, hen vuo alen sakin kei mot en tisaen, heta kotehei ka hesoni heha! Hetahos imok mini keke hati usiven hetisa ka hekur moulien ten lisenges helin munak hen vasi keilu ka alen vasi keilu hetahos ka isoni heha en ahang koa sakras vamat.
40018009	!Ka munak tai en kami, meten sakin kei mot en tisaen, hekis lati ka hesoni heha! Hetahos imok mini munak meten tai hevuol ka hekur moulien ten lisenges helin munak meten vasi keilu lumul ka isoni heha en ahang koa sakras vamat.”
40018010	Navong titiali enek mules mulomal en mete, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Mihelei kat revi kami keke minalei seseintei meatin keil koa amusil inau suval titiali koanik. Anatin eli naviteni min kami keke angelo keil one aro en meten Tata onak en out nesa, ka ihit lati mini munak meatin tai mul purun keil.
40018012	“?Kami mimundemi mukave? ?Munak meatin tai, sipsip osen keil avi handred tai (100) ka tai en keil vuol, houmon sa? ?Mimundemi keke helokovein sipsip sav keil osen koa avi hanumau ehat ka teindan ouhat emun (99) il en usi hou keke kilea vaha valekat sipsip koa vuol? !Anatin!
40018013	Ka anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak hehotini, kei hesi kei hemariso mok ven sipsip koanik mulin sipsip sav keil osen koa arvuoltei.
40018014	En vati sakien enek, Tata onami en out nesa en rovattei etai meatin koa musil inau suval titiali koanik vavuol.”
40018015	Iesu mules selus min meatin onen keil usil tisaen keil vit, “Munak tumali mum tisa va katuk, keik kos kiha veni ka kitie mini asa koa mumoni romaltei va katuk. Munak kei hetaengonuk ka milhetalimal en usite onamil, keik kisik veni milheto hetahos eris.
40018016	Ka munak kei hertaengontei selusien onom, kiha ris veni hetal min meatin hetas vuo helu mun keke keilu luhelesi ka luheselus en usite onom keke kosak visi kovatalimal en kamil.
40018017	Ka munak tumali en rovattei vataengon kamitel, mithehitehiteni en meten meatin keil ten sios. Ka munak en rovattei vataengon meatin keil ten sios emun, mihelingi heha hae ka mihoumoni mini hesuval kei vi meatin koa rokileatei Ahi vuo meatin tisa tai suval koakeil alah takis.
40018018	“Anatin eli naviteni min kami, asa koa miring koe en out netan, Ahi ring koe tuai en out nesa, ka asa mimaeni en out netan, Ahi maeni tuai en out nesa.
40018019	“Anatin eli naviteni mun min kami keke munak elu en kami en out netan ekek milhemai en rendemien hetas usil tounah tai ka milhehis veni, Tata onak en out nesa hesan ui hisien onamil.
40018020	Veni navong meatin elu vuo etel telmai out tas en isok, inau namul en out enek ral min keitel.”
40018021	Evus, Pita mai ven Iesu ka visi vit, “?Asuv, munak tuak onak mum tisa va kat inau, numon methos hetal mini avong hehis? ?Hetokol avong oulu (7)?”
40018022	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Vuo, rovitei avong oulu (7), ka kumoni avong hehi oulu (7), hevus, avong hehi oulu mun (7), hevus, avong hehi oulu mun (7) heha vio … kosakras kovahuli mun.
40018023	“Nihit kilea en sakien koanek en tatavolien tai. Hiasuvien onen Ahi suval asuv houlu tai koa en vati vasak revi en kaon onen eiloheh keil onen.
40018024	Navong mul sak revi kaon keil, amulamun meatin tai koa kaon onen mulin gol mani milian halualim (10,000,000).
40018025	Ka veni sise tovuol keke meatin enek vahul kes kaon onen, asuv houlu onen meng kati keke avasalem en kei, ahin onen ka titaealu vasi keil avahi slev keil, ka avasalem en tounah vasi one emun. En sise koanek, asuv houlu vit mani teni hehul kes kaon onen.
40018026	“Navong meatin enek longe mukok, retengeiril en meten asuv houlu ka peahi keih vit, ‘!Aue li! !Kisani minau li avong havivi mun ka nihul kes tounah vasi koa mul en kaon onak!’
40018027	Ka asuv houlu en mahisi, sahulin kaon onen ral mini, ka maeni maluv ka va.
40018028	“Ka navong meatin enek va hae, kei visu min eiloheh sav onen asuv houlu koa kaon onen mul ral mini koa vi gol mani vahis enges. Ka meatin enek, kei kin kat hiren varei ka viteni mini vit, ‘!Kihul kes mani vasi koa kokuri ranau!’
40018029	“Ka eiloheh enek retengeiril en meten ka peahi keih vit, ‘!Aue li! !Kisani minau li avong havivi mun ka nihul kes tounah vasi koa mul en kaon onak!’
40018030	“Ka meatin enek seseini. Kei va suk ka son eiloheh enek va en eim takeih rokol avong kilea vahul lat kaon onen.
40018031	Ka navong eiloheh sav keil ales asa koa kur out, keil alonge tisa houlu ka uva ven asuv houlu one ka avit vasin tounah mini.
40018032	“Evus, asuv houlu vise meatin enek emai ris veni ka viteni keih mini vit, ‘!Keik kovi meatin tai onak koa kotisa vis kotisa mok! Navong kopeah nau keke ek hemahisuk, inau nasahulin kaon onom ka namaenuk kova maeis.
40018033	?Sakini, vensa em romahistei eiloheh sav onak en vati sakien koa namumoni minuk?’
40018034	Asuv houlu tin kat meatin onen enek houlu, sakini sa lati vaha vakur mahien en hen meatin keil ten eim takeih hetokol avong hehul lat vasin kaon onen.
40018035	“Ka Tata onak en out nesa emun houmoni min kami vasi housil vati sakien enek munak mihermumontei methos hetal min tuomi keil en tinomi.”
40019001	Navong Iesu selus en tounah keil enek evus, kei ka onen keil alokovein provins ten out Kaleli ka uva en provins ten out Sudea en usi Oaisal Sodan.
40019002	Marmari vangi meatin keil amusili en out enek, ka kei sak revi keil.
40019003	En avong enek, Farasi keil koan umai veni keke avasak visi. Sakini avisi avit, “Hit visi min komai. ?Mengkatien orer maen meatin hetasil ran ahin onen ven rendemien vasi enges?”
40019004	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “?Mukave, kami mirvulitei Tus Votut onen Ahi? Veni mul viteni keke mulamu, navong Ahi mumon tounah en out netan, kei ‘mumon meatin, tai mumoni vi meahos ka tamun mumoni vi ahin.’ (Sen 1:27)
40019005	Ka viteni mun vit, ‘Ven koanek, meahos hemea ran tata ka mama onen, ka heapil hetal min ahin onen, ka keilu luhetas.’ (Sen 2:24)
40019006	Sakini keilu lurovitei mun elu, ka lumai lutas. Sakini asa koa Ahi kap vituaini, meatin enges noumontei natasil.”
40019007	Ka Farasi keil avisi avit, “?Mukonek, vensa varei Mosis meng kati vit, ‘Meatin koa vit valokovein ahin onen, hesan Setifiket ten Tasilien mini, evus, kilea vasila lati?’ (Dut 24:1)”
40019008	Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Mosis maen kami milokovein ahin keil onami veni vatumi keih ramat. Ka sakien enek tovuol en avong Ahi mum rohtoh en tounah vasi.
40019009	Ka naviteni min kami keke meatin koa lokovein ahin onen, koa romatiltei vatal min meatin sav tai, ka meatin enek kur ahin sav, en meten Ahi, meatin enek mul mum tisa ral mini.”
40019010	Navong selus min keil evus, meatin keil onen Iesu aviteni mini avit, “Munak hemukonek en meatin hetal min ahin onen, hetahos imok keke meatin tai heto sasen ka hertetalihetei.”
40019011	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Rovitei meatin vasi koa kilea vousil hihiseien enek, ka meatin keil koan, Ahi san keihoen min keil keke avousili.
40019012	Ven meatin keil koan asakras avatetalihe veni out lou one tisa navong avasi keil. Ka meatin keil koan mun asakras avatetalihe veni meatin sav purun out lou one. Ka meatin tateisav emun amumon rendemien one keke anatetalihetei keke voum ven hiasuvien onen Ahi. Meatin koa kilea vousil sakien enek, tahos keke housili.”
40019013	Evus, meatin keil akur titiali keil umai ven Iesu keke valing hen en keil ka vahis ven keil. Ka navong meatin keil onen ales keil avul kat keil.
40019014	Ka Iesu selus min keil vit, “Almaen titiali keil avamai venau ka minating koetei keil, veni Ahi vi asuv houlu onen vati meatin keil koa amukonek.”
40019015	Sakini, navong umai veni, Iesu ling hen en keil ka san tokolkatien min keil. Evus, Iesu ka onen keil alokovein out enek.
40019016	Navong Iesu mul mual va, meatin tai mai veni ka visi vit, “Tiser, numon sa koa hetahos keke nakilea makur moulien ten lisenges?”
40019017	Iesu vit kesi vit, “?Kovis nau usil asa koa tahos vensa? Ahi enges, kei sasen tahos. Ka munak em vati kovakur moulien ten lisenges, kilong kat mengkatien keil onen.”
40019018	Meatin enek visi vit, “?Ka mengkatien sa en keil?” Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “‘Minouastei meatin namat. Minakurtei ahin vuo meatin onen hanu sav. Minahenantei tounah onen meatin sav. Minoumontei luvosien naha kat isen meatin sav.
40019019	Mihehouhou min tata ka mama onami keil.’ (Eks 20:12-17) Ka, ‘Envatien onami hel en meatin sav keil hesuval koa kami emi vat kami eris.’” (Lev 19:18)
40019020	Ka meatin hau enek vit risi min Iesu vit, “Inau nalong kat mengkatien vasi keil enek. ?Asa tamun narvinvintei veah eni?”
40019021	Iesu viteni mini vit, “Munak keik em vati kovamal vasi, kiha kisalem en tounah vasi onom ka kisan mani teni min koakeil tounah one tovuol. Ka munak kumoni hemukonek, tounah onom hehi houlu en out nesa. Hevus, kimai ris ka kusil nau.”
40019022	Ka navong meatin hau enek raengon selusien onen, kei longe tisa ka va rani veni tounah keil onen houlu ka en rovattei valokoveini.
40019023	Evus, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, hekeih vareis min meatin koa tounah onen houlu keke vamaen Ahi vahi asuv houlu onen.
40019024	?Mimundemi keke mari kamel tai kilea vakirisil en meten nidil tai koa havivi vis havivi mok? !Vuo, sakras! Ka meatin koa tounah onen houlu hekeih imok helin koanek keke vamaen Ahi vahi asuv houlu onen.”
40019025	Navong meatin keil onen Iesu araengoni, keil amutimanin houlu ka avisi avit, “?Mukonek, isei suk kilea vakur moulien ten lisenges?”
40019026	Iesu lei rahit en keil ka vit, “!Keinek! Meatin sakras voumoni, ka Ahi enges kilea voumon tounah vasi.”
40019027	Evus, Pita viteni mini vit, “?Kolesi? Komai melokovein tounah vasi onomai keke mevousil katuk. ?Mukonek, Ahi hesan asa min komai?”
40019028	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, en avong koa tounah vasi ten out netan hehi heite hau, inau, Natin Meatin, nitondan en vuluk ten keihoen hetal min muohien. Ka en avong enek, kami mun koa mimusil inau mihetondan retai en vulin ten keihoen teindan elu (12) ka mihelosil kat meatin vasi keil koa amul en mari vatiamal teindan elu (12) ten out Isrel.
40019029	Ka meatin vasi koa alokovein teim se, vuo tue keil, vuo ahine keil, vuo tata, vuo mama, vuo titiali, vuo ah se keil venau, Ahi hesan ris uite teni hehi houlu vis hehi houlu mok hehi handred tai (100) helin asa koa alokoveini. Ka katau en tounah keil enek, keil ikur moulien ten lisenges emun.
40019030	Ka houlu koa avi hetetamen kosa, imai ihi heisav enges, ka houlu koa avi meatin heisav kosa, imai suk ihi hetetamen keil.”
40020001	Navong Iesu mul selus ral min meatin keil onen, ra usil tatavolien enek min meatin keil vit, “Hiasuvien onen Ahi suval horetan tai koa va en visokon semau keke valah meatin toumien keil avoum en neiai osen.
40020002	Navong les keil, kei vat kati keke hesan ui umen min keil hemal en hulien ten avong tai. Evus, sila lat keil uva avoum en neiai osen.
40020003	“Navong meteiai va nesa neli, horetan enek va ris ka les meatin sav keil amules amulomal en out avulhul ien, ka armumon etai tounah.
40020004	Ka kei viteni min keil vit, ‘Ei, kami mun miheha mihoum en neiai osak, ka nihul kami en asa koa mal.’
40020005	Sakini, keil emun uva amum. “En taviai, kei va ris ka mumoni vati tas, ka en avong tamun navong meteiai vita netan neli.
40020006	Ka vesesal avong koa meteiai vanu, kei va eris ka votin meatin sav keil emun amules amulomal. Sakini kei vis keil vit, ‘?Vensa varei mimules mimulomal ekok ka mirmumon etai tounah visokon rokol mendilah?’
40020007	“Keil avit kesi mini avit, ‘Veni meatin tovuol vamai vakur komai mevoum mini.’ “Sakini horetan enek viteni min keil vit, ‘Kami mun miheha mihoum en neiai osak.’
40020008	“Navong meteiai munu, horetan ten neiai viteni min avat onen meatin toumien keil vit, ‘Kihise meatin toumien keil ka kisan ui umen one min keil. Helamu, kihul lat retai en koakeil umai katau heha vio … kivus en koakeil umai mulamu.’
40020009	“Sakini, koakeil umai vesesal en avong koa meteiai vanu, keil umai ven avat toumien ka navong vul lat keil, sani min keil hulien koa mal vinvin ten avong tai, visokon rokol mendilah.
40020010	Sakini, navong koakeil umai amulamu alesi, keil amundemi avit ikuri hemarite mok. Ka navong umai, keil emun akur retai en hulien koa mal vinvin enges ten avong tas.
40020011	Ka navong akuri, keil asel kutut kat horetan enek
40020012	avit, ‘Koakeil kovise keil katau, vesesal en avong koa meteiai vanu, amum haoa tanges, ka kovul keil vati tas en komai koa memum keih, avetin mue en komai ka meteiai kan purun avemai.’
40020013	“Ka horetan enek vit kesi min tai en keil vit, ‘Tuak, narpuruntei kami. Kami mimaeni mivoum minau ven hulien koa mal vinvin ten avong tas.
40020014	Mihekur mani onami ka miheha. Inau ek vati mahul koakeil umai akatau vati tas en kami.
40020015	Koanek mani onak. Ka nakilea moumon asa ek vati vatal mini. ?Vuo mukave? ?Kami mevi elu veni nasan kataunien min meatin sav keil?’
40020016	“Sakini, en sakien koanek, koakeil avi meatin heisav kosa imai ihi hetetamen imok, ka koakeil avi hetetamen imai ihi heisav enges.”
40020017	Navong Iesu mul va en out Serusalem, kei kur teindan elu (12) onen uva seh ka viteni min keil vit,
40020018	“?Milesi? Rovaha Serusalem ke. Ka en out enek, imae lat nau, Natin Meatin, niha en hen asuv keil onen pris keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis. Hevus, keil ikuri iha en kot ka imae lat moulien onak hemat.
40020019	Evus, isa lat nau niha ven meatin keil koa arvitei Siu keke umon tohtohien heha kat nau, itah nau en viau takan, ka iti kat nau en aiveave. Avong hetel heli heha, ka nimoul eris ran matien.”
40020020	Evus, mama onen Tiemes keilu Sion, natin Sepeti keilu, mai ven Iesu ral min keilu. Kei malingling veni keke vahis tounah tai veni.
40020021	Iesu visi vit, “?Mama, keik em vat sa?” Ka mama enek viteni mini vit, “Ek vati keke kimaeni li natkuli keilu ekek luvatondan vesesal venuk navong kimai kihi asuv houlu, tai en usivem matu ka tamun en usivem meil.”
40020022	Iesu viles les natnali keilu ka vis keilu vit, “Kamil milreingeingen asa koa milmul milvis inau eni. ?Mukave? ?Kamil milkilea milvakur sakvisien ka mahien keil hesuval koa inau niha nikuri?” Ka luvit kesi mini luvit, “!Anatin, melkilea!”
40020023	Iesu viteni min keilu vit, “Anatin, kamil milhekur mahien hesuval asa koa inau nikuri. Ka avaseini, hervitei inau keke matie lat isei hetondan en usivek matu vuo usivek meil. Vulin ten hetetamenien keilu enek onen koakeilu Tata onak rie lat keilu tuai keke luvakuri.”
40020024	Ka navong meatin sav keil onen Iesu koa avi halualim (10) araengoni, avuroh kat time keilu.
40020025	Ka Iesu vise ruain keil vasi umai veni ka viteni vit, “Mikilea keke hetetamen keil onen koakeil arvitei Siu e vati mok keke avoumon one keil avalei kilea en hetetamenien one. Ka asuv keil emun one amumoni keih ramat en meatin keil koa alosil kati.
40020026	Ka sakien onami hermukteinek. Munak kami tai en vati vahi houlu en kami, kei houmon kei hemai hesuval meatin toumien onami.
40020027	Ka munak tai en kami en vati valamu en kami, kei houmon kei hemai hehi slev onami.
40020028	Veni inau mun koa navi Natin Meatin, narmaiteis keke meatin keil avoum avakataunau. !Vuo! Numai keke moum makataun meatin sav keil ka keke masan moulien onak vahul lat meatin keil houlu avamaluv ran keihoen ten tisaen one.”
40020029	Iesu ka onen keil aka pas taon ten out Seriko, ka navong amuli uva, mari vangi meatin keil amul amusili.
40020030	Ekonek, metovar elu lurondan en vali sise ka luraengoni keke Iesu mul mual va. Sakini, keilu luvisohiso luvit, “!Asuv! !Natin asuv houlu Deved! !Em hemahis komal eli!”
40020031	Ka vangi meatin keil avul kat keilu keke luvato raeng. Ka avaseini, keilu luvisohiso keih imok luvit, “!Asuv! !Natin asuv houlu Deved! !Em hemahis komal eli!”
40020032	Navong Iesu longe, vati ka vise keilu lumai. Evus, vis keilu vit, “?Emil vati moumon sa min kamil?”
40020033	Ka luvit, “Asuv eli, emal vati kovasak revi metomal.”
40020034	Ka Iesu, tin vilelau en enmahisien ven keilu. Sakini, rokol metealu, ka hatte tas, keilu lukilea luvalele ka lumusil Iesu.
40021001	Navong Iesu ka onen keil umai vesesal en out Serusalem, keil akistal en meteimal ten out Betfas, vesesal en Hou Nei Olip. En out enek, Iesu sila meatin elu onen
40021002	vit, “Milheha en meteimal koa keisom. Ka hatte tas, milhehotin dongki tai asar kati ral min titan. Milheluvat keilu ka milheti keilu luhemai venau.
40021003	Ka munak meatin etai hesak visi keke heting koe kamil, milhehiteni mini milhehit, ‘Asuv en vat keilu,’ ka hatte tas, kei hemaen keilu.”
40021004	Koanik kur out vasakin asa koa Ahi viteni ka en provet onen mai vi anatin koa vit,
40021005	“Kihiteni min meatin keil koa aro en taon ten out Serusalem kihit, ‘!Mihelesi! Asuv houlu onami mul mai keke valosil kat kami. Kei, sakien onen merau enges, ka mul muloh en dongki tai. Anatin, mul rondan en sili dongki tai enges ka mul mai.’” (Sak 9:9)
40021006	Ka meatin keilu onen Iesu luva ka lumumoni suval koa Iesu viteni.
40021007	Keilu luri dongki ka titan. Evus, lukuvin kot onealu en dongki keilu enek ka Iesu rondan eni.
40021008	Marmari vangi meatin keil umai ka asak mesein revi sise keke Iesu voual ien. Keil avuen kot keil ome en sise ka teisav en keil amusah oumeil ka aling revi en sise.
40021009	Houlu en mari vangi meatin keil enek koa uva amulamu en Iesu ral min koakeil akatau emun avisohiso vina nesa avit, “!Masmasien min Natin asuv houlu Deved! ‘!Tokolkatien hel en kei koa mai en isen Iahova!’ (Sam 118:26) !Masmasien hehina min Ahi en out nesa!”
40021010	Ka navong Iesu kistal en out Serusalem, longlongien enek ka vasi taon ka me-Serusalem vasi keil amutimanin ka arun usili houlu “?Isei enek koa mul mai?”
40021011	Ka marmari vangi meatin keil avit kesi avit, “Koanik vi Iesu, provet tai ten out Nasaret en provins ten out Kaleli.”
40021012	Navong arokol Serusalem, Iesu va neim en teahu ten Eim Votut ka likat rasilin meatin vasi keil koa asalem en tounah vuo amul avul tounah eni. Kei vou vilehiles avet onen koakeil amul akekes en mani ka out tatondanien onen koakeil asalem en ame keil avahi sanien votut.
40021013	Ka navong mumoni, sel kat keil vit, “En Tus Votut amutisi avit, ‘Eim onak ihise en Eim Tahisien.’ (Aes 56:7) Ka kami mimumoni suk mai vi ‘Eim mon tarhena keil.’” (Ser 7:11)
40021014	Ka navong Iesu mul en teahu ten Eim Votut, metovar keil ka koakeil asakras avoual umai veni ka kei sak revi keil.
40021015	En avong enek emun, titiali keil amul avisohiso en teahu ten Eim Votut avit, “Masmasien min Natin asuv houlu Deved.” Ka navong asuv keil onen pris keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis ales mormore tounah keil koa Iesu mumoni ka alonge asa koa titiali keil avisohiso eni, tine vepeng houlu.
40021016	Sakini keil avis Iesu avit, “?Koraengon asa titiali keil ekek amul aviteni?” Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Anatin, nalonge. ?Mukave, kami mirvulitei Tus Votut onen Ahi? Veni kei mul vit, ‘Ahi, keik kosak mesein sise keke kilong masmasien hehat minuk, heka en titiali ka tivava keil.’” (Sam 8:2)
40021017	Evus, Iesu lokovein keil ka mea ran out Serusalem. Kei ka onen keil uva en taon ten out Betani, ka en out enek, amatil.
40021018	En visokon semau, navong Iesu mul mual va ris en out Serusalem, amai kati en sise.
40021019	Ka les vati fik tai mul en vali sise. Ka navong va vesesal veni, votini keke heite tovuol, les outes. Sakini, Iesu viteni min vati fik vit, “!Heiai hetovuol emun enuk!” Ka hatte tas, vati fik enek mukou.
40021020	Navong meatin keil onen Iesu alesi, amutimanin ka avisi avit, “?Vati fik enek mukou hatte tas mukave?”
40021021	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak demkatien onami mul ka mihermundem maentei asa koa mivisi, kami mikilea mivoumon asa koa namumoni en vati fik. Ka roviteis koanik, mikilea emun mivahiteni min hou koanik mivahit, ‘Kimea ran vulum ka kiso sasom enuk kiha en atas,’ ka hekur out.
40021022	Munak mikur anatin keke tounah hekistal, tounah vasi koa mihehis Ahi veni, hekistal hehi anatin.”
40021023	Navong arokol Serusalem, Iesu va en teahu ten Eim Votut. Ka navong kei mul visein meatin keil, asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil umai veni ka avisi avit, “?Keik komul komumon tounah keil ekek en isen isei? ?Isei maenuk kovoumoni?”
40021024	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Inau mun, mahis kami en tounah tai. Munak mihehit kesi minau, inau mun nihiteni min kami isei maen nau moumon tounah keil enek.
40021025	Alhit visi minau. ?Isei maen Sion vahi baptaes en meatin keil? ?Ahi vuo meatin enges?” Keil aselus rahiti min keil eris avit, “?Rehehiten sa? Munak rehehit ‘Ahi maeni,’ kei hehiteni min ir hehit, ‘?Mukonek, vensa suk mirkurtei anatin en selusien onen?’
40021026	Ka munak rehehit, ‘Meatin maeni,’ rehemetau en mari vangi meatin keil veni keil vasi amundemi keke Sion Baptis vi provet tai onen Ahi.”
40021027	Sakini, avit kesi min Iesu avit, “Komai merkileatei isei maeni.” Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Mukonek, inau mun nirvitentei isei maen nau moumon tounah keil ekek.”
40021028	Ka Iesu ra usil tatavolien tai min keil vit, “?Kami mirendem sa? Meatin tai, natnali elu. Avong tai, meatin enek va ven moeite ka viteni mini vit, ‘Natkuli, kosa, kiha kum en neiai oseratel.’
40021029	“Ka natnali enek vit kesi mini vit, ‘Ek rovattei.’ Ka katau, rendemien onen viles ka va mum.
40021030	“Evus, tata va ven natnali tamun ka viten selusien vati tas. Ka natnali enek vit risi mini vit, ‘Tahos tata, niha.’ Ka evus, kei rovatei.
40021031	“?Isei en keilu mumon asa tata en vati?” Keil avit, “Kei koa mulamu.” Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, koakeil alah mani ten takis ka hoeaso keil, Ahi mul mai vi Asuv Houlu en moulien one mulamu en kami.
40021032	Veni Sion mai ven kami keke vatie sise ten maluen mivousili. Ka kami mirkurtei anatin en selusien onen, ka koakeil akur mani ten takis ka hoeaso keil alonge ka akur anatin en selusien onen. Ka avaseini miles asa koa amumoni, mirvilestei ran tisaen onami ka mirkurtei anatin eni.”
40021033	Evus, Iesu ra usil tatavolien tamun min keil vit, “En avong tai, horetan tai luh neiai osen. Kei mumon vieh karahiti, ka kil avul tai koa vi out koa avita lin heiai ien keke vasakin site vakistal rani. Evus, muti avet tai vina nesa taleikokoeien. Navong mumoni evus, kei maen meatin sav keil umai alei kati ka keil avat kati keke isan hati heiai keil mini navong men. Evus, kei va en ualien tai.
40021034	“Avong houlu mai muli, heiai men. Sakini, horetan enek sila slev keil onen uva keke avahis koakeil alei kat neiai osen avasan hati heiai mini.
40021035	Ka navong arokol neiai, meatin keil koa alei kati avuli kat slev keil onen: tai amu puruni, tamun amu vini, ka koa etel en keil, akove.
40021036	Evus, horetan enek sila slev sav keil koa avi houlu mok mulin koa sila mulamu. Ka meatin keil koa alei kat neiai enek amumoni vati tas min keil.
40021037	Katau en keil vasi, horetan sila natnali va ven keil veni kei viteni min kei sasen vit, ‘Keil ihouhou min natkuli.’
40021038	“Ka navong koakeil alei kat neiai ales natnali, aviteni min keil eris avit, ‘!Ei, natin horetan kati keisom! Kei varei hekur neiai koanek navong tata onen hemat. !Almai, rovou vini! !Hesakini, tounah keil onen hemai hehi orer esuk!’
40021039	Sakini keil uva avuli kati, alisi va hae ran neiai enek, ka amu vini.”
40021040	Evus, Iesu vis hetetamen onen Siu keil koa araengon tatavolien enek vit, “?Ka mukave? ?Navong horetan ten neiai enek hemai ris, houmon sa min meatin keil enek?”
40021041	Ka keil avit kesi avit, “Kei hesa kes matien koa tisaso min meatin tatisaso keil enek. Evus, hemaen neiai onen heha min meatin sav keil koa isani mini hati heiai koa men en avong mal teni.”
40021042	Evus, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “?Mukave, kami mirvulitei Tus Votut? Veni kei viteni vit, ‘Pos koa meatin keil toumien alei seseini, kei varei mai vi more vatiseng kati ten eim mulin pos sav keil. Koanik, Iahova mumoni, ka rolesi tahos imok!’ (Sam 118:22-23)
40021043	“Sakini, naviteni min kami, tahosien ten hiasuvien onen Ahi koa mimul mikuri, Ahi helah lati ran kami Siu keil, ka hesani suk min meatin keil ten kantri sav koa akilea along kat ren ka ason heite en moulien one.
40021044	Koakeil asesein vatiseng enek, imot eni ka sie hemavulvul varei. Ka munak vatiseng enek hemot heta kat keil, ave hemakoako.”
40021045	Navong asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil along tatavolien keil onen Iesu, akilea keke mul selus usil keil.
40021046	Sakini keil alekat sise avahuli kati, ka ametaun marmari vangi meatin keil veni keil amundemi keke Iesu vi provet tai.
40022001	Navong Iesu ro veah en teahu ten Eim Votut, mules ra usil tatavolien keil min meatin keil vit,
40022002	“Hiasuvien onen Ahi suval asuv houlu tai koa sak mesein mari anien tai ven tetaliheien onen natnali.
40022003	Kei sila slev keil onen keke avahise koakeil asuv houlu enek sisil en keil tuai keke avamai en anien. Ka meatin keil enek e rovattei avamai.
40022004	“Sakini, asuv houlu enek sila slev sav keil onen ka viteni min keil vit, ‘Miheha mihehit meseini min koakeil nasisil en keil mihehit: “Milesi, inau nasak mesein anien houlu tuai: amuas buluk keil osak ka titan buluk keil emun koa navengan revi keil ven anien ten kosa. Anatin, tounah vasi ten anien ten tetaliheien mas tuai. Sakini almai.”’
40022005	“Ka meatin keil enek e rovattei availea ren ka uva suk en umen one. Tai va en ah sen, ka tamun va voum en sitoa onen.
40022006	Ka meatin sav keil avuli kat slev keil onen, apurun keil ka amu vini keil.
40022007	Ka navong asuv houlu enek longe, tin katiat vis katiat. Sakini sila meatin tavaeen keil onen ka amu rasilin koakeil amu vini slev keil onen ka amunit lin taon one.
40022008	“Evus, asuv houlu enek viteni min slev sav keil onen vit, ‘Anien ten tetaliheien mas tuai, ka koakeil nasisil en keil tuai, moulien one rovinvintei keke avamai avaani.
40022009	Sakini, miheha en sise keil ten taon ka mihesisil en meatin keil vasi koa mihehotini keke imai ian anien ten tetaliheien koanik.’
40022010	Sakini uva en sise keil ka avise ruain meatin vasi keil koa avotini, koakeil atahos ka koakeil atisa. Ka eim taanien ten tetaliheien vilelau revi en meatin keil.
40022011	“Koakeil asisil va ven keil, umai amusin en more eisin keil ten tetaliheien. Ka navong asuv houlu mai neim vales koakeil umai, lesi keke meatin tai romusin entei eisin ten tetaliheien.
40022012	Sakini asuv houlu mai veni ka visi vit, ‘!Ei tuak! ?Keik kumai neim ekok mukave keke kormusin entei eisin ten tetaliheien?’ Ka meatin enek ro raeng, reingeingen asa vahiteni.
40022013	“Evus, asuv houlu viles ka meng kat meatin toumien keil onen vit, ‘Mihepar kat hen ka alen, ka mihelisi heha hae en mankoli. En out enek, meatin keil il is ka il ihal lohe ven mahien one.’”
40022014	Ka Iesu selus ekor en tatavolien enek vit, “Anatin, Ahi sisil en meatin houlu avamai veni, ka vahis enges, rie lat keil avato vesesal veni.”
40022015	Navong Farasi keil along tatavolien keil koa Iesu viteni va kat keil, uva ka arun lekat sise keke avakaluvati en selusien onen.
40022016	Sakini asila tei en meatin one ral min Siu tateisav keil koa asi keil ven losilkatien onen asuv houlu Herod Antipas. Keil umai ven Iesu ka aviteni mini avit, “Tiser, mekilea keke keik kovi vati meatin koa meatin sav keil akilea avaling desien one val enuk. Ka mekilea emun keke komul kovisein meatin keil en sise koa Ahi en vat meatin keil avousili musil anatinien onen. Keik kormundemtei vahi houlu usil hetetamenien onen meatin keil, ka kormaentei rendemien onen meatin keil enges analehtei rendemien onom.
40022017	Mukonek, kisani min komai rendemien onom en usite koanik. ?Hemal enges keke ir, Siu keil, rehehul takis heha min asuv houlu ten out Rom, vuo romaltei?”
40022018	Ka Iesu lei kilea rendemien tatisa one ka vit kesi min keil vit, “!Kami mitahos imok en hilivemi enges! ?Vensa misak visi keke mivakaluvat inau?
40022019	Altie minau mani koa amul avul takis eni.” Navong asani mini
40022020	vis keil vit, “?Nan isei ke? ?Isen sei mul en mani enek?”
40022021	Keil avit kesi avit, “Koanek onen Sisa, mari asuv houlu ten out Rom.” Sakini Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Sakini, mal keke mihesani min Sisa asa koa vi onen, ka mihesani suk min Ahi asa koa vi onen.”
40022022	Ka navong keil alonge, keil amutimanin en selusien onen Iesu. Evus, alokoveini uva.
40022023	En avong enesek, Satusi keil, koa avit meatin sakras vamoul eris ran matien, umai ven Iesu ka avisi avit,
40022024	“Tiser, Mosis mutis mengkatien koanik vit, ‘Munak meatin tai mat ran ahin onen ka titaealu tovuol, tunali suk hetetalihe hetal vatina onen. Hesakini, navong luhekur ehon, ilesi hesuval natin meatin koa mat.’ (Dut 25:5)
40022025	Mulamu, time oulu (7) aro ekok ral min komai. Koa moeite retalihe, ka navong mat, titan tovuol. Sakini kei lokovein vatina vatetalihe vatal min tunali.
40022026	Tounah kistal vatte tas en tunali koa katau. Ka en koa etel en keil emun, vatte tas va vio … sakien enek kistal en koa tasikor en time keil enek.
40022027	Ka katau en keil vasi, ahin enek emun mat esuk.
40022028	?Sakini, navong meatin vasi keil imoul eris ran matien, isei en time oulu (7) enek hekur ahin enek hehi onen veni keil vasi aretalihe ral mini?”
40022029	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Kami mimul milei ras sise onami veni mirkilea revitei Tus Votut onen Ahi vuo keihoen onen.
40022030	Ven en avong koa meatin keil imoul eris ran matien, isuval angelo keil en out nesa, tetaliheien hetovuol.
40022031	?Ka vensa mirkurtei anatin eni keke meatin keil imoul eris ran matien? ?Mirvulitei asa koa Ahi viteni min kami? Veni kei vit,
40022032	‘Inau navi Ahi onen Ebraham, Ahi onen Aesak, ka Ahi onen Siekob.’ (Eks 3:6) ?Milonge? Kei vi Ahi onen koakeil amoul, rovitei onen koakeil umat.”
40022033	Ka navong marmari vangi meatin keil alonge, keil amutimanin en hihiseien onen.
40022034	Navong Farasi keil alonge keke Iesu sakin Satusi keil, ahang one mat, keil alah ruai ka uva ven Iesu.
40022035	Tai en keil koa vi tiser ten mengkatien onen Mosis, mai ka vit vakaluvat Iesu en selusien onen.
40022036	Sakini visi vit, “?Tiser, mengkatien koa kave varei keke houlu mok en keil vasi?”
40022037	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “‘Emi hehat Iahova koa vi Ahi onami en tinomi, en moulien vasi keil onami, ka en rendemien vasi keil onami.’ (Dut 6:5)
40022038	Mengkatien koanik vi houlu mok ka mulin keil vasi.
40022039	Ka tamun suvali koa elu en keil mul vit, ‘Envatien onom hel en meatin sav keil hesuval koa keik em vat keik eris.’ (Lev 19:18)
40022040	Tounah vasi koa mul en mengkatien onen Mosis ka hihiseien keil onen provet keil mul tuai en mengkatien keilu ekek.”
40022041	Ka navong Farasi keil aro vituai ral mini, Iesu vis keil vit,
40022042	“?Kami mimundem sa usil Mesaea? ?Kei hekistal en vatiamal onen sei?” Keil avit kesi avit, “Hekistal en vatiamal onen asuv houlu Deved telamu.”
40022043	Iesu viteni min keil vit, “?Munak koanek anatin, vensa varei Ninin onen Ahi san rendemien min Deved keke vahise Mesaea enek en ‘Asuv’? Veni viteni vit,
40022044	‘Iahova viteni min Asuv onak vit, “Kitondan ekok en usivek matu, hetokol avong niling koakeil avi vativieh ral minuk iha en hem.”’ (Sam 110:1)
40022045	Asuv houlu Deved varei vise Mesaea en ‘Asuv onen.’ ?Ka veni tata tai sakras vahise natnali en ‘asuv,’ Mesaea heka en vatiamal onen Deved hemukave?”
40022046	Ka meatin keil asakras avahit kesi. Ka en avong enek muli va, meatin keil ametauni keke avahisi en etai mun tounah.
40023001	Navong Iesu mul veah en teahu ten Eim Votut, selus min marmari vangi meatin keil ka min onen keil vit,
40023002	“Tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil amul akur vulin Mosis keke avit kilea mengkatien keil onen Ahi min meatin keil.
40023003	Sakini, kami mihelong kat keil ka mihousil tounah vasi koa keil aviteni mivoumoni. Ka minaleisungeintei sakien keil one, veni keil armusiltei asa koa amul avisein meatin sav keil eni.
40023004	Keil aling kat mengkatien tameas houlu en eisilin meatin keil. Ka keil, e rovattei avasan he avakataun keil avahousi.
40023005	“Koakeil enek, tounah vasi amumoni, amumonis avaleh meten meatin sav keil eni keke avahouhou min keil. Munak meatin sav keil apar kat titi bokis en hen koa selusien onen Ahi mul ien, koakeil enek amumon one marmariso mok. Munak meatin sav keil amumon kele eisin ome taveah, koakeil enek amumon ome tetaveah ramat.
40023006	En mari anien keil ka en eim tahihiseien emun, keil alei kan out tatondanien keil tetahos koa asak koe ven hetetamen keil.
40023007	En out tahul tounah ien, e vati mok navong meatin keil aviten ‘more’ min keil ral min houhouen ka avise keil en ‘hetetamen.’
40023008	“Ka kami, anahisetei kami en ‘hetetamen’ veni hetamen onami tas, ka kami vasi mivi time keil.
40023009	Ka minahisetei meatin etai en out netan en ‘tata’ veni Tata onami tas, kei enges koa ro en out nesa.
40023010	Ka tamun, anahisetei kami en ‘tiser’ veni tiser onami tas, kei vi Kristo.
40023011	Kei koa mul kataun kami sav suval vi eiloheh onami, kei hemai hehi houlu mok en kami.
40023012	Veni koakeil aling rendemien one vina nesa, Ahi heling keil iha netan, ka koakeil aling rendemien one vita netan, Ahi hehati lat ise.
40023013	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Ahi hesan mahien min kami veni miring koe sise onen meatin keil anahatei vesesal ven hiasuvien onen Ahi. Anatin, avaseini e vati avoumon Ahi vahi asuv houlu one, kami emi rovattei, ka miring koe meatin sav keil anoumontei.
40023015	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Ahi hesan mahien min kami veni mika koteh atas ka atan keke mivahotin meatin tai ka mivahiles rendemien onen vousil kat kami. Ka navong kei viles musil kat hihiseien keil onami, kami mimumoni mai tisa revi mok mulin kami keke mal revi kei mun hekur mahien en ahang koa sakras vavus suval onami.
40023016	“!Hetisa mok min kami koa misak visi keke mivalamun meatin keil, avaseini mivi metovar keil! Mahien koa mihekuri hemariso mok veni mimul mivisein meatin keil mivit, ‘Munak meatin mumon hatkatien onen en isen Eim Votut, hatkatien onen vi heisav enges. Ka munak mumon hatkatien onen en isen gol koa mul en Eim Votut, kei hehatimal hekeih en hatkatien onen.’
40023017	!Kami metovar keil, mivi vau! ?Koa kave houlu mok, gol ten Eim Votut vuo Eim Votut varei koa mul sakin gol enek vi votut?
40023018	Ka kami mivisein meatin keil emun mivit, ‘Munak meatin mumon hatkatien onen en isen ahor ten sanien, hatkatien onen vi heisav enges. Ka munak mumon hatkatien onen en isen sanien koa alingi ien, kei hehatimal hekeih en hatkatien onen.’
40023019	!O kami koa metomi var! ?Koa kave houlu mok, sanien vuo ahor ten sanien koa mul sakin sanien enek mai vi votut?
40023020	Sakini, meatin koa mumon hatkatien onen en isen ahor ten sanien mul mumoni mun en isen tounah vasi koa mul ien.
40023021	Ka meatin koa mumon hatkatien onen en isen Eim Votut, kei mul mumoni en isen Ahi koa ro ien.
40023022	Ka meatin koa mumon hatkatien onen en isen out nesa, kei mumoni en isen vulin ten keihoen onen Ahi ka en isen kati onen kei koa mul ien.
40023023	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Ahi hesan mahien min kami veni milong kat titi mengkatien keil suval sakien koa misan taet ten titi ouai keil takukien min Ahi. Ka mengkatien keil koa houlu mok, suval mengkatien keil keke mivatie sakien ten maluen, enmahisien ka demkatien, kami mirlong kattei. Hetahos imok munak mihelong kat mengkatien koa houlu mok hetal min koakeil avi havivi mok emun.
40023024	!Avaseini mivi metovar, misak visi mivalamun meatin sav keil! Kami misev revi en oai mami keke mivarmuntei titi neno tai koa romutotei, ka mimea mirem vasi mari kamel tai koa tisa mok.
40023025	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Mahien onami hemariso mok veni moulien onami suval veioai ka pelet onami koa mikas motein revi out hae enges. Ka uaen ka anien koa mul en keilu, mikuri en sakien ten keihoen ka metenan.
40023026	!Kami mivi metovar varei! Helamu, mihekas motein out neim en tounah keil en moulien onami. Hemukonek, out hae emun hetolas.
40023027	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Kami misuval tehitan keil koa amum revi ka akasi en oai tamuoh. Out hae, alesi tahos, ka out neim vilelau en sin meatin ka tounah sav keil koa tisa vis tisa mok.
40023028	En vati sakien enek, mimal revi en hilivemi enges, ka en tinomi neim, mivilelau en luvosien ka tisaen.
40023029	“!Hetisa mok min kami tiser keil ten mengkatien ka Farasi keil koa mimusil kat Ahi en hilivemi enges! Mahien onami hemariso mok veni mimum revi tehitan keil onen provet keil ka mimosan en tehitan onen koakeil amal.
40023030	Ka mimul miviteni mivit, ‘Munak komai mevato en avong onen avu onomai keil telamu, komai mevarlah ruaitei vatal min keil navong amu vini provet keil.’
40023031	Ekek, ral min selusien kati onami, miviteni anatin keke mivi vatiamal kati onen koakeil amu vini provet keil.
40023032	Ka en avong keil onami, mihoum vasin asa koa avu onami keil telamu amum rohtoh eni.
40023033	“!Kami mivi tetal tisa keil! !Anatin, kami mivi vangi tetal tisa keil koa mimul mirili vini meatin keil en ongomi! ?Mihelohosai ran mahien ten ahang koa sakras vavus hemukave? !Mihesakras!
40023034	Sakini nasila provet keil, koakeil akileile, ka tiser keil iha ven kami keke isel kat kami mivahiles ran tisaen onami. Ka kami, mihouas tei keil imat, ka keil koan mun miheti kat keil en aiveave. Ka teisav en keil, mihetah keil en viau takan en eim tahihiseien keil onami. Mihelikat keil keke mihehuli kat keil en taon keil onami ka en taon tateisav keil emun.
40023035	Hesakini, mahien ven matien onen meatin vasi keil koa amal en meten Ahi hel en hemi. Anatin, matien onen Ebel koa mal koa avu onami amu rohtoh eni rokol matien onen Sakaraea, natin Berekae, koa avu onami akov vini luhu en Eim Votut ka ahor ten sanien teni, matien vasi one heha kat kami.
40023036	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, Ahi hesan mahien ven matien keil vasi enek heha kat kami ten kosa.
40023037	“!O meatin keil ten out Serusalem! Kami, mimu vini provet keil ka mikov vini eiloheh keil koa Ahi sila keil umai ven kami. Avong houlu, ek vati mok mahise ruain kami ka mating koe kami vasuval toahin tai mul vise ruain titan keil ka ring koe keil en apouen. Ka kami emi rovattei.
40023038	!Sakini mihelesi! Ahi herting koetei mun kami vuo taon onami, hesakini hemai hehi out volvol.
40023039	Ka naviteni min kami, kosa heha, miherlestei mun inau hetokol avong koa kami mihehiteni mihehit, ‘!Tokolkatien mul en kei koa mai en isen Iahova!’ ” (Sam 118:26)
40024001	Navong Iesu ka onen keil amul alokovein teahu ten Eim Votut, meatin keil onen umai veni ka arie lat more eim keil ten Eim Votut mini.
40024002	Sakini Iesu viteni min keil vit, “?Miles tounah vasi keil ekek? Anatin eli naviteni min kami, avong tai hemai koa ahat keil enek irkapiltei mun, meatin keil imai u rasilin keil vasi.”
40024003	Evus, Iesu vina en Hou Nei Olip ka ral min meatin keil onen. Ka navong mul rondan, keil umai veni, keil enges, ka avisi avit, “?Hiteni min komai, tounah keil ekek usil Eim Votut hekur out nengeis? ?Ka asa varei hetie lati keke komul kumai ka tounah keil ten out netan hevus?”
40024004	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Mihelei kat revi kami ka minamaentei meatin sav tai nasak luvos kami.
40024005	Veni meatin houlu imai en isok ka ihiteni ihit, ‘!Inau navi Mesaea!’ Sakini iluvos meatin keil houlu.
40024006	Mihelonge keke vaeen keil mul mai vesesal ka mihekur longlongien usil rea keil en out soutin. Ka kami minatimanintei eni. Tounah keil enek hemai somok hekistal, ka keite ten out netan hermaitei veah.
40024007	Out tai uas out sav ka kantri keil u ris kantri sav keil. En out houlu en out netan amai heat meatin keil ka alu helu.
40024008	Ka avaseini keke tounah keil enek tisa, hemai hetisa mok mulamu en avong hiasuvien onen Ahi hemai hekistal ien. Tounah keil enek asuval mahien koa ahin long rohtoh eni navong hekur tivava.
40024009	“Hevus, ihuli kat kami ka isa lat kami miheha keke avasan mahien ka u vini kami. Meatin keil ten kantri vasi keil, tine heat kami veni mimusil inau.
40024010	En avong enek, meatin houlu ihiles eisile ran demkatien one ka isa lat time keil one min vativieh keil ka tine heat vatiamal kati one.
40024011	Ka provet taluvosien keil houlu ikistal ka iluvos meatin keil houlu.
40024012	Ka veni sakien tatisa hemai hehi houlu mok, envatien onen meatin houlu hetovuol en meatin sav keil.
40024013	Ka koakeil ilomal hekeih en demkatien one hetokol keite ten tounah vasi enek, Ahi houtut keil.
40024014	Ka navong more longlongien koanik usil hiasuvien onen Ahi heka vasi out netan keke akilea eni, en avong enek varei, keite ten tounah vasi hemai.
40024015	“Kami miheles selusien onen Ahi koa ka en provet Daniel hemai hehi anatin koa vit, ‘Iling tounah tai koa tisaso hel en Eim Votut ka hesakini hermutotei mun en meten Ahi.’ (Dan 11:31) (Kami koa mivuli selusien ekek, miheilea aneite teni.)
40024016	Ka navong milesi, koakeil amul en out Sudea ikalah ilohosai iha en vatihou keil ka ito suai.
40024017	Munak meatin etai mul museh hae, avong hervinvintei mun vaha ris neim vakur etai tounah onen.
40024018	Ka munak meatin tai mul mum en ah sen, hervatei mun teim vakur etai eisin omon.
40024019	En avong keil enek, hetisa vareis min ahin keil koa ameas vuo koakeil arounat en tivava keil.
40024020	Mihehis min Ahi keke avong koa mihelohosai eni hervitei en avong koa an hetisa vuo en Sabat,
40024021	veni mahien en avong tatisa enek helohlin avong vasi keil ten out netan: en avong Ahi mumon out netan rokol kosa. Ka vati avong enek hetovuol emun en avong keil koa hemai veah.
40024022	Ka Ahi rei avong keil tatisa enek mai tamureis veni mundem usil koakeil rie lat keil avi onen. Veni munak hermumontei, meatin hetovuol emun hemoul.
40024023	“Ka en avong enek, ihiteni ihit, ‘!Alesi mau! !Mesaea koa Ahi rie lati keiek!’ Vuo ihit, ‘!Alesi, mul kei va!’ Ka kami minakurtei anatin en selusien keil enek.
40024024	Veni Mesaea taluvosien keil ka provet taluvosien keil emun imai. Ka navong imai, umon merikel keil ka marmari tounah keil vasakin meatin keil itimanin eni. Keil umoni keke avaluvos meatin houlu avousil keil. Ka isak visi keke ileh koakeil emun Ahi rie lat keil avi onen, ka isakras.
40024025	Sakini mihelong revi selusien onak veni naviteni tuai min kami tounah keil koa hemai hekistal.
40024026	“Sakini, munak meatin etai hehiteni min kami hehit, ‘Mesaea va ko en out volvol,’ minahatei en out ekok. !Vuo! Munak keil ihiteni ihit, ‘Mesaea keie, kei ros neim en out enek,’ minakurtei anatin eni.
40024027	Veni en avong koa inau, Natin Meatin, nimai ris eni, meatin keil vasi ilei kilea eni hesuval navong ales ahil vil ka ritin ka vasi out en usite tai en out ist rokol usite sav emun en out wes.
40024028	Suval koa meatin keil alei kilea out koa tounah tai mat mul ien navong ales vangi angolu keil, navong Natin Meatin hemai ris, meatin keil ilei kilea eni.
40024029	“Ka en hati avong enek koa avong tatisa keil enek hevus, ‘Meteiai hemai hemalikelik ka avati hertitintei. (Aes 13:10) Hitu keil imerang ran teilang, ka tounah sav keil emun amul nesa, Ahi hesakulul en keil.’ (Aes 34:4)
40024030	“Anatin, en avong koanek varei, tounah hekistal en teilang vatie lati keke inau, Natin Meatin, namul numai, ka meatin vasi ten out netan uai avong ilesi. Keil iles, ‘Natin Meatin hel hemita en mahmah keil ten out nesa’ (Dan 7:13) hetal min keihoen ka mari muohien onen.
40024031	Kei houh mari amaru tai keke vasila angelo keil onen. Ka keil iha en out vasi netan, usite tai hetokol usite sav, keke avalah ruain meatin keil koa Ahi rie lat keil avi onen.
40024032	“Kami mihekur hihiseien koa ten vati fik. Navong angoite so lati ka mul son oute hau keil, mikilea keke avong ten romrom mul mai vesesal.
40024033	En vati sakien enek, navong miles tounah vasi keil enek amul akur out, miheilea keke amairisien onak, Natin Meatin, mul mai vesesal. Anatin, mul tuai en voiteh.
40024034	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tounah vasi keil enek hekur out en avong koa meatin keil ten kosa amul amoul veah.
40024035	Out netan ka teilang emun luhevupuol, ka selusien onak sakras vavuol.”
40024036	Ka Iesu vit, “Meatin tovuol vailea avong kati koa inau, Natin Meatin, nimai ris eni. Anatin, angelo keil en out nesa ka inau, Natin Ahi, emun merkileatei eni. Ahi Tamer enges kilea avong kati teni.
40024037	Amairisien onak, Natin Meatin, hesuval asa koa kur out en avong onen Noah mulamu.
40024038	Veni en avong keil enek mulamu en mari oai, meatin keil amul akanian ka amunmun, meahos keil ka ahin keil amul aretalihe va rokol avong varei Noah va neim en mari sip onen.
40024039	Keil areingeingeni varei en asa koa hemai hekur out rokol avong varei koa mari oai mai ka mutaves vasin keil uva umatmat. En vati sakien enek, meatin keil itimanin en amairisien onak, Natin Meatin.
40024040	En avong enek, munak meatin elu lumum en ah tas; tai en keilu Ahi hekuri hehina heto hetal mini, ka tamun helokoveini hetos.
40024041	Anatin, munak luahin lumul lusak mesein anien, tai en keilu Ahi hekuri hehina heto hetal mini, ka tamun helokoveini hetos.
40024042	“Sakini, mihelei kat revi kami, veni mireingeingen avong sa koa Asuv onami hemai ris eni.
40024043	Ka miheilea keke munak meatin koa eim vi onen kilea en avong kati koa tarhena hemai ien, kilea vatos valei kokoe revi ven eim omon keke tarhena enek hervatei neim.
40024044	Sakini, mihesak mesein kami, veni en vati sakien enek, inau, Natin Meatin, nimai ris suval tarhena tai en avong koa mirkileatei eni.
40024045	“?Isei vi meatin toumien koa vi meteisau ka mul long kat ren asuv onen? Kei vi kei koa asuv onen lingi vi houlu en meatin toumien teisav keil en teim keke vasan anien ae en avong mal teni.
40024046	Tokolkatien hel en meatin toumien koa asuv onen hehotini keke mum revi umen vasi keil onen navong mai ris teim.
40024047	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, asuv koanek hehati lat meatin toumien enek keke valei kat vasin tounah sav keil onen emun.
40024048	“Ka munak meatin toumien enek, vatin tisa ka mul viteni min kei sasen vit, ‘Asuv onak mul roun vareis.’
40024049	Sakini mul mu purun meatin toumien teisav keil ka mul kanian ka mul munmun ral min koakeil avi uti munmunien.
40024050	Ka asuv onen hemai ris en avong tai koa meatin toumien enek hermundemtei hehit hemai eni.
40024051	Ka navong asuv onen hemai, hou puruni ka helisi heha en out ten mahien hetal min koakeil amusil Ahi en hilive enges, en out koa il is ka il ihal lohe ven mahien one.”
40025001	Navong Iesu mul selus ral min meatin keil onen usil hemukave il isak mesein keil ven amairisien onen, ra usil tatavolien enek min keil vit, “En avong enek, hiasuvien onen Ahi hemai hesuval avong koa atouli hau halualim (10) uva keke avales tetaliheien tai. Navong out mul vavong, akur laet one ka uva avahisu min meatin koa vatetalihe keke avousili avaha en out ten tetaliheien.
40025002	Elim en keil vate tovuol, ka elim vate mul.
40025003	Koakeil vate tovuol akur laet one ka arkur etai mun oel vatal min keil.
40025004	Ka koakeil vate mul akur retai en veioel tamun ral min laet one.
40025005	Meatin ten tetaliheien roun en amaien onen, ka atouli hau keil enek amul arae ka amatil.
40025006	“Ka en metavinavong, along meatin keil avisohiso avit, ‘!Mul mai! !Meatin ten tetaliheien mul mai! !Almai alhisu mini rovousili!’
40025007	“Navong atouli hau keil enek alonge, amule amea ka amum revi laet keil one.
40025008	Ka koakeil vate tovuol aviteni min koakeil vate mul avit, ‘Alsan tei oel onami vamai, veni laet onomai mul mat ke.’
40025009	“Ka koakeil vate mul avit kesi min keil avit, ‘Vuo li, veni oel onomai rovinvintei ven laet onami ka laet onomai emun. Mihehas en sitoa teni ka mihehul tei hehi onami.’
40025010	“Ka navong ahin keil enek uva avahul tei oel, meatin ten tetaliheien mai kistal. Ka atouli keil koa asak mesei revi, amusili ka uva neim ral mini en mari anien ten tetaliheien. Evus, meatin keil akoteh en voiteh.
40025011	“Ka katau, navong atouli sav keil umai akistal, umai en eim enek ka avisohiso avit, ‘!Asuv, Asuv! !Sehen voiteh ven komai li!’
40025012	“Ka meatin ten tetaliheien vit kesi min keil vit, ‘Anatin eli naviteni min kami, narkileatei kami varei.’”
40025013	Ka Iesu selus ekor en tatavolien enek vit, “En sakien enek, kami mihelei kat revi kami, veni mireingeingen avong kati ten amairisien onak.”
40025014	Iesu ra usil tatavolien tamun min meatin keil onen vit, “En avong enek, amaien ten hiasuvien onen Ahi hesuval hetetamen tai koa sak mesein tounah keil onen keke vaha en out soutin. Sakini, vise ruain eiloheh etel (3) onen ka ling keitel telvalei kat tounah keil onen.
40025015	Kei ling retai en tounah keil onen en heatel musil meteisauen one. Min tai, hetetamen enek ling gol mani taosen elim (5,000) en hen. Min tamun, ling gol mani taosen elu (2,000) en hen. Ka min tamun koa teisav, ling gol mani taosen tas (1,000) en hen. Evus, hetetamen enek va suk.
40025016	“Navong va, hatte tas, kei koa kur gol mani taosen elim (5,000) eva ka mum sosor en mani enek va vio … kur ris taosen elim (5,000) emun ral mini.
40025017	Ka en vati sise enek, meatin koa kur gol mani taosen elu (2,000), kei mun mum sosor en mani enek ka kur ris taosen elu (2,000) mun.
40025018	Ka meatin koa kur gol mani taosen tas (1,000), kei va, kil avul tai, ka rahin suain mani onen asuv onen.
40025019	“Avong houlu muli va, ka asuv oneatel mai ris ka vise keitel keke valong revi asa telmumoni en mani koa lingi en heatel.
40025020	Meatin toumien onen koa kur gol mani taosen elim (5,000) mai veni ral min taosen elim emun ka vit, ‘Asuv, keik koling gol mani taosen elim (5,000) en hek. Ka kilesi, namum sosor eni ka navotin taosen elim (5,000) emun ka naling kati ral mini.’
40025021	“Navong asuv onen lesi, viteni mini vit, ‘!Tahos imok! Keik kovi eiloheh koa tahos koa nakilea nindesinuk. Ka veni kolei kat revi tounah keil havivis koa nalingi en hem, nisakinuk kilei kat tounah keil houlu onak. Kimai ka kiles tahosien hetal min asuv onom.’
40025022	“Evus, eiloheh onen koa kur gol mani taosen elu (2,000) mai veni ka vit, ‘Asuv, keik koling gol mani taosen elu (2,000) en hek. Ka kilesi, namum sosor eni ka navotin taosen elu (2,000) emun ka naling kati ral mini.’
40025023	“Navong asuv onen lesi, viteni mini vit, ‘!Tahos imok! Keik kovi eiloheh tai koa tahos koa nakilea nindesinuk. Ka veni kolei kat revi tounah keil havivis koa nalingi en hem, nisakinuk kilei kat tounah keil houlu onak. Kimai ka kiles tahosien hetal min asuv onom.’
40025024	“Evus, eiloheh onen koa kur gol mani taosen tas (1,000) mai veni ka vit, ‘Asuv, nakilea keke kovi meatin takeih tai koa mul kur heiai en vatiai keil koa keik korluhtei, ka komul kolah anien koa meatin sav keil aluhi en ah keil osom.
40025025	Sakini nametaunuk ka nuva narahin suain mani onom en avul tai. Kilesi ke, mani keil vasi onom keiek.’
40025026	“Navong asuv onen lesi, viteni mini vit, ‘!Keik kovi taripeng vareis ka eiloheh tai koa tisaso. Keik kokilea keke navi meatin takeih tai koa namul nakur heiai en vatiai keil koa narluhtei, ka namul nalah anien koa meatin sav keil aluhi en ah keil osak.
40025027	Mukonek, tahos imok munak kovaling mani onak enges en bangk tai keke navong numai ris nakilea makur ris mani onak vatal titan.’
40025028	“Evus, hetetamen enek viles ka les eiloheh sav onen ka viteni mini vit, ‘Kulat gol mani ran hen eiloheh enek ka kilingi en hen koa kur kat gol mani taosen halualim (10,000) tuai.
40025029	Veni koakeil amum ral min tounah koa mul en he, isan tamun mini keke vasakin tounah keil koa mul en he hehi houlu mok. Ka koakeil armumtei vatal min asa koa mul en he tuai, avaseini tounah keil havivis, ikulati ran he.
40025030	Ka eiloheh tatisa ekek, kilisi heha hae en out koa mankoli heto hetal min koakeil il is ka il ihal lohe ven mahien one.’”
40025031	Iesu mules selus min meatin keil onen vit, “Navong inau, Natin Meatin, nimai ris eni, nimai en mari muohien ka hetal min angelo vasi keil. Hevus, nitondan en vulin ten keihoen onak hetal min hetetamenien keke nilei revi usite onen meatin keil.
40025032	En avong enek, meatin vasi keil ten kantri vasi keil iso ruai out hetas. Keil ilomal en metok, ka nititi vas keil iha en vangite helu. Numoni hesuval meatin koa lei kat sipsip keil mul riti vas nani keil vaha ran sipsip keil osen.
40025033	Sipsip keil, ling seheni en usite matu ka nani keil, en usite meil. En sakien enek, inau mun niling meatin keil amal en usivek matu, ka koakeil akalkali, nilingi en usivek meil.
40025034	“Hevus, inau koa narondan en vulin ten keihoen enek, nihiteni min koakeil amul en usivek matu nihit, ‘!Kami koa tokolkatien onen Tata onak mul en kami, almai! Almai ka mihekur asa koa kei sak meseini ven kami navong mumon out netan.
40025035	Veni navong amai kat nau, misan anien minau nakani; navong maroro kat nau, misan oai minau namuni; ka navong navi heou, mikur revi nau en teim onami.
40025036	Anatin, navong eisin omak tovuol, mimusin enau; navong namesai, milei kat revi nau; ka navong namul en eim takeih, kami misau enau.’
40025037	“Evus, meatin keil amal ihit kesi minau ihit, ‘?Asuv, avong sa varei melesuk amai katuk ka mesan anien kokani; vuo maroro katuk ka mesan oai minuk komuni?
40025038	?Avong sa melesuk kovi heou ka mekur revi keik en teim somai, vuo eisin omom tovuol ka memusin enuk?
40025039	?Ka avong sa varei melesuk komesai vuo komul en eim takeih ka mesau enuk?’
40025040	“Ka en vuluk ten keihoen nihiteni min keil nihit, ‘Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tounah vasi koa mimumoni min meatin tai koa musil kat nau, avaseini kei vi meatin kuren enges, en metok koanek suval koa kami mimumoni minau varei.’
40025041	“Hevus, nihiteni min koakeil amul en usivek meil nihit, ‘!Kami koa Ahi sesendan kami, miheha ranau! !Miheha en ahang koa sakras vavus, koa Ahi sak meseini tuai ven Temat ka angelo keil onen!
40025042	Veni navong amai kat nau, mirsantei anien minau maani; navong maroro kat nau, mirsantei oai minau mamuni;
40025043	ka navong navi heou, mirkur revitei nau en teim onami. Ka navong eisin omak tovuol, mirmusin entei nau; navong namesai, mirlei kat revitei nau; ka navong namul en eim takeih, kami mirsao entei nau.’
40025044	“Hevus keil ihis nau ihit, ‘?Asuv, avong sa varei melesuk amai vuo maroro katuk, vuo kovi heou, vuo eisin omom tovuol, vuo komesai, vuo komul en eim takeih ka merkatauntei keik?’
40025045	“Ka inau nihit kesi min keil nihit, ‘Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tounah vasi koa mirmumontei min meatin tai koa musil kat nau, avaseini kei vi meatin kuren enges, en metok koanek suval koa mirmumontei minau.’
40025046	“Ka koakeil akalkali, inau nisa lat keil iha en out koa mahien one sakras vavus. Ka koakeil amal iha ikur moulien ten lisenges.”
40026001	Navong Iesu selus min meatin keil onen usil tounah ten Avong koa ilei revi usite vasi onen meatin keil evus, kei viteni min keil vit,
40026002	“Suval mikilea eni tuai, avong helu sesuk keke umon Anien ten Mul Laui. Ka en avong enek varei, isa lat nau, Natin Meatin, niha en hen vativieh keil onak keke iti kat nau en aiveave.”
40026003	Ka en more teim osen Kaiafas koa vi asuv houlu onen pris keil, asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil alah ruai.
40026004	Keil arun lekat sise koa ika suai ien keke akilea avahuli kat Iesu ka avouasi vamat.
40026005	Ka aviteni avit, “Rehermumontei en avong ten ale, veni hetisa meatin keil anoumon rea.”
40026006	Ka navong Iesu mul veah en out Betani, kei ro teim sen Saemon koa mulamu kur mesaien ten leprosi en hiliven.
40026007	Navong Iesu mul kanian, ahin tai mai veni ka mul kur veite koa amumoni en more ahat koa avise en alabasta. Oel koa vite tahos imok mul ien koa mani teni keih ka kei mai ka mutahi en vatin Iesu.
40026008	Ka navong meatin keil onen Iesu alesi, arun kutut usili avit, “?!Vensa kei mul purun oel mukok!?
40026009	Tahos imok vahit kei vasalem en oel koanik en mari mani tai. Vasakini, mani teni kilea vakataun koakeil tounah one tovuol.”
40026010	Iesu kilea en asa amul aselus usili ka viteni min keil vit, “?Mimul mivul kat ahin ekek vensa? Kei mumon more tounah minau.
40026011	Veni koakeil tounah one tovuol ito hetal min kami lisenges, ka inau nirtotei hetal min kami lises.
40026012	Navong kei mutah oel en avek, kei sak mesein nau ten avong tatetahinien onak varei.
40026013	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, en out vasi netan koa ihitehiten more longlongien usil inau, ihiteni mun asa koa ahin ekek mumoni minau. Ka hesakini meatin sav keil indem silat kei.”
40026014	Navong akanian evus, Sudas Eskariot, tai en teindan elu (12) onen Iesu, va ven asuv keil onen pris keil
40026015	ka vis keil vit, “?Munak nisa lat Iesu heha en hemi, mihesan asa minau?” Sakini, keil avuli silva mani hanumau tai ka halualim (30) keke avasani mini.
40026016	Sudas maeni, ka en avong enek va, kei mul lekat sise vaka ien keke vasa lat Iesu vaha en he.
40026017	En avong tai ten avong oulu (7) ten Ale ten Veret Is Tovuol Ien, meatin keil onen Iesu umai veni ka avisi avit, “?Out kave em vati mevasak mesein Anien ten Mul Laui ien?”
40026018	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Miheha en taon Serusalem ke va, ka mihehotin meatin tai en out enek. Mihehiteni mini mihehit, ‘Tiser viteni vit, “Avong onak mai vesesal. Ka nian Anien ten Mul Laui en teim osom hetal min onak keil.”’”
40026019	Sakini meatin keil onen uva ka amumoni suval koa Iesu viteni min keil. Ekonek, asak mesein Anien ten Mul Laui.
40026020	Navong meteiai munu, Iesu mai ka rondan en anien enek ral min teindan elu (12) onen.
