40026021	Ka navong amul akanian, Iesu vit leini min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tai en kami hesa lat nau niha en hen vativieh keil onak.”
40026022	Navong alonge mukok, onen keil alonge tisa houlu ka retai en keil avis Iesu avit, “?Asuv mukave, komundemi kovit inau?”
40026023	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Anatin, tai en kami koa romul rokanian ruai hesa lat nau.
40026024	Ka anatin keke inau, Natin Meatin, nimat hesuval koa Tus Votut viteni. !Ka hetisa mok min kei koa hesa lat inau! Meatin enek, hetahos imok vahit avarvasitei veni mahien koa Ahi hesani mini hemariso mok.”
40026025	Evus, Sudas koa hesa lati visi vit “?Tiser mukave, komundemi kovit inau?” Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “Suval keik koviteni.”
40026026	Navong amul akanian, Iesu kur veret ka san masmasien min Ahi veni. Evus vul vahasi ka navong mul riti min meatin keil onen viteni vit, “Mihekuri miheani. Koanik vi avek.”
40026027	Evus, Iesu kur veiuaen, san masmasien min Ahi veni ka navong sani min keil viteni vit, “Kami vasi mihemuni.
40026028	Uaen koanik vi rak vasakin hatkatien hau onen Ahi vakeih ka vamai vahi anatin. Rak houe ven meatin houlu vakas motein meten Ahi keke hermundemtei mun usil tisaen keil one.
40026029	Naviteni min kami, nirmuntei mun uaen koanik hetokol avong koa nimun risi hetal min kami en avong koa Tata onak hesakin hiasuvien onen heka vasi out.”
40026030	Navong akanian ka amusau en souen tai evus, keil asital ka avina en Hou Nei Olip.
40026031	Navong arokol Hou Nei Olip, Iesu selus min meatin keil onen vit, “En vongien ekek varei, kami vasi mihesokovein inau hesuval koa Ahi viteni en Tus Votut koa vit, ‘Nuas meatin koa lei kat sipsip keil, ka sipsip keil onen iloh rasil.’ (Sak 13:7)
40026032	Ka navong nimoul eris ran matien, nilamu en kami niha en out Kaleli.”
40026033	Ka Pita mea selus vit, “!Avaseini munak meatin sav vasi keil isokoveinuk, inau nasakras masokoveinuk varei!”
40026034	Ka Iesu vit risi mini vit, “Anatin eli naviteni minuk, en vongien enek varei, out hermulantei mau ka ato herkokorattei mau, ka keik, kihiteni hatte hetel keke korkileatei inau.”
40026035	Ka Pita viteni keih tamun vit, “!Vuo, hermukteinek! !Avaseini munak nimat hetal minuk, inau nasakras mahiteni keke narkileatei keik!” Ka meatin sav keil onen aviteni vatte tas.
40026036	Evus, Iesu va en out tai avise en Ketsemane ral min onen keil. Navong arokol out enek, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Mihetondan ekok ka mihetosin nau. Inau maha mau keiva ke mahis.”
40026037	Kei kur Pita ka natin Sepeti keilu telmusili. Ka navong telva, rendemien onen Iesu muasi ka longe tisa houlu.
40026038	Sakini viteni min keitel vit, “Tinok vil en demvoen, vit vahonet inau. Mitheto ekok, mithele hetal minau.”
40026039	Evus, Iesu mual ran keitel havivis, retengeiril nan vita netan ka vis min Ahi vit, “Tata, munak sise sav mul, kikulat mahien enek ranau li. Ka kirmumontei hesuval koa inau ek vati. Kumonis hesuval koa keik em vati.”
40026040	Evus, muris va ven keitel ka votini keke telmatil. Ka viteni min Pita vit, “?Mukave? ?Mitsakras mitvalele vatal minau vatokol haoa vatas?
40026041	Mithelele ka mithehis keke mithermottei navong sakvisien hemai en kamitel. En tinomi, emi vati mivoumon asa koa mal, ka avemi memerau nges.”
40026042	Hatte tamun, Iesu va ris ka vis vit, “Tata, munak sise sav tovuol ka nil nikur vasi mahien enek, kumoni hesuval koa keik em vati.”
40026043	Navong muris, votini keke keitel telmatil eris veni telsakras telvahuli kat metalong.
40026044	Sakini, lokovein keitel eris ka va ris vis hatte etel eni en vati hisien enek.
40026045	Ka navong Iesu muris va ven keitel, kei vit, “?Mitmatil ka mitmuseh veah? !Mitlesi! Ekek, avong mai avasa lat inau, Natin Meatin, vaha en hen meatin tisa keil.
40026046	!Telmea, tovaha! !Meatin koa vasa lat nau keie, mai tuai!”
40026047	Navong Iesu mul semau selus, Sudas, tai en teindan elu onen mai kistal. Ka mari vangi meatin keil amusili umai. Keil alah kat mari naef ka ai tavaeen keil. Umai musil rendemien onen asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil onen Siu keil.
40026048	Sudas koa vat kati vasa lat Iesu mumon metai tai ral min keil vit, “Meatin koa nimusi, kei varei vi meatin koa emi vati. Mihemai mihehuli kati.”
40026049	Sakini Sudas ka mal va ven Iesu, musi ka vit, “!Tiser, more!”
40026050	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Tuak, kumon asas koa kumai veni.” Evus, meatin keil umai ka avuli kat Iesu.
40026051	Ka tai en meatin keil onen Iesu leh lat mari naef onen ka musah koteh ralingen slev onen asuv houlu onen pris keil.
40026052	Iesu viteni keih mini vit, “Ling ris naef onom en vulin veni koakeil avuhu en naef tai, imat en naef.
40026053	Munak ek hehati, nakilea mapeah Tata onak, ka hatte tas, hesila mari vangi angelo tavaeen keil heli teindan elu (12) avamai avating koe inau.
40026054	?Ka munak numoni, Tus Votut hemai hehi anatin hemukave koa viteni keke tounah keil enek hekur out?”
40026055	Evus, Iesu viles les mari vange meatin keil enek ka viteni min keil vit, “?Vensa milah kat naef ka ai tavaeen keil keke mivamai mivahuli kat nau? ?Mimundemi namulamun meatin keil keke mevavae vatal min kavmen orer? !Vuo! En avong vasi, narondan en teahu ten Eim Votut ka navisein meatin keil, ka en out enek mirvuli kattei nau.
40026056	Ka tounah vasi enek kur out vasakin asa koa provet keil amutisi en Tus Votut hemai hehi anatin.” Ka navong avuli kati, meatin vasi keil onen alokoveini ka amuloh rasil.
40026057	Koakeil avuli kat Iesu akuri va en teim sen Kaiafas, koa vi asuv houlu onen pris keil. En out enek, tiser keil ten mengkatien ka elda keil onen Siu keil alah ruai tuai.
40026058	Ka Pita mul lehni musil vange meatin koa mulamun Iesu va vio … rokol teahu ten teim sen asuv houlu onen pris keil. En out enek, kei va neim en teahu ka rondan ral min meatin taleikokoeien keil ten eim enek keke vales asa avoumoni en Iesu.
40026059	Asuv keil onen pris keil ka hetetamen sav keil emun onen Siu keil amul alekat meatin koa voun kat Iesu en tisaen, vasakini akilea avouasi vamat.
40026060	Avaseini meatin houlu aviten luvosien va kat Iesu, asakras avahotin etai tounah keke akilea avamae lat moulien onen keke avou vini. Evus, meatin elu lumai lumulomal
40026061	ka luviteni min koakeil ten Kaonsel enek luvit, “Komal melong meatin ekek viteni vit, ‘Inau nakilea mou rasilin Eim Votut onen Ahi, ka en avong etel enges, num risi.’”
40026062	Sakini asuv houlu onen pris keil mulomal ka vis Iesu vit, “?Mukave? Kolong selusien keil koa aviteni va katuk. ?Tounah tovuol kovahiteni?”
40026063	Ka Iesu mules ro raeng. Sakini asuv houlu enek vis risi vit, “En meten Ahi koa moul, nameng katuk keke kihiten asa koa vi anatin. ?Anatin keke kovi Mesaea, Natin Ahi?”
40026064	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Suval koa koviteni. Ka naviteni min kami, kosa heha, miheles … ‘Natin Meatin hetondan en usite matu onen Ahi Asuv ten Keihoen ka mihelesi hemita en mahmah keil ten out nesa!’” (Sam 110:1; Dan 7:13)
40026065	Navong asuv houlu onen pris keil long selusien onen, tin tisa houlu, rali vas eisin onen ka viteni keih vit, “?Milonge? !Kei selus kekar en isen Ahi! ?Vensa romul rolekat selusien sav koa vaha kati? !Kami vasi milonge mukave kei selus kekar en isen Ahi!
40026066	?Rendemien onami mukave?” Keil avit kesi avit, “!Mal enges keke hemat imok!”
40026067	Evus, keil amutiv kat nan ka amuti. Ka tei sav en keil akovasi
40026068	ka avit, “?!Munak kovi Mesaea anatin, hit luvati min komai, isei varei mutik!?”
40026069	Navong Pita mul rondan veah en teahu ten eim omon asuv houlu onen pris keil, atouli toumien tai mai veni ka vit, “Keik emun koro ral min Iesu ten out Kaleli.”
40026070	Ka Pita muun keih en meten meatin keil vit, “!Rovitei anatin! !Inau narkileatei tounah koa komul kovit usili!”
40026071	Evus, Pita mea mual va en meteau ten teahu. Ekonek, atouli toumien sav tamun lesi ka viteni min meatin sav keil vit, “!Meatin koanik vi tai en keil koa amusil Iesu ten out Nasaret!”
40026072	Ka hatte tamun, Pita viteni min keil vit, “!Navat kati anatin keke narkileatei varei meatin enek!”
40026073	Rovitei tuetin, meatin keil koa amulomal en out enek umai ven Pita ka aviteni mini avit, “Keik varei kovi meatin tai onen veni selusien onom suval koan Kaleli.”
40026074	Ka Pita sesendan kei sasen ral min selusien keih vit, “!Inau narkileatei varei meatin koa mimul mivit usili! !Ka Ahi hesan mahien minau munak selusien onak vi luvosien!” Hatte tas, ato tai kokorat.
40026075	Ka navong Pita longe, mundem ris asa koa Iesu viteni mini vit, “Out hermulantei mau ka ato herkokorattei mau, ka keik, kihiteni hatte hetel keke korkileatei nau.” Sakini, kei lokovein teahu enek, tin mah houlu ka murang.
40027001	En visokon semau, asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil onen Siu keil, keil vasi umai en rendemien tas keke avouas Iesu vamat.
40027002	Sakini, apar kati ka amulamuni va ven asuv Paelet, avat ten kavmen en out enek, keke avasa lati mini.
40027003	Navong Sudas koa sa lat Iesu lesi keke amaen lat moulien onen Iesu keke avouasi vamat, kei viles rendemien onen ka sak visi vasan ris silva mani hanumau tai ka halualim (30) min asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil.
40027004	Kei vit lat kei min keil vit, “Inau namumon tisaen, veni nasa lat meatin tai hemat koa romumon etai tounah vatisa.” Ka keil avit kesi mini avit, “Komai emai rovattei mevailea. Koanek mul enuk.”
40027005	Sakini Sudas rivin mani netan en teahu ten Eim Votut ka muloh va. Evus, va ka par koteh hiren en viau ka murur.
40027006	Asuv keil onen pris keil umai alah lat silva mani keil enek ka aviteni avit, “En mengkatien orer, romaltei rovaling mani enek vaha en ateli ten Eim Votut veni mani enek romutotei, avul lat moulien onen meatin tai eni.”
40027007	Aselus usili ka umai en rendemien tas. Sakini, akur mani enek ka uva ales meatin koa mumon tounah keil en tanvili. Ral min mani enek, avul hati atan rani keke avoumon out tatetahinien tai eni keke avatahin heou keil eni.
40027008	Ven koanik, out enek amul avise en ‘Atan ten Ara’ rokol kosa.
40027009	Evus, asa koa Ahi viteni ka en provet Seremaea mai vi anatin koa vit, “Keil akur silva mani hanumau tai ka halualim (30), mal en mani koa me-Isrel keil alingi vi hulien ten moulien onen.
40027010	Ka ral min mani enek, avul hati atan ran meatin koa mumon tounah keil en tanvili, suval koa Ahi Asuv meng kat inau eni.” (Sak 11:12-13; Ser 19:1-13; 32:6-9)
40027011	Navong koanik mul kur out, Iesu mul mulomal en meten asuv Paelet koa vi avat ten kavmen ten out enek. Ka Paelet visi vit, “?Mukave? ?Anatin keke kovi asuv houlu onen Siu keil?” Iesu vit kesi vit, “Suval koa koviteni.”
40027012	Ka navong asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil aselus va kati, kei rovit kes etai tounah vakataun usite onen.
40027013	Sakini Paelet visi vit, “?Keik korraengontei selusien houlu koa keil amul aviteni vakatuk?”
40027014	Ka Iesu ro raeng mules, rovit kes etai selusien one. Navong asuv Paelet les sakien onen, mutimanin houlu.
40027015	Vi sakien matu onen asuv Paelet keke en avong ten Anien ten Mul Laui, hemae lat meatin tai koa meatin keil arie lati keke va sital ran eim takeih.
40027016	En avong enek, lariken tai mul en eim takeih, isen Barabas koa meatin keil akilea en tounah keil tatisa koa mumoni.
40027017	Sakini navong asuv Paelet lesi keke mari vangi meatin keil alah ruai, vis keil vit, “?Koa kave emi vati mamaeni vasital: Barabas vuo Iesu koa avise en Mesaea?”
40027018	Kei visi mukonek veni lei kilea tuai keke asuv keil onen pris keil asa lat Iesu mini veni amul avi elu eni.
40027019	Ka navong Paelet mul veah rondan en kot onen, ahin onen san selusien mai mini vit, “Konoumon etai tounah naha kat meatin enek veni kei mal revi. Kosa, namundemko houlu ven matil vovoien tai koa nalesi usil meatin enek.”
40027020	Ka asuv keil onen pris keil ka elda keil aleh rendemien onen vangi meatin keil keke avahis Paelet hemae lat Barabas vamaluv, ka uas Iesu hemat.
40027021	Paelet va vis vangi meatin keil enek vit, “?Koa kave en keilu emi vati mamae lati vamaluv?” Ka keil avisohiso avit, “!Barabas!”
40027022	Paelet vis keil vit, “?Hemukonek, numon asa en Iesu koa avisi en Mesaea?” Keil vasi avisohiso avit, “!Ti kati en aiveave!”
40027023	Ka Paelet vis keil vit, “?Vensa? ?Kei mumon sa tisa?” Ka avisohiso keih imok avit, “!Ti kati en aiveave!”
40027024	Navong Paelet lesi keke sakras vahiles rendemien one ka vesesal avoumon rea, kei kur oai ka kas hen en meten meatin vasi keil. Ka navong mumoni, viteni min keil vit, “Kosa, nakas motein hek ran ara ten matien onen meatin ekek veni, en metok, romumon etai tounah keke vamat veni. !Sakini, munak hemat, ara onen hel en hemi enges!”
40027025	Ka vangi meatin keil avit kesi avit, “!Tahos, ran hel en hemai ka en hen titamai keil!”
40027026	Sakini, musil envatien one, Paelet mae lat Barabas sital, ka meng kat meatin tavaeen keil onen avatah Iesu en viau takan ka avalamuni vahina avati kati en aiveave.
40027027	Navong amutah Iesu evus, meatin tavaeen keil onen Paelet amulamuni va en teahu ten mari eim ome ka avise ruain meatin tavaeen sav keil en out enek umai.
40027028	Keil asakit lat eisin omon Iesu ka akav koe en kaliko tai koa vilhili suval omon asuv houlu tai.
40027029	Evus, keil amumon tohtohien eni. Avil vatluvoluv en viau koa sin tetaveah mul ien ka alingi en vatin. Aling eisal tai en hen matu ka aretengeiril en meten suval avouhou mini. Ka navong amumoni aviteni avit, “!O asuv houlu onen Siu keil, mevouhou minuk!”
40027030	Evus, amutiv kati ka asakit lat eisal rani ka amuas vatin eni.
40027031	Navong amumon tohtohien mini evus, akulat kaliko tahilhili rani, ka amusin eni en eisin kati omon. Evus, amulamuni keke avati kati en aiveave.
40027032	Navong meatin tavaeen keil amulamun Iesu uva, ales meatin tai mul en sise, isen Saemon ten out Saerin. Meatin tavaeen keil umai veni ka akeih kati vahus aiveave onen Iesu.
40027033	Amulamun Iesu vina en Hou Kolkota koa aneite teni vi ‘Out ten Asi ten Avat.’
40027034	En out enek, asan uaen min Iesu koa avilesi ral min tounah koa kun. Ka navong Iesu mun visi, seseini.
40027035	Evus, amuti kati en aiveave. Navong mul murur, ason daes keke avatiti eisin keil omon min keil.
40027036	Ekonek, keil arondan ka alei kokoe.
40027037	Ka en aiveave onen, nesa en vatin, aling tisien tai koa amutisi eni avit, ‘Koanik vi Iesu, Asuv Houlu onen Siu keil.’
40027038	En avong enek, amuti kat tarhena elu ral mini, tai en usiven matu ka tamun en usiven meil.
40027039	Navong murur en aiveave, meatin keil koa amual vesesal veni akalialin vate ka amunge kat Iesu
40027040	avit, “!Ei, keik koa kovit ku rasilin Eim Votut ka kum risi en avong hetel enges, hetahos imok keke kikataun vis keik sasom enges! !Munak kovi Natin Ahi anatin, kisuvul ran aiveave enek!”
40027041	En vati sakien enek, asuv keil onen pris keil, tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis, ral min elda keil emun amumon tohtohien min Iesu.
40027042	Keil amumon tohtohien mini avit, “!Alles visi! Kei kilea vakataun meatin sav keil, ka sakras vakataun kei sasen. !Munak anatin keke kei vi asuv houlu onen me-Isrel keil, hemita netan ran aiveave koanik kosa. Hemukonek, ir rehekur anatin esuk eni.
40027043	Kei ling desien onen en Ahi ka viteni vit, ‘Inau navi Natin Ahi.’ Tahos, munak Ahi en vat meatin eke, kei hemai hekatauni.”
40027044	Ka en vati sakien enek, tarhena keilu koa amuti kat keilu en usiven keilu, keilu emun luselus kareni.
40027045	En taviai varei, mankoli mai mutaluh koe out vasi haoa etel (3).
40027046	Ka navong haoa etel enek evus, Iesu visohiso keih en selusien kati onen koa vi Arameak vit, “!Ilae! !Ilae! ?Lama sabaktani?” (Sam 22:1) Aneite ten selusien enek vi, ‘!Ahi onak! !Ahi onak! ?!Vensa kosokoveinau!?’
40027047	Navong meatin tei keil koa amulomal en out enek araengoni avit, “?Milonge? Kei mul vise provet Ilae-tsa.”
40027048	Hatte tas, tai en keil muloh, kur soke kaliko tai, ka kasi en uaen takun. Evus, lingi en kele ai tai ka sani vina min Iesu vasimi.
40027049	Ka tei sav en keil aviteni avit, “Veitir mau ka rovales visi. ?Ilaetsa hemita hekatauni, vuo hermaitei?”
40027050	Evus, Iesu mis roha, leh kor en eang, ka mat.
40027051	En hati avong enek, kaliko koa matetel koa aleh koe hati out koa vi votut en Eim Votut, sipasi elu en ngolite nesa vita varei rokol ngolite netan. Alu mulu ka ahat keil apas
40027052	ka sakin avul tatetahinien sipasi mutah. Meatin houlu onen Ahi koa umat amul ien, keil amoul eris ran matien.
40027053	Keil asital ran avul tatetahinien one ka amual. (Ka navong Iesu mun moul eris ran matien, meatin houlu ales meatin keil enek en out Serusalem koa vi taon votut onen Ahi.)
40027054	Navong avat onen meatin tavaeen keil ka meatin keil onen koa alei kokoe en Iesu alonge alu mulu ka ales tounah vasi koa kur out, keil ametau houlu ka aviteni avit, “Anatin eli, kei vi Natin Ahi varei.”
40027055	Ka ahin houlu avati keil soutin neli ran aiveave ka amul ales tounah koa kur out. Vangi ahin keil enek akataun Iesu navong mum en out Kaleli ka amusili umai en out Serusalem.
40027056	Ka en koakeil enek, keitel telvi Meri ten out Makdela, Meri mama onen Tiemes ka Siosep, ka mama onen natin Sepeti keilu.
40027057	Vesesal out vavong ka Sabat vamai. Sakini meatin tai ten out Aramatea koa tounah onen houlu mai ven asuv Paelet, isen Siosep. Kei mun vi tai en koakeil amul amusil kat Iesu.
40027058	Navong mulomal en meten Paelet, visi vamaen teiai onen Iesu mini. Sakini Paelet meng kat meatin tavaeen keil onen uva akulati ka asani mini.
40027059	Sakini Siosep kuri ka kav koe en kaliko tamuoh koa muto.
40027060	Evus, Siosep vousi ka lingi en valengeihat tatetahinien kati onen koa arei meseini tuai vi heite hau. Evus, rein mari ahat tai koteh koe voiteh ten valengeihat enek ka lokoveini va.
40027061	Meri ten out Makdela ka Meri tateisav lumul lurondan soutin neli en out enek, mal en voiteh ten valengeihat.
40027062	Out mulan en Sabat, asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil uva avales Paelet.
40027063	Umai veni ka aviteni avit, “Asuv, memundem kati keke navong meatin taluvosien enek moul veah kei viteni vit, ‘Avong hetel evus, inau nimoul eris ran matien.’
40027064	Sakini, keik kimeng kat meatin tavaeen keil onom iha ilei kokoe revi en valengeihat tatetahinien onen hetokol avong hetel heli heha. Veni munak kirmumontei, vahera meatin keil onen iha ka ihenan teiai onen. Hesakini, akilea avahiteni keke moul eris ran matien. Ka munak sakien koanek hekur out, luvosien ekor enek hetisa helohlin luvosien koa mulamu navong kei vit vi Mesaea onen Ahi.”
40027065	Navong asuv Paelet longe, maeni vit, “Tahos, mihekur vangi meatin tavaeen tai onak keke avalei kokoe revi en valengeihat enek musil sakien koa kami emi vati.”
40027066	Sakini keil uva ral min meatin tavaeen keil, aling siil vating koe voiteh teni, ka aling vangi meatin tavaeen keil alei kokoe.
40028001	Navong Sabat evus, out mulan en Sande, Meri ten out Makdela ka Meri tateisav luva keke luvasao en valengeihat tatetahinien onen Iesu.
40028002	Hatte tas, alu mulu keih veni angelo tai onen Ahi Asuv mita netan ran out nesa. Kei rei lat ahat koa mul koe voiteh eva, ka rondan eni.
40028003	Aven angelo enek vihil suval ahil vil, ka eisin omon muoh vis muoh.
40028004	Navong meatin tavaeen keil alesi, ametau houlu ka ale maleilei. Keil umotmot ka e von, asakras avoumon etai tounah.
40028005	Ka angelo selus min luahin enek vit, “!Milnametautei! Nakilea milmul millekat Iesu koa amuti kati en aiveave.
40028006	Kei rorotei mun ekok. Anatin, kei moul eris ran matien suval koa kei viteni. Milhemai ekok ka milheles out koa aling teiai onen mul ien.
40028007	Ekek, milhekalah milheha ka milhehiteni min onen keil milhehit, ‘Iesu moul eris ran matien ka helamu en kami heha en out Kaleli. Ekonek kami mihelesi.’ Koanik vi selusien koa Ahi sila inau mahiteni min kamil.”
40028008	Sakini keilu lumea ran valengeihat ka lukalah lumuloh luva keke luvahithiteni min meatin keil onen Iesu. Lumetau ka annivul kat keilu, ka mukos, luvilelau en sien.
40028009	Navong lumul veah luva, hatte tas, Iesu visu min keilu ka vit, “!More! Tomat onen Ahi heto ven kamil.” Navong lulesi, lumai veni, ka lumot luvuli kat alen keilu ka luvouhou mini.
40028010	Evus, Iesu viteni min keilu vit, “Milnametautei. Milheha ka milhehiteni min tuak keil en demkatien keke iha en out Kaleli, ka en out enek keil iles inau.”
40028011	Navong luahin enek lumul luva, tei en meatin tavaeen keil koa alei kokoe en valengeihat uva ris Serusalem ka aviteni min asuv keil onen pris keil tounah vasi koa kur out.
40028012	Sakini, asuv keil onen pris keil aselus ruai ral min elda keil ka aling rendemien tai. Avul meatin tavaeen keil enek en mari mani tai
40028013	ka aviteni min keil avit, “Kami mihehithiteni mihehit, ‘Navong komai memul mematil, meatin keil onen Iesu umai en vongien ka avenan teiai onen.’
40028014	Ka munak longlongien koanik hetokol asuv Paelet, komai meheselus en usite onami ka meheting koe kami keke minakurtei mahien veni.”
40028015	Sakini meatin tavaeen keil enek akur mani ka amum usil asa aviteni. Ka selusien koanik mul karahit out vasi koa Siu keil aro ien rokol kosa.
40028016	Ka meatin teindan tai (11) onen Iesu koa amules uva en out Kaleli ka avina en hou koa Iesu vit meseini min keil tuai.
40028017	En out enek, keil ales Iesu. Navong alesi, uva netan mini, ka keil koa arkurtei anatin eni.
40028018	Ka Iesu mai vesesal ka viteni min keil vit, “Tata onak ling tounah vasi en out nesa ka en out netan mul en hek.
40028019	Sakini, inau naviteni min kami keke miheha ven meatin keil koa amul en kantri vasi keil ka mihoumon keil emun ihi meatin keil onak. Navong amusil kat nau, mihehi baptaes en keil en isen Tata, en isen Natnali, ka en isen Ninin Votut.
40028020	Ka mihehisein keil ilong kat tounah vasi nameng kat kami eni. Ka inau, nito hetal min kami lisenges, hetokol avong koa out netan hevus.”
41001001	Koanik vi more longlongien onen Iesu Kristo, Natin Ahi.
41001002	Longlongien enek usil Mesaea mai rohtoh en ir suval koa Ahi viteni ka en tisien onen provet Aesea vit, “!Kitaengoni! Nisila eiloheh onak vasak revi sise venuk.
41001003	En out volvol, meatin enek hehisohiso hehit, ‘!Sak revi sise ven Asuv heka ien! !Houmon sise onen hemal!’” (Aes 40:3)
41001004	Eiloheh koa Aesea mul vit usili, isen Sion. Kei va en out volvol ka avise en Sion Baptis veni vi baptaes en meatin keil ka mul san selusien onen Ahi min keil vit, “!Mihehiles moulien onami ran tisaen! Mihemaenau nihi baptaes en kami vatie lati keke methos onen Ahi mul en kami.”
41001005	Ka meatin houlu vis houlu mok en provins ten out Sudea ka mari meteimal ten out Serusalem, uva ven Sion. Avitehiten tisaen keil one ka kei vi baptaes en keil en Oaisal Sodan.
41001006	Musin en eisin koa amumoni en hilin kamel ka mutoh eni. Anien an vi kal ka hani koa suka bak keil amumoni en eivorohus.
41001007	Ka kei mul viteni min meatin keil vit, “Katau enau, hetamen tai hemai. Kei marite mok mulin inau, narvinvintei li makulat sandel onen.
41001008	Inau navi baptaes en kami en oai enges, ka kei, hehi baptaes en kami en Ninin Votut.”
41001009	En avong enek, Iesu ka en meteimal ten out Nasaret en provins ten out Kaleli, ka Sion vi baptaes eni en Oaisal Sodan.
41001010	Ka navong Iesu mea ran oai, lele vina nesa ka les teilang mutah. Ka Ninin Votut muka mita netan ka rondan eni suval ame tai.
41001011	Ka rea tai ka en out nesa vit, “Keik, kovi natkuli. Ka inau, nasi nau venuk.”
41001012	Navong Iesu mea ran oai, Ninin Votut sila vina en out volvol,
41001013	ka kei ro en out enek rokol avong hanumau elu (40). En avong keil enek, Temat mul sak visi. Ka Iesu ro en out enek ral min tirendan keil, ka angelo keil alei kat revi.
41001014	Katau en avong aling Sion en eim takeih, Iesu va en out Kaleli ka vitehiten more longlongien koa ka ven Ahi.
41001015	Kei mul viteni vit, “!Avong mal vinvin koa hiasuvien onen Ahi hemai hel ekok! !Mihehiles moulien onami ran tisaen, ka mihekur anatin en more longlongien koa naviteni min kami!”
41001016	Navong Iesu mul mual va en vali oai en out Kaleli, kei les Saemon Pita ka tunali Andru. Keilu luvi meatin talah mesauien ka lumul luson net onealu vita en oai.
41001017	Viteni min keilu vit, “!Lumai, milhousil nau! Kosa millah mesau enges, ka inau nihisein kamil mukave milhelah meatin keil.”
41001018	Hatte tas, lumali time luling net onealu mules ka lumusil Iesu.
41001019	Iesu mual eva ka les Tiemes ka Sion, koa tata onealu Sepeti. Luro en vot ka lurili revi net onealu.
41001020	Navong les keilu, vise keilu vit, “!Lumai, milhousilnau!” Sakini, luvut ran vot ka lumea ran tata onealu ral min meatin toumien keil oneatel, ka luva lumusil Iesu.
41001021	Iesu ral min meatin onen telva en meteimal ten out Kapaniam. En Sabat, telva en eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil ka Iesu mul vihisei eni.
41001022	Koakeil vasi amutimanin en keihoen ten hihiseien onen, koa rosuvaltei tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis.
41001023	Ka rovitei tuetin, navong Iesu mul vihisei veah, meatin tai koa ninin tisa mul ien va neim en out enek.
41001024	Kei visohiso vit, “?Iesu ten out Nasaret, kovit kovoumon sa min komai? ?Kovit kovou rasilin komai? !Inau nakileak! !Keik kovi Meatin Votut onen Ahi!”
41001025	Iesu vul kat ninin tisa enek vit, “!Konavertei! !Mea rani!”
41001026	Sakini, ninin tisa enek maleilei kat meatin enek, visohiso keih ka mea rani.
41001027	Ka koakeil vasi koa alesi, amutimanin eni. Amul aviteni min keil eris avit, “?Asa keinek? !Koanek vi hihiseien hau tai koa keihoen mul ien! Kei sel kat ninin tisa keil, ka along kati.”
41001028	Ka rovitei tuetin, longlongien usil asa koa Iesu mul mumoni ka vasi out en provins ten out Kaleli.
41001029	Ka navong Iesu keitel telmea ran eim tahihiseien, kei ral min Tiemes ka Sion telmusil Saemon Pita keilu Andru telva teim sealu.
41001030	Navong telva en out enek, aviteni min Iesu keke avu tisa onen Saemon Pita mesai, mul en avet veni aven mutin.
41001031	Iesu va veni, vuli kat hen ka rali lati mea. Hatte tas, mesaien vuol rani, kei longe tahos ka mumon anien aeatel.
41001032	En mendilah enek, navong Sabat evus ka meatin keil akilea avoum, alah koakeil amesai ral min keil koa ninin tisa mul en keil, uva ven Iesu.
41001033	Sakini, meatin keil vasi en meteimal en out enek alah ruai rahit eim koa Iesu ro en.
41001034	Ka Iesu lah lat mesaien ran meatin houlu, ka vile lat ninin tisa keil avaha. Ka romaentei ninin tisa keil avaselus ven akilea kei vi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati keke hemai.
41001035	En visokon semau, out vong veah, Iesu mea ran keil, va en out tai koa kilea heto kei sa sen, ka mul vis.
41001036	Ka navong Saemon Pita ka teisav emun keil amea, amul alekat Iesu.
41001037	Ka navong alesi aviteni mini avit, “!Meatin keil vasi e vati avalesuk!”
41001038	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Nakilea. Ka numai ven mailea mahiten more longlongien min meatin vasi keil. Rovaha en out sav.”
41001039	Evus, telva en out vasi en provins ten out Kaleli. Ka kei mul visein meatin keil en eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil ka vile lat ninin tisa keil uva ran meatin keil.
41001040	Navong Iesu keitel telmul veah en provins ten out Kaleli, meatin tai koa kur mesaien ten leprosi va ven Iesu, retengeiril mini, ka peahi vit, “Munak komaeni li, kokilea kovoumon hilivek vamai vato ris.”
41001041	Iesu en mahis meatin enek, ling hen mul ien ka viteni vit, “!Mal! !Kito ris!”
41001042	Hatte tas, mesaien enek va rani ka aven muto varei.
41001043	Evus, Iesu selus keih imok mini mukok vit,
41001044	“!Konahitentei asa koa namumoni minuk min meatin sav! Kihas en Eim Votut, kihit lat keik min pris, ka kikur sanien votut koa Mosis viteni. Hesakini, koakeil vasi ilea keke keik komuto.” Ka Iesu sila meatin enek va.
41001045	Ka navong va rani, mang vas ongon houlu ka viteni min meatin savsav keil asa koa Iesu mumoni mini. Sakini, Iesu sakras vaha en out koa meatin keil alango ien. Mukos, rovatei mun en meteimal keil. Ka meatin keil aka soutin en out vasi keke umai avalesi.
41002001	Avong vahis muli, Iesu muris va en taon ten out Kapaniam, ka keil ten out enek alonge keke ro teim tai.
41002002	Keil houlu umai asien teim enek, sakini out mutikoe neim ka meatin houlu mun amules arapehai en voiteh, ka Iesu mul visein keil en selusien onen Ahi.
41002003	Navong Iesu mul semau vihisei, meatin ehat telmai telvou kakan tueatel koa mules en vulin veni hati usiven mat.
41002004	Ka veni meatin keil avi houlu, telsakras telvakur tueatel vaha min Iesu. Sakini, telvousi vina en hoi eim ka aleng ahho tai, mal en out koa Iesu ro ien. Evus, telrutun tueatel vita ka vas meatin keil koa amul en out enek.
41002005	Ka navong Iesu les asa telmumoni, lei kilea demkatien oneatel ka viteni min meatin enek vit, “Tuak, kosa, Ahi rolestei mun vatisa enuk ven tisaen keil onom.”
41002006	Ka navong tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis koa amul arondan en out enek along selusien koa Iesu viteni, asel kutut kati en rendemien one avit,
41002007	“?Vensa kei run mukok? ?Kei mundemi kei vinvin suval Ahi? !Ahi tas kilea valah lat tisaen!”
41002008	Navong amundemi mukok, Iesu kilea ka viteni min keil vit, “?Vensa mimul mirendem en tounah enek?
41002009	Maes imok minau keke nihiteni min meatin ekek koa sakras vakaka nihit, ‘Nikulat tisaen onom,’ veni kami misakras mivalesi munak nakur keihoen keke moumoni. Ka keih keke nihiteni nihit, ‘!Mea! Lum lat vulum ka ha teim,’ veni milei kilea munak nakur keihoen keke moumoni vuo narkurtei.
41002010	Ka veni ek vat kami mivalei kilea keke Natin Meatin kur keihoen keke vakulat tisaen ran meatin keil ten out netan, miheles koanik …” Ka Iesu viles, les meatin koa sakras vakaka vit,
41002011	“!Mea! Lum lat vulum ka kiha teim.”
41002012	Hatte tas, meatin enek ravul mea, lum lat vulin ka mea sital ran keil. Ka navong meatin keil koa amul en out enek alesi, amutimanin ka amasmas Ahi veni. Amul arun eni avit, “!Ekovei! !Rorles etai li tounah vamukok!”
41002013	Navong tamun, Iesu va ut en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli. Tali meatin keil umai akarahiti, ka kei mul visein keil.
41002014	Ka navong mul mual va, visu min meatin tai koa mul kur takis ran meatin keil en titi eim mon, isen Livae, natin Alveas. Ka Iesu vise vit, “!Amai! !Usil inau!” Ka kei lokovein umen onen mules ka musil Iesu.
41002015	Evus, en mendilah, Iesu ral meatin keil onen amul akanian en teim sen Livae. Meatin houlu ten takis ka meatin tisa keil, amul akanian ral min keil veni houlu en keil emun amusil kat Iesu.
41002016	Ka navong tei en Farasi keil koa avi tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis emun ales Iesu mul kanian ral min meatin keil ten takis ka meatin sav keil koa arendem tisa en keil, amutimanin. Avis meatin keil onen Iesu avit, “?Vensa kei mul kanian ral min vati meatin tisa keil koa amukok?”
41002017	Ka Iesu raengon selusien one ka vit kesi min keil vit, “Meatin keil koa ave tahos e rovattei avaha avales dokta. Ka koakeil akilea amesai, keil e vati avaha avalesi. Narmaitei mahise meatin keil koa amundemi avit moulien one mal tuai keke avamai avousil inau. Vuo, numai mahise meatin keil koa akilea mesaien ten tisaen mul en keil keke ihiles moulien one ka usil inau.”
41002018	En avong tai, meatin keil onen Sion Baptis ka Farasi keil amul uval ran anien. Meatin keil umai ka avis Iesu avit, “Meatin onen Sion ka Farasi keil uval ran anien, ka meatin onom keil armumontei. ?Vensa?”
41002019	Iesu vit kesi min keil en tatavolien tai vit, “Navong meatin tai vatetalihe, meatin keil koa umai ven mari ale enek, asi keil veni. Sakini, asakras avahal ran anien navong kei ro veah ral min keil.
41002020	Ka avong mul mai keke kei hevuol ran keil. En avong enek, keil ihal ran anien ven ilonge hetisa.”
41002021	Ka Iesu vit risi min keil en tatavolien tamun vit, “Meatin etai sakras vatili koe eisin matu en soke eisin hau. Veni navong akasi, hatte koa heite hau mai sim kati ka hetali vas koa heite matu, hesakini hemahoi hemariso suk.
41002022	En vati sakien enek, meatin etai sakras vatah uaen koa heite hau vaha en veite matu koa amumoni en hiliven sipsip veni keih tuai. Uaen enek hetatahou ka hesipas veite enek, hesakin uaen enek houele. Hesakini, uaen enek koa heite hau heha mok en veite koa heite hau veni kei memerau, kilea vatatahou.”
41002023	En Sabat tai, Iesu ral meatin onen keil amual uva aka vas ah tai ten uit ka amul alah utite, akokoa, ka amul akani.
41002024	Ka Farasi oteta keil alesi ka avis Iesu avit, “?Vensa varei meatin onom keil amum en Sabat? Umen enek rali koteh mengkatien onen Mosis.”
41002025	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “?Kami mirkileatei asa koa Deved ral min meatin onen keil amumoni navong amai kat keil, ka anien ae tovuol?
41002026	En avong enek, Abiatar vi asuv houlu onen pris keil, ka Deved va neim en Eim Votut ka visi ven veret koa vi votut, koa pris keil enges ten Eim Votut akilea avaani. Abiatar maeni, ka Deved kani ka riti mun min meatin onen keil akani.”
41002027	Iesu vit kilea min keil vit, “!Ahi mumon Sabat keke vakataun meatin keil! Kei romumontei meatin keil keke avakataun Sabat.
41002028	Sakini, Natin Meatin vi hetetamen imok mulin Sabat.”
41003001	Iesu va ris en eim tahihiseien, ka en out enek meatin tai hen kali.
41003002	Ka koakeil aro en out enek, amul alei mamah eni keke avalesi munak kei houmon hen meatin enek hetahos en Sabat veni alekat tounah koa akilea avasan selusien tisa vaha kati.
41003003	Ka Iesu viteni min meatin enek helomal en meten meatin keil.
41003004	Evus, vis keil vit, “?Mengkatien onen Mosis maen ir keke rovoumon sa en Sabat? ?Maeni keke rovakataun meatin, vuo rovapuruni? ?Maeni keke rovoutut moulien onen meatin tai, vuo rovou vini?” Ka keil aro raeng enges.
41003005	Navong Iesu lei rahit keil, tin kat keil. Ka longe tisa keke rendemien one koteh en tounah onen Ahi. Evus, Iesu viles ka viteni min meatin koa hen tisa vit, “!Kitea hem!” Ka navong mutea eni, hen mai ris tahos.
41003006	Ka navong Farasi keil ales asa koa mumoni, amea ran out enek, ka, hatte tas, uva alah ruai ral min Siu keil koa asuv kat hiasuvien onen asuv houlu Herod. Ka alekat vis sise tai koa akilea avouas Iesu vamat vaka ien.
41003007	Iesu ral min meatin onen keil uva en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli, ka meatin keil houlu amusili. Tei en meatin keil aka en provins ten out Kaleli, Sudea,
41003008	ka Itumea. Ka koakeil emun aka en taon ten out Serusalem, Taer ka Saedon. Ka teisav en keil aka en usite sav ten Oaisal Sodan. Meatin vasi keil enek umai ven Iesu, veni araengon asa koa kei mul mumoni.
41003009	Meatin keil avi houlu ramat, sakini Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit isak mesein vot veni keke meatin keil anating kattei kei.
41003010	Koakeil amesai amul amuting keil avatokol Iesu, veni kei mumon meatin houlu atahos eris.
41003011	Ka navong meatin keil koa ninin tisa mul en keil alesi, uva netan mini, ka amis kai avit, “!Keik, kovi Natin Ahi!”
41003012	Ka Iesu vul kat ninin tisa keil vit anahitentei min meatin keil anahit kei vi isei.
41003013	Evus, Iesu vina en vatihou nesa ka rie lat meatin koa kei en vati avousili, ka umai veni.
41003014	Ka kei rie lat meatin teindan elu (12) keke avousili avamai avahi eiloheh keil onen, avaha avahitehiten more longlongien min meatin keil,
41003015	ka avahile lat ninin tisa ran meatin keil vatal min keihoen ten isen.
41003016	Koanik vi isen eiloheh teindan elu (12) koa Iesu rie lat keil: Saemon (koa Iesu ling isen tamun vi Pita);
41003017	Tiemes ka tunali Sion koa Iesu vise keilu en ‘natin voulul’ (koa tata onealu Sepeti);
41003018	Andru, Pilip, Batolomiu, Matiu, Tomas, Tiemes (natin Alveas), Tatios, Saemon (koa vi lariken),
41003019	ka Sudas Eskariot koa hemae lat Iesu heha en hen meatin tisa keil.
41003020	Iesu rie lat eiloheh teindan elu (12) onen evus, uva en teim tai en taon ten out Kapaniam. Ekonek, meatin houlu umai avalesi, sakini avong tovuol keke Iesu ka meatin keil onen avaanian.
41003021	Navong mama onen ral min tunali keil akur longlongien usil asa koa Iesu mul mumoni ka mukave meatin keil amul aviteni keke mul mum vau, uva keke avaselus koe ka avahuli kati.
41003022	Tei en tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis aka en out Serusalem. Ka keil asan selusien va kat Iesu avit, “Belsepul koa vi asuv onen ninin tisa keil mul ien ka mul san keihoen mini keke vahile lat ninin tisa keil ran meatin keil.”
41003023	Sakini, Iesu vise Farasi keil umai veni ka selus min keil ka en tatavolien keil vit, “? Temat kilea vahile lat kei eris hemukave?
41003024	Munak meatin keil onen asuv houlu tai amul uvae min keil eris, keihoen onen asuv houlu enek sakras val vataveah.
41003025	Ka munak vatiamal tai mul vae ral min keil eris, isen vatiamal enek heha hevuol varei.
41003026	En vati sakien enek, munak Temat mul vile lat ninin tisa keil onen ka mul vae ral min keil eris, keihoen onen sakras val vataveah ka hevuol varei rani.
41003027	“Mahit kilea min kami vaka en tatavolien tai. Meatin sakras vaha en teim sen avkeih tai keke vahenan tounah keil onen navong avkeih koanek mul veah lei kokoe eni. Helamu, heha hepar kat avkeih enek. Hevus, meatin enek kilea vaha en teim sen ka valah vasin tounah keil onen.
41003028	“Anatin eli naviteni min kami, Ahi kilea voumon methos onen vatal min meatin keil koa amumon vati tisaen keil houlu, vuo aselus karen isen Ahi varei.
41003029	Ka methos onen Ahi sakras val en meatin koa mul selus karen Ninin Votut ka tounah koa kei mul mumoni. Sakien tisa enek heha kat usite onen ka mahien koa hekuri veni sakras vavus.”
41003030	Iesu viteni mukok veni Farasi keil aviteni keke kei mul mum ral min keihoen onen ninin tisa koa mul ien.
41003031	Mama onen Iesu ka tunali keil umai keke avalesi, ka amules hae. Asan selusien va neim keke Iesu vaha hae vales keitel.
41003032	En avong enek, meatin keil houlu aro rahit Iesu ka aviteni mini avit, “Lesi, mama onom ral min tumali keil aro hae, ka e vati avalesuk.”
41003033	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “?Isei vi mama onak? ?Isei vi tuak keil?”
41003034	Evus, lei rahit meatin keil enek ka viteni min keil vit, “Milesi. Koakeil enek avi mama onak ka tuak keil.
41003035	Koakeil amumon asa koa Ahi en vati avi mama onak ral min tuak ka ahinkuli keil.”
41004001	En avong sav tai, Iesu mul visein meatin onen keil en vali Mari Oai ten out Kaleli. Meatin keil houlu aso ruai rahiti, ka keil avi houlu vis avi houlu mok. Sakini, Iesu vut va en vot ka ario lati vita en oai, ka meatin keil aro enges ut.
41004002	Evus, Iesu ra usil tatavolien houlu keke vahisein meatin keil. Viteni vit,
41004003	“!Mihelong revi! En avong tai, meatin tai va nah vativin utite keil.
41004004	Navong va rivini, vahis umotmot en sise ka aman keil umai akan vasi.
41004005	Ka vahis umotmot en atan koa vilah, atan romaritetei. Ka keil aviteh kalah ven atan mahinhin enges.
41004006	Ka navong meteiai keih, amaleles ka umatmat ven lite keil arretalitei vatahos. Sakini, rovitei tuetin, amukou varei.
41004007	Vahis emun umotmot va en out koa oumunai tatisa mul ien ka amusar koe. Sakini, armoultei vatahos ka arsontei heite.
41004008	Ka havivi en utite keil enek umot en atan tetahos, ka amoul, ason heite: keil koa ason heite houlu neli, ka keil koa mun araleha, ka teisav en keil araleh vini keil en heite.”
41004009	Tatavolien vus, Iesu selus vit, “Munak ralingom mul, kitaengon asa namul naviteni.”
41004010	Navong Iesu ro sasen, teindan elu (12) onen ral min meatin sav keil uva avis aneite ten tatavolien enek.
41004011	Sakini, kei vit, “Ahi mul vothot en rendemien suai usil hiasuvien onen min kami enges. Ka meatin sav keil koa Ahi rovitei asuv houlu one, keil araengon selusien onen Ahi ka en tatavolien keil enges koa arlong kileatei.
41004012	Ahi vit usil keil vit, ‘Keil ilonge heha vio … ka irlong kileatei. Ilele heha vio … ka irlei kileatei. Veni munak armumontei vamukonek, keil ihiles moulien one ka inau nilele hetahos eris en keil.’” (Aes 6:9-10)
41004013	Ka Iesu viteni min keil, “?Mirlong kileatei tatavolien koanik? ?Hemukave miheilea tateisav esuk?
41004014	En tatavolien enek, utite keil koa meatin ten ah mul revin keil vi selusien onen Ahi.
41004015	Meatin keil koa asuval sise koa utite keil umot amul ien. Navong araengon selusien, hatte tas Temat mai ka kulati ran keil.
41004016	Keil koa asuval atan koa vilah. Navong araengon selusien onen Ahi, akuri mul en keil ka asi keil veni.
41004017	Ka veni lite keil ten demkatien one arretalitei vatahos, keil amulomal en demkatien one ten avong havivis. Ka navong sakvisien mai ven selusien enek, umot en demkatien one.
41004018	Meatin keil koa asuval atan koa oumunai tatisa mul ien. Araengon selusien onen Ahi,
41004019	ka amundemko usil tounah keil ten out netan ka envatien one mul en mani mulin selusien onen Ahi. Hesakini, selusien enek hersontei heite en moulien one.
41004020	Ka meatin keil koa mun asuval atan koa tetahos. Navong araengon selusien onen Ahi, akur kati mul en keil, ka selusien enek son heite houlu en moulien one. En moulien onen meatin keil koa heson heite houlu, en koa mun hetaleha, ka en teisav en keil hetaleh vini en heite.”
41004021	Iesu viten tatavolien tamun vit, “Meatin tovuol koa vanit laet onen, evus, ling suaini en pesin tai, vuo ling suaini en hehen avet tamatilien onen. !Vuo! Meatin keil arekein laet one nesa keke koakeil umai neim akilea avalei kilea titinien teni.
41004022	Anatinien koa mul suai, Ahi hekuri hemai en mesai. Ka selusien koa avit suai eni mulamu, ihitehiteni en meten meatin keil keke availea eni.
41004023	!Munak ralingomi mul, mihetaengon revi asa koa namul naviteni!”
41004024	Ka Iesu viteni mun min keil vit, “Mihetaengon revi asa koa naviteni min kami. Veni Ahi hesan ileilien teni min kami housil longkatien onami. Sakini, munak mihelong kati, hesan ileilien hemarite mok min kami.
41004025	Meatin koa kilea revi selusien onak, Ahi houmoni heilea revi mok, ka meatin koa rokilea revitei aneite teni, havivi koa mundemi vit kilea eni tuai, Ahi hekulati rani.”
41004026	Ka evus, Iesu viten risi vit, “Hiasuvien onen Ahi suval avong tai, meatin tai va revin utite keil en ah sen.
41004027	En vongien, kei matil ka en meneai, mules mual vasi out. Ka mukos, utite keil enek amules aviteh, alekat sise one avamoul, ka meatin enek rokileatei keke amoul mukave.
41004028	Atan enges, kei sasen mumon utite keil amoul. Anatin, keil avitehiteh, amumon vatte, ka ason heite.
41004029	Ka navong heite emen, meatin ten ah va musuhuti ka lahi va ris teim.”
41004030	Ka Iesu vit risi vit, “?Hiasuvien onen Ahi suval asa? ?Nihit kilea eni heka en tatavolien sa?
41004031	Kei suval uti avek koa mot vita en vatiai tai. Kei havivi mok en utiai vasi keil.
41004032	Ka navong moul mai mariso, mulin ai sav keil. Son angoite keil amariso ka atahos, ka aman keil umai amumon anu ome keil en nimal teni.”
41004033	Ka Iesu viten selusien onen Ahi en tatavolien keil enek, mal en asa keil availea avakuri.
41004034	Selus min keil en tatavolien enges. Ka navong kei ro ral min teindan elu (12) onen, kei vit lat aneite teni min keil.
41004035	En mendilah enek, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Rovaha en usi oai.”
41004036	Sakini, keil aling meatin sav keil amules, uvut uva en vot koa Iesu mul rondan ien, ka amu koteh oai ten out Kaleli uva. Ka meatin sav keil emun amusil Iesu en vot savsav keil one.
41004037	Ka navong amul uva, Iesu mul matil usae en oulung tai en valengei vot. Rovitei tuetin, amutimanin, eang takeih tai muhuh keih. Sakini, oai langlango ka mul rasil va neim en vot, vesesal keil avamarindu. Navong meatin keil onen ales asa koa mul kur out, ametau houlu ka uva asilasil en Iesu avit, “!Tiser, rovamat ke! ?Keik kormundemtei usil moulien orer?”
41004039	Ka Iesu mea ka selus keih min eang ka oai vit, “!Luhat kamil!” Hatte tas, lumuseh ka out vi tasioh.
41004040	Evus, viteni min meatin onen keil, “?Vensa mimetau? ?Demkatien onami tovuol veah?”
41004041	Ka keil amutimanin ka ametau houlu. Amul aviteni min keil eris avit, “?Isei keinek? Mukos eang ka oai, keilu mun lulong ren.”
41005001	Iesu ral min meatin onen keil amu koteh Mari Oai ten out Kaleli ka umai en out keil koa amul rahit meteimal ten out Kerasa.
41005002	Ka navong keil amea ran vot, meatin koa ninin tisa mul ien kistal ran out tatetahinien, mai ven keil.
41005003	Kei matil en valengeihat, en out koa aling teiai onen meatin koa mat mul ien. Meatin tovuol vahuli kati, vuo vapar kati en viau takeih.
41005004	Avong houlu apar kat hen ka alen en viau takeih, ka lises, kei rali kotehei. Meatin tovuol vavinvin vahuli kati.
41005005	Meneai ka vongien, kei mual en out tatetahinien ka hou keil koa amul vesesal, ka mul makul ka mul rei aven en ahat takan keil.
41005006	Navong meatin enek les Iesu soutin neli, muloh va veni ka retengeiril mini.
41005007	Ka viso vit, “?Iesu, Natin Ahi ten out nesa, asa kovit kovoumoni minau? !Kihat kati minau en isen Ahi keke konapuruntei inau!”
41005008	(Meatin enek viteni mukok ven Iesu viteni tuai min ninin tisa keke hemea rani.)
41005009	Sakini, Iesu visi vit, “?Isom isei?” Meatin enek vit risi mini vit, “Isomai ‘Houlu,’ ven komai houlu memusing kat meatin ekek.”
41005010	Kei peah Iesu mok vit nahile lattei ninin tisa keil anaha ran out keil koa vesesal en out enek.
41005011	Vesesales en out enek, vuas houlu amul akanian en usihou tai.
41005012	Sakini, ninin tisa keil apeah Iesu, “Kimaen komai meheha en vuas keil ekek.”
41005013	Hatte tas, Iesu vile lat keil amea ran meatin, uva en vuas keil. Sakini, vuas keil enek, vesesal taosen elu (2000) amuloh avita en veisil, ka uva en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli. Ka keil vasi amarindu, umatmat.
41005014	Ka meatin keil koa alei kat vuas ametau, ka amuloh avita en meteimal ka asan longlongien va emun en out sav. Sakini, meatin keil umai avit avahotin asa kur out.
41005015	Navong umai ven Iesu, ales meatin koa ninin tisa mul ien mulamu, kei mul rondan, musin tuai, ka rendemien onen mai tahos. Ka navong meatin keil koa aka en meteimal umai alesi, ulie metau.
41005016	Ka koakeil ales asa koa kur out usil meatin enek ka vuas keil, arun usili min meatin sav keil.
41005017	Sakini, meatin keil ten out enek apeah Iesu avit vamea ran out se.
41005018	Navong Iesu mul vut va en vot, meatin koa ninin tisa mea rani en vati keke vousili.
41005019	Ka Iesu romaentei. Ka kei viteni suk mini vit, “Kiha teim ven onom keil. Kihiten asa koa Ahi Asuv mumoni minuk ka mukave kur enmahisien enuk.”
41005020	Sakini, meatin enek va ka vasi out koa avise en Dekapolis, ka mul viten asa koa Iesu mumoni mini. Koakeil vasi araengoni, amutimanin eni.
41005021	Ka evus, Iesu ral min meatin keil onen uvut uva en vot, amu koteh Mari Oai ten out Kaleli eris. Ka navong Iesu mulomal en out ut, meatin keil houlu akarahiti.
41005022	Ka meatin tai mai veni, isen Saeros koa vi elda tai ten eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil en out enek. Navong les Iesu, mual veni ka retengeiril en meten.
41005023	Kei mul peah Iesu keke vakatauni vit, “Natukahin vesesal vamat. Ek vati li kovaling hem eni, vasakini valonge vatahos eris ka vamoul.”
41005024	Sakini, Iesu musili. Ka navong Iesu va, meatin keil houlu amul amusili ka amuting rahiti.
41005025	En vangi meatin keil enek, ahin tai mul koa mesaien onen mama keil muasi sua teindan elu (12), sakras vavus.
41005026	Ahin enek va les dokta keil houlu ka keil asakras avasak revi mesaien onen. Vul keil en mani vasi keil onen, ka rolongtei vatahos, mesaien enek mai houlu tamun.
41005027	Ahin enek raengon longlongien usil Iesu, sakini, mual katau en koakeil amusil Iesu keke vatokol eisin omon.
41005028	Veni en rendemien onen vit, “Vahit matokol eisin omon enges, malonge vatahos.”
41005029	Ka navong rokol eisin omon Iesu, hatte tas, mesaien onen vus rani. Ka kei long kilea keke aven mai ris tahos.
41005030	En hati avong enek, Iesu kilea varei keke keihoen mea rani. Sakini, viles les meatin keil ka vis keil vit, “?Isei rokol eisin omak?”
41005031	Meatin keil onen Iesu aviteni mini avit, “Kolesi keke meatin keil houlu amul amuting katuk. ?Sakini, vensa kovis isei rokol eisin omom?”
41005032	Ka avaseini, Iesu viles ka mul lekat isei rokoli.
41005033	Ahin enek kilea keke aven mai tahos, ka mai ven Iesu ka retengeiril en meten, tin maleilei houlu. Kei vit lat tunien usil mesaien onen min Iesu.
41005034	Iesu viteni mini vit, “Mama, kosas eke, demkatien onom sakinuk komai kolonge tahos ka mesaien onom evus ranuk. Kiha hetal min tomat onen Ahi.”
41005035	Navong Iesu mul semau selus, telmali vahis telka teim sen Saeros. Telviteni mini telvit, “Natmahin mat eli tuai. Konahistei mun Tiser enek vamai.”
41005036	Iesu raengon asa koa telviteni, ka avaseini, viteni min Saeros vit, “Konametautei, kikur demkatien hel enuk.”
41005037	Iesu kur Pita enges, ka lumali Tiemes ka Sion, ka romaentei meatin sav keil emun avousili.
41005038	Telva teim, ral min Saeros, ka telles meatin keil alango, amul amis ka amurang.
41005039	Evus, Iesu va neim ka viteni min keil mukok, “?Vensa mimul milango mukok ka mimurang? Titi atouli romattei, kei mul matil enges.”
41005040	Ka meatin keil amunge kati. Sakini, Iesu sila keil keke avaha hae. Kei kur tata onen atouli keilu mama, ral min meatin onen keitel, telva en out koa aling titi atouli mul ien.
41005041	Ka Iesu vuli kat hen atouli ka viteni mini en selusien oneatel ten Arameak vit, “!Talita kumi!” koa aneite teni vi “!Titi atouli mea!”
41005042	Hatte tas, atouli enek mea ka kaka. Sua onen teindan elu (12). Koakeil vasi en out enek, e von eni.
41005043	Ka Iesu vat kati min keitel, keke telnahitehitentei min meatin sav keil asa koa kei mumoni. Evus, viteni min tata ka mama onen titi atouli enek keke luhesan anien min atouli onealu.
41006001	Iesu mea ran out enek, ka va ris en meteimal onen en out Nasaret, ka teindan elu (12) onen amusili.
41006002	Ka en Sabat enek, Iesu mul viten selusien onen Ahi en eim tahihiseien. Meatin keil houlu aro en out enek, ka navong araengoni, amutimanin eni mok, ka amul avis keil avit, “?Kei kur hihiseien keil enek kekave? ?Ileilien keil onen kuri kave? Ka keihoen emun toumon merikel ien keil kuri kave?
41006003	?Rovitei meatin koa mul muti eim keinek? ?Titan Meri, ka tunali Tiemes, Iosev, Sudas ka Saemon? ?Rovitei ahinali keilu luro ekok? Kei vi tai en ir enges.” Sakini, keil alei sesein Iesu.
41006004	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Meatin vasi keil avouhou min provet tai onen Ahi, ka en meteimal kati onen ka teim kati onen, onen keil alei seseini varei.”
41006005	Ka ven meatin keil arkurtei demkatien en Iesu, kei sakras voumon merikel vahi houlu en keil. Ling hen en vahis koa amesai ka mumon keil enges alonge tahos ka amoul.
41006006	Iesu mutimanin houlu veni meatin kati keil onen arlingtei demkatien one eni. Ka evus, Iesu va en titi meteimal keil en out enek, mul visein meatin keil.
41006007	Ka vise ruain teindan elu (12) ka sila keil lualu avaha. Kei san keihoen min keil vasakin keil akilea avahile lat ninin tisa ran meatin keil.
41006008	Meng kat keil vit, “En ualien onami, minakurtei tounah natal kami, mihekur eisal enges. Minakurtei anien, vuo ateli, vuo mani.
41006009	Miheheas sandel enges ka minakurtei eisin tamun natal kami.”
41006010	Iesu viteni mun min keil vit, “Out koa akur revi kami eni, miheto en eim enek hetokol avong koa mihelokovein out enek.
41006011	Ka munak miheha en meteimal koa meatin keil arkur revitei kami vuo e rovattei avalong selusien onami, navong mihemea ran out enek, mihesahulin vulimeas ran alomi en mete. Koanek hehi selkatien min keil keke amul amum tisa en meten Ahi.”
41006012	Sakini, uva aviten selusien onen Ahi min meatin keil keke ihiles ran tisaen one.
41006013	Avile lat ninin tisa keil houlu ka asahula meatin keil koa amesai en oel ten olip ka asakin keil alonge tahos eris.
41006014	En avong enek, asuv houlu Herod Antipas raengon longlongien usil Iesu koa ka vasi out. Meatin tei keil avit, “Kei vi Sion Baptis koa moul eris ran matien. Ven koanek, kei kur keihoen keke voumon merikel.”
41006015	Keil en koa avit, “!Provet Ilaetsa keinek!” Teimun en keil avit, “Kei provet sav tai koa suval provet keil telamu.”
41006016	Navong asuv houlu Herod raengon selusien keil enek, rendemi vit, “!Kei vi Sion Baptis! !Inau nameng kati keke avata koteh vatin, ka moul eris ran matien!”
41006017	Herod kei varei san selusien keke avahuli kat Sion, avapar kati, ka avalingi en eim takeih. Asuv Herod mumoni mukonek ven Sion mules vit lat sakien tatisa onen veni kei kur ason tunali, Pilip, ka retalihe ral mini.
41006018	Ka Sion vit, “Rotahostei keke kokur ason tumali mai vi asom. !Sakien koanek rali koteh mengkatien onen Ahi varei!”
41006019	Selusien koa Sion viteni sakin ason Herod, Herodias, tin kat Sion mariso mok, en vati Sion vamat. Ka kei sakras voumoni ven Herod ring koe.
41006020	Herod kur revi Sion ka lingi en eim takeih keke meatin sav sakras vouasi. Mumoni mukonek ven vouhou min Sion ven kei kilea Sion vi more meatin ka meatin votut onen Ahi. Avaseini selusien onen Sion sakin Herod mundemko houlu, en vati vataengon selusien onen.
41006021	Ka en avong tai, ason Herod les ahho mai keke voumon Sion vamat. En avong enek, keil amumon ale ten ouh onen Asuv Herod, avong avasi. Avise hetetamen keil koa ten kavmen, asuv keil tavaeen, ka hetetamen keil emun ten provins ten out Kaleli umai.
41006022	Ka atouli onen ason Herod mai ka vol min keil. Vol tahos imok en meten asuv houlu Herod ka hetetamen keil vasi, sakini Herod viteni mini vit, “!Asa em vati kovakuri, inau nisani minuk!”
41006023	Herod mumon hatkatien takeih min atouli enek vit, “Naviteni anatin keke nisani minuk asa koa kovis inau eni. Nasakras maseseini.”
41006024	Sakini, atouli mea, va vis mama onen vit, “?Asa nihisi?” Mama onen viteni mini vit, “Kihis vatin Sion Baptis.”
41006025	Hatte tas, atouli muloh eris va ven Herod ka visi vit, “!Ek vati keke keik kovasani minau, kosa sek, vatin Sion en pelet tai!”
41006026	Koanek sakin asuv Herod en von ka longe tisa mok, ka sakras vasesein ren atouli veni kei viten hatkatien takeih en meten hetetamen keil.
41006027	Sakini, sila meatin tavaeen va en eim takeih, vakur Sion ka vata koteh vatin, ka vakuri vamai veni. Ka kei mumoni mukonek,
41006028	ling vatin Sion mul en pelet tai, ka kuri, sani min atouli. Ka atouli sani mun min mama onen.
41006029	Navong meatin keil onen Sion araengoni, uva avous teiai onen Sion ka arahini.
41006030	Meatin teindan elu (12) onen Iesu amuris ka ales Iesu, ka aviten tounah koa amumoni ka avihisei eni.
41006031	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Ires, rovaha neli en out sav tai, ka kami miheseh avong hehi havivi.” Kei viteni mukok veni meatin keil houlu umai ka uva, sakini, Iesu ka onen keil, avong tovuol avaanian.
41006032	Ario lat vot, ka keiles uva en out tai koa meatin keil atovuol ien.
41006033	Ka navong uva, meatin houlu koa aka en meteimal keil alei kilea keitel. Sakini, amuloh arokol out koa Iesu ka teindan elu (12) onen avamai ien.
41006034	Navong Iesu vut ran vot, les meatin keil houlu amul tuai ka kur enmahisien ven keil. Les keil asuval sipsip keil koa meatin tovuol keke valosil kat keil. Sakini, mul visein keil en tounah houlu.
41006035	Navong meteiai mul va netan, meatin keil onen umai ven Iesu ka avit, “Out mul vong ke, ka out enek vi out seh.
41006036	Kisila meatin keil ihaha, keke iha en titi meteimal keil vuo out sav keke avahul anien avaani.”
41006037	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Kami varei keke mihesan etai tounah keke iani.” Ka keil avit kesi avit, “!Ei! !Avaseini munak rokur mani koa vinvin en avong toumien handred elu (200), hervinvintei keke rovahul veret vahi an meatin keil ekek!”
41006038	Ka Iesu vis keil vit, “?Veret ame ehis? !Mihehotin visi!” Navong keil alesi aviteni mini avit, “Veret elim (5) ka mesau elu (2) enges.”
41006039	Iesu viteni min meatin teindan elu (12) onen vit ihiteni min meatin keil keke ilah ruai ka itondan en more out koa oumunai tetahos mul ien.
41006040	Sakini, ariti keil en vangi meatin keil koa vesesal hanumau etel (60) rokol hanumau elim (100) amul en talite tai, ka keil vasi arondan.
41006041	Evus, Iesu kur veret koa elim (5) ka mesau elu (2), lele vina nesa, ka san masmasien min Ahi veni. Evus, vul vahas veret ka sasani min teindan elu (12) onen, koa ariti min meatin keil. Ka mesau emun ariti min keil.
41006042	Meatin keil vasi akanian, ka vange vil revi.
41006043	Navong meatin teindan elu (12) onen Iesu uva avakur soke veret keil ka mesau, veiat teindan elu (12) vil mules.
41006044	Amo keil koa akanian en avong enek avi taosen elim (5000).
41006045	Akanian evus, Iesu viteni min teindan elu (12) onen keke uva en vot ka ilamu eni, iha en out Betsaeta en usi oai. Ka kei ro enges keke vasila meatin keil avahaha.
41006046	Navong mea ran keil, kei mual vina en vatihou keke vahis min Ahi.
41006047	Ka navong out mul vong, Iesu va en out ut. Les vot mul luhu en Mari Oai ten out Kaleli.
41006048	Ka teindan elu (12) onen avotini keih avahalis veni avisu en eang takeih. Ka en vongien, out romulantei mau, Iesu mai ven keil, mul mual en hoi oai, ka mul vali keil.
41006049	Ka navong alesi keke Iesu mul mual en hoi oai mukok, amis kai avit, “!Ei, ninin tai!”
41006050	Ka keil ametau houlu. Ka hatte tas, Iesu selus min keil vit, “!Mihekeih! Inau ngatin keinek. !Minametautei!”
41006051	Evus, Iesu vut va en vot ral min keil, ka eang va netan. Teindan elu (12) onen amutimanin houlu.
41006052	Keil arkilea revitei keihoen onen, avaseini ales asa koa Iesu mumoni navong san anien min meatin taosen elim (5000). Rendemien one koteh ka armundem kileatei aneite ten merikel enek.
41006053	Iesu ral min meatin keil onen amu koteh oai ka uva apar kat vot one en veien ten out Kenesaret.
41006054	Avong amea ran vot, hatte tas meatin keil alei kilea Iesu.
41006055	Sakini, meatin keil amuloh rahit out enek ka akur koakeil amesai koa amatil en suvon ome umai en out koa keil alonge keke Iesu mul ien.
41006056	En out vasi koa Iesu va en; meteimal keil, taon keil, vuo en sise emun; meatin keil alah koakeil amesai uva en out ten lahruaien. Keil apeah Iesu keke vatali lat keil ran mesaien one vuo vamaen keil avatokol kele eisin enges omon. Ka koakeil vasi arokol kele eisin omon amoul eris.
41007001	Farasi keil ral min tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis koa aka en out Serusalem, keil uva ven Iesu ka aka rahiti.
41007002	Keil alei kilea keke navong teindan elu (12) onen Iesu amul akanian, arkastei he vasuval sakien onen Siu keil.
41007003	(Farasi keil ral min Siu vasi keil amules amusil kat hihiseien keil onen avu keil telamu. Ihit avaanian, ikas he helamu en sise koa hemal ka heto, ka hevus, ianian esuk.
41007004	Ka navong umai en out tahulhulien, irkaniantei mau hetokol avong ikas he en oai, hemukonek, hesakini ito ris. Ka keil amusil tounah houlu usil sakien keil one telamu, suval sise koa amul akas veioai, sospen, ka tounah keil taanien one koa vi aean.)
41007005	Sakini, Farasi ka tiser keil ten mengkatien avis Iesu avit, “?Vensa meatin keil onom armusiltei hihiseien koa avu orer keil telamu asani min ir? Keil arkastei he en sise koa muto, ka mukos, akanian.”
41007006	Iesu vit risi min keil vit, “Kami mimutolas enges en hilivemi. Asa Ahi viteni usil kami mal, suval koa Aesea mutisi, ‘Meatin keil eke avouhou minau en selusien, ka tine mul soutin ranau.
41007007	Avaseini keil uva netan minau, ek rovattei mailea. Veni keil amul asan hihiseien keil koa aka ven meatin keil enges, ka aviteni keke inau varei navit keil usili.’ (Aes 29:13)
41007008	Miso sesein mengkatien onen Ahi mules, ka mimusil katiat hihiseien onen meatin enges.”
41007009	Ka Iesu sel kat keil vit, “Kami mivi meteisau vareis en sise koa mivaling mengkatien onen Ahi vales, vasakini mivousil kat hihiseien keil onamis.
41007010	Suval koa keke Mosis selus keih mini vit, ‘Mihehouhou min tata ka mama onami keil,’ (Eks 20:12) ka viten risi vit, ‘Munak etai hesili tata vuo mama onen, kei, uasi hemat.’ (Eks 21:17)
41007011	Ka kami, mivisein meatin keil keke akilea aviteni min tata ka mama one avahit, ‘Tounah keil onak koa nakilea makataun kamil eni, koanek naling koe tuai vi onen Ahi enges.’
41007012	Sakini, hihiseien enek mumon keil arkatauntei mun tata ka mama one keil.
41007013	Mukonek, hihiseien keil onami mul sakin selusien onen Ahi mai vi heisav enges. Ka tounah houlu mukonek mimumoni.”
41007014	Evus, Iesu vise meatin keil umai veni ka viteni min keil vit, “Mihetaengon inau, kami vasi miheilea asa mahiteni.
41007015	Tounah tovuol val hae en meatin koa kilea voumoni varmutotei. !Vuo, sakras! Tounah vasis koa mea ran tin meatin, kei enges kilea voumoni varmutotei.”
41007017	Navong lokovein meatin keil enek va neim, teindan elu (12) onen keil avisi keke vahit kilea asa koa kei viteni.
41007018	Sakini, Iesu viteni vit, “?Rendemien onami mun rokeihtei? ?Kami mirkileatei veah? Tounah tovuol koa mul hae vuo va neim en avemi koa kilea vasakinuk kovarmutotei.
41007019	Veni tounah enek rovatei en moulien onom, va en vangom enges, ka evus, mea ranuk eris.” (Usil selusien enek, Iesu vit kilea vit anien vasi keil tahos taanien.)
41007020	Ka viteni mun vit, “Tounah keil koa akistal ran moulien onom, keil enges akilea avasakinuk kovarmutotei en meten Ahi.
41007021	Veni rendemien tatisa keil koa aka en tinom mul sakinuk komumon tounah keil koa tisa: kokur sakien ten hoeasoen, kovena, komu vini meatin sav,
41007022	kokur ason meatin sav, kovi metenan, kopurun mesav keil, koluvos, kovasik, kovi elu, komusili meatin sav, kovutuk, ka komumon sakien koa vi varu enges.
41007023	Anatin, tounah keil vasi enek aka en moulien onen meatin tai, ka keil varei asakin meatin mai romutotei en meten Ahi.”
41007024	Evus, Iesu mea ran out enek, ka va vesesal en meteimal ten out Taer. Va en eim tai ka en rovattei keke meatin etai vailea out koa kei mul ien. Ka sakras vato suai.
41007025	En avong enek, ahin tai koa ninin tisa mul en natnahin raengoni keke Iesu mai. Sakini, va veni ka retengeiril en meten.
41007026	Ahin enek rovitei Siu tai, avasi en out Siria-Fonisia. Ka kei mai peah Iesu keke vahile lat ninin tisa ran natnahin.
41007027	Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “Numai keke malei kat titiali onak keil koa avi Siu. Veni romaltei keke nikulat anien an titiali keil onak ka masoni vaha min huli keil.”
41007028	Ahin enek viteni mini vit, “Ka asuv, huli keil koa amul rahit titiali keil akilea avaan soke anien koa titiali keil akan rani.”
41007029	Sakini, Iesu viteni mini vit, “Ven tounah koa koviteni, kiha ris teim, kihotini keke ninin tisa mea ran natmahin tuai.”
41007030	Ka navong ahin enek va ris teim, lesi keke natnahin mul tahos en avet, ka ninin tisa va rani.
41007031	Evus, Iesu lokovein meatin keil ten out Taer, ka ka pas out Saedon ka out Dekapolis. Kei ral min meatin keil onen uva vio … arokol Mari Oai ten out Kaleli.
41007032	En out enek, meatin keil koa akur meatin tai koa ralingen vonhon ka vi ameng mai veni ka apeah Iesu valing hen eni.
41007033	Ka Iesu mulis mea ran vangi meatin keil. Evus, ling kalihen en ralingen meatin enek, ka mutiv ka rokol men.
41007034	Evus, Iesu seipat vina nesa, leh eang, ka viteni min meatin enek vit, “!Epapata!” (koa viteni en selusien onen ten Arameak vit, ‘!Metal!’).
41007035	Hatte tas, ralingen meatin enek metal ka kilea valong tounah keil. Ka men meatin enek emun mai tahos ka kilea vaselus revi.
41007036	Ka evus, Iesu vit koe meatin keil keke anahitentei min meatin etai. Avaseini, keil uva amang vas onge usili.
41007037	Ka koakeil araengon tounah enek amutimanin eni avit, “Tounah vasi koa kei mumoni tahos. Kei mumon koakeil ralinge vonhon, akilea avalong tounah; ka koakeil avi ameng, akilea avaselus.”
41008001	En avong sav eris, meatin keil houlu amusil Iesu ka umai en out tas. Ka navong anien ae vus, Iesu vise meatin teindan elu (12) onen umai veni ka viteni min keil vit,
41008002	“Ek mahis meatin keil ekek veni keil aro ral minau en avong etel (3) tuai, ka tounah tovuol avaanian.
41008003	Munak nisila keil iha ris en teim se ka irkaniantei, ave hememerau ka mete hemalikelik en sise, veni keil koa aka soutin.”
41008004	Ka teindan elu (12) onen avisi avit, “Romul en out volvol. ?Rokilea rovahotin anien en out kave koa vinvin rovasani min meatin keil ekek?”
41008005	Iesu vis keil vit, “?Veret ehis mikur kati?” Keil avit risi mini avit, “Veret oulu (7) enges.”
41008006	Evus, Iesu viteni min meatin keil vit avatondan. Kur veret, san masmasien min Ahi, ka vul vahasi. Evus, sasani min meatin teindan elu (12) onen vit avatiti min meatin keil, ka amumoni.
41008007	Ka mesau havivis akur kati. Iesu san masmasien min Ahi ven mesau, ka viteni min onen keil keke avatiti min meatin keil.
41008008	Meatin vasi keil akanian vinvin, vange vil. Evus, meatin teindan elu (12) onen akur mari veiat oulu (7) ka alah revi soke anien koa mules.
41008009	Meatin taosen ehat (4000) akanian en avong enek. Akanian evus, Iesu sila keil avaha ris en teim se.
41008010	Evus, Iesu vut va en vot ral min teindan elu (12) onen ka uva amu koteh Mari Oai ten out Kaleli, uva en out sav koa avise en ‘Dalmanuta.’
41008011	Farasi keil umai ven Iesu ka amul amusel mini. Keil e vati avahotin anatinien usili. Sakini, avisi keke voumon etai merikel vatal min keihoen ten out nesa avalesi.
41008012	Navong keil avisi mukok, Iesu longe tisa ka viteni min keil vit, “?Vensa meatin keil ten avong kosa avis etai merikel keke avalesi? !Ka vuo, nirmumon etai tounah ilesi vasakin keil avakur anatinien enau vaka ien!”
41008013	Sakini, Iesu lokovein keil, vut va en vot ral min meatin keil onen, ka uva en usi oai.
41008014	Navong keil uvut en vot, meatin teindan elu (12) onen arendem kilea keke e vobongeni avakur kat veret vavinvin en keil, akuri heite tas.
41008015	Ka navong amul veah en vot, Iesu sel kat keil vit, “Mihelei kat kami, mihelele revi en is onen Farasi keil ral min is onen Asuv Herod.”
41008016	Koanik sakin keil amul aselus min keil eris aviteni avit, “Kei viteni mukok veni rorkurtei veret vatal min ir.”
41008017	Ka Iesu mundem kilea asa koa amul avit usili. Sakini, vis keil vit, “?Vensa mimul miselus usil veret ar koa tovuol? ?!Mireingeingeni veah!? ?Anatin keke rendemien onami koteh veah?
41008018	Metomi mul, ka mirlei kileatei tounah. Ralingomi mul, ka mirlong kileatei tounah? ?Emi vobongen
41008019	avong koa navul vahas veret elim keke nasani min meatin taosen elim (5000)? ?Kami misien veiat ehis koa avilelau en soke anien keil?” Keil avit risi avit, “Veiat teindan elu (12) vil mules.”
41008020	“?Ka navong navul vahas veret oulu (7) min meatin taosen ehat (4000), misien veiat ehis koa avilelau en anien koa mules?” Keil avit, “Veiat oulu (7) vil mules.”
41008021	Ka vis keil, “?Mukonek, vensa varei kami mirkileatei veah aneite ten tounah keil enek?”
41008022	Navong uva en out Betsaeta, meatin keil akur metovar tai mai ven Iesu ka apeahi keke vatokoli.
41008023	Iesu vuli kat meatin enek ka mulamuni lumea ran meteimal. Evus, mutiv kat meten ka ling hen mul ien ka visi vit, “?Mukave, kokilea kovales etai tounah?”
41008024	Ka meatin enek lele rahiti ka viteni vit, “Nales meatin keil asuval vatiai keil koa amul akaikai.”
41008025	Sakini, Iesu ling ris hen mul en meten. Evus, meatin enek lele va ka lei kilea keke meten mai tahos, lei kilea tounah vasi.
41008026	Evus, Iesu vit koe vit, “Konahatei ris en mari meteimal, ka kika mal varei kiha teim.”
41008027	Evus, Iesu ka onen keil uva en meteimal keil koa amul vesesal en out Sesaria-Pilipae. Ka navong amul semau en sise, vis keil vit, “?Meatin keil aviteni avit inau navi meatin sei?”
41008028	Keil avit kesi avit, “Meatin koa avit keik kovi Sion Baptis. Ka meatin koa mun avit keik kovi provet Ilaetsa. Ka keil koa mun avit keik kovi tai en provet keil telamu.”
41008029	Ka vis ris keil vit, “?Mukave en kami? ?Mimundemi mivit inau navi isei?” Ka Pita mea ka vit, “Keik kovi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati.”
41008030	Ka Iesu vit koe keil keke anahitentei min meatin keil keke kei vi Mesaea.
41008031	En avong enek, Iesu vit leini min meatin teindan elu (12) onen vit, “Natin Meatin hekur mahien imok hehi houlu, ka meatin houlu iseseini: elda keil, asuv keil onen pris keil, ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis. Keil u vini. Evus, en avong etel, hemoul eris ran matien.”
41008032	Kei vit vasin tounah min keil. Ka Pita kur seheni havivi, ka vul kati keke nahitentei mun namukonek.
41008033	Ka Iesu viles, lei rahit meatin keil onen, ka selus keih min Pita vit, “! Temat, kiha ranau! !Rendemien onom musil rendemien onen meatin keil ten out netan, ka romusiltei rendemien onen Ahi!”
41008034	Evus, Iesu vise meatin keil ral min teindan elu (12) onen umai vituai veni ka vit, “Munak keik tai em vati kovousil inau, kisesein moulien onom, kihous aiveave onom, ka kusil inau.
41008035	Veni munak kihuli kat moulien onom, hevuol ranuk. Ka munak kimaen moulien onom hevuol venau ka ven more longlongien onen Ahi, kikur moulien koa vi anatin.
41008036	?Munak kokur tounah vasi ten out netan, ka moulien onom hevuol, koanek tahos enuk? !Vuo!
41008037	Tounah tovuol kovasani keke kovakur ris moulien onom koa sakras vavus.
41008038	Meatin keil ten avong kosa avilelau en tisaen ka amum tisa houlu ral min tounah ten out netan. Ka munak kimemou enau ka hihiseien keil onak, Natin Meatin emun hememou enuk navong hemai ris hetal min angelo keil onen ka hetal min muohien koa Tamen hesani mini.”
41009001	Ka mul selus vit, “Naviteni anatin eli, tei en kami koa miro ekok, irmattei hetokol avong koa keil iles hiasuvien onen Ahi hemai hetal min keihoen.”
41009002	Katau, avong ahetai (6) muli, Iesu kur Pita, Tiemes, ka Sion ka mulamun keitel, telvina en mari vatihou tai, veni keitel enges telvato ien. Navong telro ien, tellele telles nan Iesu viles,
41009003	ka eisin omon viles mai muoh vis muoh, ritin vareis. Meatin tovuol vakaskas vamukonek.
41009004	Evus, telmali telles Ilaetsa ka Mosis lumul luselus ral Iesu.
41009005	Ka Pita selus ravobong vit, “Tiser, tahos imok keke komeitel metmul ekok. Metheovav en votevav hetel: tai onom, tai onen Mosis, ka tai onen Ilaetsa.”
41009006	Kei ral tunali keilu telmetau houlu, sakini Pita reingeingen tounah koa mul viteni.
41009007	Evus, mahmah tai kistal ka mutaluh koe keitel, ka tellong rea tai koa vit, “Koanik vi Natkuli kati tas varei keisom, ka envatien onak mul ien. !Mithelong kat ren!”
41009008	Tellele konakon karahit keitel ka telroles etai mun meatin, Iesu enges ro ral min keitel.
41009009	Navong telmita ris netan, Iesu vit koe keitel vit, “Mitnahitehitentei tounah koa mitlesi min meatin etai hetokol avong koa Natin Meatin hemoul eris ran matien.”
41009010	Tellong kat ren, ka en keitel enges telmul telselus usil aneite ten selusien onen navong vit, ‘hemoul eris ran matien.’
41009011	Ka telvis Iesu telvit, “?Vensa tiser keil ten mengkatien avit Ilaetsa hemai helamu en Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati?”
41009012	Ka Iesu vit kilea min keil vit, “Anatin, Ilaetsa hemai ekok helamu vasak mesein tounah vasi ven amaien onen Mesaea. Ka naviteni min kamitel, Ilaetsa mai tuai, ka meatin keil amum tisa mini suval koa e vati, suval asa koa Tus Votut viteni. En sise enek Natin Meatin helong mahien ka meatin keil iseseini suval asa koa Tus Votut viteni.”
41009014	Navong Iesu ral min Pita, Tiemes ka Sion telmita ris ven meatin sav keil onen Iesu, telles meatin keil houlu akarahit keil, ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis amul amusel ral min keil.
41009015	Navong meatin keil ales Iesu kistal, amutimanin, ka amuloh uva ka akur revi.
41009016	Ka Iesu vis meatin onen keil vit, “?Mimul mimusel ral min keil en asa?”
41009017	Tai en vangi meatin keil vit, “Tiser, nakur natkuli mai minuk veni ninin tisa tai mul ien, sakini, sakras vaselus.
41009018	Navong ninin enek muasi, kuvini va netan, ka sakini, si kokohin mai, lohon katiloh, ka aven vasi keih. Navis meatin onom keil avahile lati, ka keil asakras.”
41009019	Iesu viteni min keil vit, “!Ekovei! Meatin keil ten avong kosa, demkatien one tovuol vareis. ?Nito hetal min kami avong hehis? ?Avong hehis nilei kat kami enges? Alkur ehon enek vamai minau.”
41009020	Sakini, akur ehon enek va min Iesu. Ka navong ninin tisa enek lesi, sakin ehon enek maleilei, mot va netan ka reitei, ka si kokohin mue ran ongon.
41009021	Iesu vis tata onen ehon vit, “?Avong ehis, keke kei mukok?” Vit risi mini vit, “Avong etin vi ehon.
41009022	Avong houlu ninin tisa enek vit vou vini, suval soni va en ahang ka en oai. ?Em hemahis komal eli ka kikatauni munak kokilea kovoumoni?”
41009023	Ka Iesu viteni vit, “?Vensa kovit, ‘munak kokilea kovoumoni?’ Meatin kilea voumon tounah vasi munak demkatien onen mul.”
41009024	Hatte tas, tamen peahi vit, “Nakur demkatien, ka rovinvintei. !Kataunau makur tei ris!”
41009025	Ka navong Iesu lei kilea keke meatin keil amuloh umai ven keil, viteni min ninin tisa vit, “Naviteni minuk, ninin ten ameng ka raling vonhon, kimea ran ehon ekek ka kirmaitei mun varei eni.”
41009026	Ninin enek mis kai, maleilei keih, ka mea rani. Ka navong lokoveini, ehon enek rokaikaitei mun suval mat varei. Sakini, meatin tei keil avit, “!Ei, kei mat tuai!”
41009027	Ka Iesu vuli kat hen ehon ka rali lati mulomal.
41009028	Katau suk, navong Iesu va en teim tai ral min onen keil, keil avis lelau eni avit, “?Komai misakras mevahile lat ninin tisa enek vensa?”
41009029	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Ahi mul san keihoen keke avahile lat vati ninin tisa enek vaka en sise ten hisien enges.”
41009030	Iesu ral min teindan elu (12) onen amea ran out enek, amual uva en out sav keil en provins ten out Kaleli veni Iesu en rovattei meatin keil availea out kave kei ro ien.
41009031	Iesu mumoni mukonek keke kilea vahisein meatin keil onen. Kei viteni mukok vit, “Meatin tai hesa lat inau, Natin Meatin, niha en hen meatin keil ten out netan koa u vini nau. Ka, en avong etel teni, inau nimoul eris ran matien.”
41009032	Ka keil areingeingen aneite ten hihiseien enek, ka ametau keke avahisi eni.
41009033	Iesu ral meatin keil onen umai en meteimal ten out Kapaniam ka uva ris teim. Ka Iesu vis keil vit, “?Asa keke mimul mimusel eni en sise?”
41009034	Ka keil aro raeng veni keke en sise amul arun kutut ven isei vi hetetamen imok en keil.
41009035	Sakini, Iesu rondan, vise ruain teindan elu (12), ka viteni min keil vit, “Isei keke en vati val nesa, heling kei heha netan. Mukonek, hehi meatin toumien onen meatin vasi keil.”
41009036	Evus, Iesu kur titiali tai ka lingi mulomal luhu en keil. Kei kav kati ka viteni min keil vit,
41009037	“Meatin koa hekur revi titiali koa mukok en isok, suval koa mul kur revi nau. Ka navong kur revi inau, rovitei inau enges, suval koa kei kur revi kei koa sila inau.”
41009038	Ka Sion Sepeti viteni min Iesu vit, “Tiser, komai meles meatin tai mul vile lat ninin tisa keil en isom, ka meviteni mini keke hehati, veni kei rovitei tai en ir.”
41009039	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “!Minahitentei mini nahati! Veni munak meatin etai mumon merikel tai en isok, sakras vamea ka vaselus karenau.
41009040	Ven meatin koa rovitei vativieh orer, kei vi tai en ir.
41009041	Anatin naviteni li min kami, meatin etai koa hesan oai enges min kami ven isok, kei hekur heite teni.
41009042	“Ka en usite sav, munak meatin etai hesakin meatin tai koa musil kat inau suval titiali keke hemot en tisaen, hetahos imok min meatin enek keke isar kat mari ahat en hiren ka isoni hemarindu en anev ten atas.
41009043	En vati rendemien enek, munak tai en kami, hen sakin kei mot en tisaen, heta kotehei. Hetahos imok mini keke hen tai hevuol ka kei hekur more moulien koa sakras vavus. Hetisa mini munak hen elu mules, ka heha en out onen temat keil, en out koa ahang teni sakras vavus.
41009045	Ka munak meatin tai alen sakini mot en tisaen, heta kotehei. Hetahos imok mini keke alen tai hevuol ka kei hekur more moulien. Hetisa mini munak alen lou mules, ka ison meatin enek heha en ahang onen temat keil.
41009047	Ka munak tai meten sakin meatin enek mumon tisaen, hekis lati. Hetahos imok mini keke meten tai hevuol ka kei hekur more moulien. Hetisa munak meten elu lumules, ka ison meatin enek en ahang onen temat keil.
41009048	Heha en out koa asilat keil koa asakras avamat iani, ka ahang koa heani sakras vavus.
41009049	“Ahi mul maen ir rovisu en avong takeih keil keke vasakin ir rovatolas en meten suval koa sol ka ahang mul sakin sanien votut tai mai mutolas.
41009050	“Sol tahos. ?Ka munak kasien teni vuol rani, umon sa keke avaling ris tahosien teni? !Asakras! Sakini, tahos keke sakien onami hesuval sol koa mul sakin lahruaien onami mai tahos imok ka miro vituai en tomat.”
41010001	Navong Iesu selus min meatin keil onen evus, amea ran out enek, amu koteh Oaisal Sodan, ka uva en provins ten out Sudea. Meatin houlu umai veni ka Iesu visein keil suval koa lises mul mumoni.
41010002	Farasi keil koa umai veni avit avasak visi. Sakini, avisi avit, “?Hit visi min komai, mengkatien orer maen meatin hetasil ran ahin onen?”
41010003	Sakini, Iesu vis keil vit, “?Mengkatien kave koa Mosis sani min kami?”
41010004	Keil aviteni mukok avit, “Mosis maeni keke meatin tai helokovein ahin onen vit, ‘Meatin koa en vati valokovein ahin onen, hetis Setifiket ten Tasilien ka hesani mini. Hevus, hesila ahin onen heha.’” (Dut 24:1)
41010005	Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Mosis mutis mengkatien koanek veni vatumi keih ramat.
41010006	Ka sakien koanik tovuol en avong mulamu, navong Ahi mum rohtoh en tounah vasi keil ten out netan. Rolonge keke ‘Ahi mumon meatin tai vi meahos ka tamun mumoni vi ahin.’ (Sen 1:27)
41010007	Viteni mun vit, ‘Ven koanek, meahos hemea ran tata ka mama onen, ka heapil hetal min ahin onen,
41010008	ka keilu luhemai luhetas.’ (Sen 2:24) Sakini, lurvitei mun elu, lutas sesuk.
41010009	Sakini, asa koa Ahi kapil vituaini, meatin noumontei keilu lunatasil eris.”
41010010	Navong amuris uva teim, teindan elu (12) onen avisi en tounah enek.
41010011	Kei vit kesi min keil vit, “Meatin koa ling ahin onen ka retalihe ral min ahin sav, kei mumon sakien ten hoeasoen vakat ahin onen koa mulamu.
41010012	En sise enek, ahin koa ling meatin onen ka retalihe ral min meatin sav, kei mun mul mumon sakien ten hoeasoen.”
41010013	Katau en avong enek, meatin keil alah titiali keil umai ven Iesu keke vatokol kat keil, ka meatin onen keil avul kat keil.
41010014	Navong Iesu les tounah enek, kei kalialin vatin ka longe tin tisa, ka viteni min meatin onen keil vit, “Almaen titiali keil avamai venau, ka minating koetei keil, veni hiasuvien onen Ahi hel en koakeil vatinek.
41010015	Naviteni min kami keke meatin koa sakras vakur revi hiasuvien onen Ahi hesuval titiali keil ekek, hiasuvien onen sakras val en kei.”
41010016	Evus, kav kat titiali keil, ling hen mul en keil ka san tokolkatien min keil vasi, tai vis ka tamun.
41010017	Navong Iesu mul musil sise onen keke vaha, meatin tai muloh veni, retengeiril en meten ka visi vit, “?Tiser tetahos, numon sa keke nikur moulien ten lisenges?”
41010018	Iesu visi vit, “?Vensa kovise inau kovit natahos? Meatin tovuol vatahos, Ahi enges tahos.
41010019	Keik kokilea asa koa mengkatien keil aviteni, ‘Minouastei meatin namat. Minakurtei ahin vuo meatin onen hanu sav. Minahenantei tounah onen meatin sav. Minoumontei luvosien naha kat isen meatin sav. Minakurtei mani en sise taluvosien. Mihehouhou min tata ka mama onami keil.’” (Eks 20:12-16)
41010020	Meatin enek vit, “Tiser, navong semau keke navi titi ehon tai, nalong kat mengkatien keil enek.”
41010021	Iesu lesi ka envatien onen mul ien ka vit, “Tounah tas kormumontei veah. Kiha mau, kisalem en tounah vasi keil onom, ka kisan mani teni min koakeil tounah one tovuol. Hesakini tounah onom hehi houlu en out nesa. Evus, kimai, kusil nau.”
41010022	Ka navong meatin enek long selusien onen, en von ka nan tisa eni. Mual va rani ka longe tisa veni tounah onen houlu.
41010023	Iesu lei rahit meatin onen keil ka viteni min keil vit, “Meatin keil koa tounah one houlu, keih ramat keke hiasuvien onen Ahi val en moulien one.”
41010024	Meatin onen keil amutimanin en selusien onen, ka Iesu vit risi vit, “Onak keil, keih ramat keke hiasuvien onen Ahi val en moulien onen meatin etai.
41010025	Mari kamel tai sakras vakirisil en meten nidil. En rendemien enek, meatin emun koa tounah onen houlu, sakras vales hiasuvien onen Ahi val en moulien onen.”
41010026	Ven selusien enek, meatin onen Iesu keil amutimanin houlu, ka avis keil avit, “?Isei suk kilea vakur moulien?”
41010027	Ka Iesu lei rahit keil ka vit, “!Keinek! Meatin sakras voumoni, ka Ahi enges kilea vasan moulien hau. Tounah vasi maes ven Ahi.”
41010028	Ka Pita selus vit, “Komai, melokovein tounah vasi keil onomai keke mevousiluk.”
41010029	Sakini, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Anatin, naviteni min kami, koakeil alokovein teim se, vuo tue keil, vuo ahine keil, vuo mama, vuo tata, vuo titiali, vuo ah se keil venau ka ven longlongien hos;
