41010030	keil ikur heite teni hehi houlu vis hehi houlu mok en avong kosa. Ikur eim keil, tue keil, ahine keil, mama keil, titiali keil, ka ah se keil. Ka en usite sav, ikur sakvisien keil emun. Ka en keite ten tounah vasi, keil ikur moulien koa sakras vavus.
41010031	Ka meatin houlu koa avi hetetamen keil kosa, keil imai ihi heisav enges. Ka meatin houlu koa avi meatin kuren keil kosa, keil imai ihi hetetamen keil esuk.”
41010032	Avong vahis muli va, ka Iesu ral meatin keil onen arokol sise koa uva en taon ten out Serusalem. Ka Iesu mual va mulamu en keil. Navong meatin keil onen alesi, amutimanin houlu. Ka meatin savsav keil koa amusil keil ametau houlu. Ka navong amul en sise, Iesu kur meatin teindan elu (12) onen uva seh, ka vit luvati min keil asa koa hekistal mini.
41010033	Viteni min keil vit, “?Milesi? Romul rovahina Serusalem. Ka en out enek, meatin tai hemae lat inau, Natin Meatin, niha en hen asuv keil onen pris keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis. Hevus, keil isa lat moulien onak heha en hen koakeil arvitei Siu.
41010034	Keil umon tohtohien heha kat inau, itiv kat inau, itah inau en viau, ka u vini nau. Ka navong avong hetel teni heli, nimoul eris ran matien.”
41010035	Evus, Tiemes keilu Sion, Natin Sepeti keilu, lumai ven Iesu ka luvisi luvit, “Tiser, emal vat tounah tai kovoumoni min komal.”
41010036	Iesu vis keilu vit, “?Asa varei?”
41010037	Ka luvit kesi mini luvit, “Navong kihi asuv houlu ka kilosil kat out vasi keil ral muohien ten hiasuvien onom, emal vati kovamaen komal melvatondan vatal minuk, tai en usite matu ka tai en usite meil onom.”
41010038	Ka Iesu viteni min keilu vit, “Milreingeingen asa koa milmul milvisi. ?Mukave, milkilea milvakur mahien keil vasuval koa inau nikuri? ?Milkilea milvahisu en vati sakvisien keil koa hemai vasuval koa inau nihisu eni?”
41010039	Luvit, “!Melkilea!” Sakini, Iesu viteni min keilu vit, “Anatin, milhekur mahien ka sakpurunien keil hesuval koa inau nikuri.
41010040	Ka avaseini, nasakras mahiten isei hetondan en usivek matu ka usivek meil. Ahi nges kilea hesan out enek min keil koa kei vit valingi.”
41010041	Ka navong tateisav keil along tounah enek, avuroh kat Tiemes keilu Sion.
41010042	Sakini, Iesu vise ruain keil vasi umai veni ka vit, “Mikilea en sakien onen hetetamen keil koa alosil kat meatin sav keil. Keil amumon tounah keih ramat min keil, vasakini keil availea keke moulien one mules en he. Ka mari meatin keil emun amumon vatie en keihoen one.
41010043	Ka sakien one hervitei sakien onami. Ka munak kami tai en vati vahi avat onami, kei hemai hesuval meatin toumien onami.
41010044	Ka munak tai en kami en vati vamai valamu en kami, kei hemai hehi meatin toumien onen meatin vasi keil.
41010045	Veni Natin Meatin romaitei keke meatin keil avakatauni. Vuo, kei mai vakataun meatin vasi, ka vasan moulien onen vahul lat keil ran keihoen ten tisaen.”
41010046	Navong Iesu ral meatin keil onen ka vangi meatin keil emun amusil sise avina en out Serusalem, alohlin out Seriko. En out enek, metovar tai mul rondan en vali sise, isen Batimeas, natin Timeas. Kei mul viram en meatin keil ven mani.
41010047	Navong kei raengoni keke Iesu ten out Nasaret mul mai, kei visohiso vit, “!Iesu, Natin asuv houlu Deved! !Em hemahis inau li!”
41010048	Meatin keil houlu avit koe avit vato raeng. Ka kei visohiso keih tamun vit, “!Natin asuv houlu Deved, em hemahis inau li!”
41010049	Sakini, Iesu vati ka vit, “!Alvise vamai!” Ka keil avise metovar avit, “Kisik! Mea, kei mul visok.”
41010050	Sakini, kei ling kaliko koa mutaluh koe eni mules, ravul mea, ka va ven Iesu.
41010051	Iesu visi vit, “?Em vati keke numon sa minuk?” Ka metovar viteni mini vit, “Tiser, ek vati malele eris.”
41010052	Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “Demkatien onom sakinuk kotahos eris. Kiha ris teim.” Hatte tas, kei kilea valele, ka musil Iesu en sise onen luva.
41011001	Navong Iesu ka onen keil umai vesesal en out Serusalem, keil akistal en meteimal ten out Betfas vesesal en Hou Nei Olip. En out enek, Iesu sila meatin elu onen
41011002	ka viteni min keilu vit, “Milheha en meteimal koa keisom. Navong milhekistal en out enek, milheles titan dongki tai asar kati mul en out enek koa meatin tovuol veah vatondan en eisilin. Milheluvati ka milhelehei hemai ekok.
41011003	Ka munak meatin etai hehis kamil vensa milmumon tounah enek, milhehiteni keke asuv en vati ka hervitei tuetin, hesan risi hemai.”
41011004	Sakini, luva lules titan dongki enek en vali sise, asar kati vesesal en voiteh ten eim tai. Navong lumul luluvati,
41011005	meatin keil koa amul en out enek avis keilu avit, “?Vensa milluvat titi dongki keisom?”
41011006	Luvit kesi min keil suval koa Iesu viteni min keilu, ka alokovein keilu luva.
41011007	Ka lukur titi dongki luva ven Iesu, lukuvin eisin onealu vina en eisilin titi dongki ka Iesu rondan eni.
41011008	Navong Iesu mul mual en dongki, meatin keil houlu amul asak mesein sise onen keke voual ien. Keil koa amul avuen eisin one ka teisav amusah oumeil en vali sise ka aling revi en sise onen.
41011009	Meatin keil koa amul amulamu ka koakeil akatau amul avisohiso avit, “!Rehehati lat isen Ahi! Tokolkatien hel en kei koa mai en isen Iahova! (Sam 118:25-26)
41011010	!Ahi Asuv hetokol kat kei koa mul mai keke valosil kat ir suval asuv houlu Deved telamu! !Rehehati lat isen Ahi koa mul en out nesa!”
41011011	Iesu kistal Serusalem ka va en Eim Votut. Lele karahit, lei vasi en tounah keil. Ka veni meteiai mul vita netan, kei muris va en meteimal ten out Betani ral min meatin teindan elu (12) onen keil ka amatil ien.
41011012	Out mulan, navong aka ris Betani, Iesu raengoni keke amai kati.
41011013	Les vati fik tai mul keiva neli koa oute houlu. Navong va vesesal veni keke valei visi munak heite mul ien, votini keke heite tovuol, les outes veni rovitei avong kati teni vatekao.
41011014	Sakini, Iesu viteni min vati fik enek vit, “!Meatin hetovuol emun hean etai heiai eris ranuk!” Ka meatin keil onen along selusien onen.
41011015	Navong akistal en out Serusalem, Iesu va en Eim Votut ka mul likat rasilin meatin keil koa amul avulhul ka asalem en tounah. Kei vou vilehiles avet onen meatin koa amul akekes en mani ka out tatondanien onen koakeil asalem en ame.
41011016	Ka romaen etai meatin vakur tei tounah avaka pas teahu ten Eim Votut.
41011017	Ka sel kat keil vit, “Ahi viteni en Tus Votut vit, ‘Eim onak ihise en Eim Tahisien onen meatin vasi keil ten out netan.’ (Aes 56:7) Ka kami mivilesi mai vi ‘Eim omon tarhena keil.’” (Ser 7:11)
41011018	Ka navong asuv keil onen pris keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis alonge, amul alekat sise koa vasakini avouas Iesu vamat ien. Ka keil ametaun Iesu ven meatin vasi keil amutimanin en hihiseien onen.
41011019	Navong mendilah mai, Iesu ral meatin keil onen alokovein out Serusalem uva.
41011020	En visokon semau, navong amual en sise, alei ris keke vati fik mukou tuai, oute vita rokol lite netan emat.
41011021	Pita rendem ris en tounah koa kur out ka viteni min Iesu vit, “!Tiser, kilesi! Vati fik koa kosesenda eni mukou tuai.”
41011022	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Miheling demkatien onami en Ahi.
41011023	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak kami tai hehiteni min hou eke vamea ka vahita en atas, tounah koa visi, Ahi houmoni. Ka demkatien onen hekeih en asa koa visi.
41011024	Mukonek, naviteni min kami, navong mivis ven tounah tai, miheling demkatien onami hesuval mikuri tuai, ka Ahi hesan tounah koa mivisi.
41011025	“Ka navong kami tai mulomal keke vahis, ka mundem tounah tisa koa meatin sav mumoni mini, helokovein vurohien onen ka houmon methos onen hetal min meatin enek. Hesakini, Ahi Tamer ten out nesa, methos onen hel eni ka herleletei mun hetisa mini ven tisaen onen.”
41011027	Iesu va ris en out Serusalem. Ka navong Iesu mul mual neim en teahu ten Eim Votut, asuv keil onen pris keil, tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis, ka elda keil onen Siu keil umai veni.
41011028	Keil avisi avit, “?Komul komumon tounah keil ekek en isen isei? ?Isei varei maenuk kovoumoni?”
41011029	Iesu vit kesi min keil vit, “Mahis kami suk en tounah tai. Ka munak mihiteni minau, nihiteni mun min kami isei maenau namumon tounah keil ekek.
41011030	Alvit visi minau. ?Isei keke maen Sion vahi baptaes en meatin keil? ?Ahi vuo meatin keil enges ten out netan?”
41011031	Koanik sakin keil amul aselus rahiti min keil eris avit, “?Rehehiten sa? Munak rehehit ‘Ahi maeni,’ ka kei hehit, ‘?Sakini vensa mirkurtei anatin en selusien onen Sion?’
41011032	Ka rosakras rovahit, ‘Meatin enges maeni’ ven meatin keil ekek amundem kati keke Sion vi provet tai onen Ahi.” Ka keil ametaun meatin keil anavuroh kat keil.
41011033	Sakini, avit risi min Iesu avit, “Komai mereingeingeni.” Ka Iesu viteni mun min keil vit, “Inau mun, nirvitentei varei isei maenau namumon tounah keil enek.”
41012001	Evus, Iesu ra usil tatavolien tai min avat keil onen Siu keil vit, “En avong tai, meatin tai luh nei grep en atan onen. Mumon vieh karahiti, kil avul tai koa vi out koa avuhus lat si grep rani, ka muti avet tai vina nesa taleikokoeien. Navong mum vasi umen enek, horetan ekek maen meatin sav keil umai alosil kati. Ka meatin keil enek avat kati mini keke isa ris hati hei grep keil teni mini. Evus, horetan enek va en kantri sav tai.
41012002	“Sua vahis muli va, ka hei grep keil umai umen. Sakini, horetan enek sila slev tai va vales koakeil alosil kat nei grep osen keke vakur hati hei grep keil ka valahi vamai ris veni.
41012003	Ka navong slev enek rokol nei grep ekek, koakeil alosil kati avuli kati, amu puruni, ka asila ris va ka arsan etai tounah mini.”
41012004	“Evus, horetan enek sila slev sav tai onen va. Ka koakeil losil kat nei grep enek amuasi en vatin, apuruni, ka asila ris va.
41012005	Sakini, horetan enek sila slev tai ris, ka meatin keil enek amu vini suk. Navong sila slev sav keil emun, amumoni min keil vatte tas: tei en keil amu purun keil, teisav en keil amu vinvini varei.
41012006	Horetan enek mumoni va vio … natnali kati koa tas eli mul, kei koa envatien onen mul ien. Sakini, kei sila natnali va ven meatin keil enek veni mundemi vit, ‘Keil ihouhou min natmali kati.’
41012007	“Ka navong koakeil alosil kat nei grep enek ales natnali mul mai, aviteni min keil eris avit, ‘Horetan ten out enek, natnali keiek. !Almai, rovouasi vamat! !Hesakini, tounah keil onen hemai hehi orer esuk!’
41012008	Sakini, avuli kati ka amu vini. Evus, aso lat teiai onen va ran nei grep enek.”
41012009	Evus, Iesu vis avat keil onen Siu keil koa araengon tatavolien enek vit, “?Ka mukave? ?Horetan enek houmon sa suk en meatin keil enek? Kei hemai, hou vinvini meatin keil enek, ka hemae lat nei grep heha min meatin sav keil keke avalosil kati.
41012010	?Mukave? ?Kami mirvulitei selusien enek ten Tus Votut? Veni viteni vit, ‘Pos koa meatin keil toumien alei seseini, kei varei mai vi more vatiseng kati ten eim mulin pos sav keil.
41012011	Koanik, Iahova mumoni, ka rolesi tahos imok!’” (Sam 118:22-23)
41012012	Navong avat keil onen Siu keil along kilea keke Iesu viten tatavolien enek va kat usite one, e vati avahuli kati, ka ametaun mari vangi meatin keil. Sakini, alokoveini uva.
41012013	Hetetamen onen Siu keil koa along tatavolien onen Iesu asila Farasi keil koa ral min tei en Siu keil koa amusil Asuv Herod, keil uva avit avakaluvat Iesu.
41012014	Umai ka avit, “Tiser, mekilea keik komul koviten anatinien, kormusiltei rendemien onen meatin sav keil. Avaseini komul ral hetetamen keil vuo ehon keil enges, hihiseien onom mal enges usil sise koa Ahi en vat meatin keil avousili. Mukok, hit visi min komai. ?Hemal enges keke ir, Siu keil, rehul takis heha min kavmen ten out Rom? ?Rehehuli vuo rehervultei?”
41012015	Avaseini keke amul aluvos avit avamai en sakien koa tahos, Iesu mundem kilea rendemien tatisa one ka vit, “?Vensa misak visi mivakaluvat inau? Alsan etai mani koa avul takis eni minau malesi.”
41012016	Keil asan mani tai mini, ka vis keil vit, “?Nan isei ke? ?Isen isei mul ien?” Keil avit, “Asuv Houlu ten out Rom keinek.”
41012017	Sakini, Iesu vit, “Tounah koa onen asuv houlu, mihesan risi mini. Ka tounah koa vi onen Ahi, mihesan risi min Ahi.” Sakini, keil amutimanin en selusien onen Iesu.
41012018	Evus, Satusi keil, koa avit meatin sakras vamoul eris ran matien, umai ven Iesu ka avisi avit,
41012019	“Tiser, Mosis mutis mengkatien koanik vi orer koa vit, ‘Munak meatin tai mat ran ahin onen ka titaealu tovuol, tunali meatin enek hekur vatina onen. Hesakini, luhekur ehon koa ilesi hesuval natin meatin koa mat.’
41012020	Mulamu, time oulu (7) aro ekonek. Koa moeite retalihe, ka navong mat, titan tovuol.
41012021	Evus, koa katau eni kur vatina onen. Ka kei mun mat ka titaealu tovuol. Tounah enek kistal emun en tunali koa etel en keitel.
41012022	Sakien enek kistal en time oulu (7) keil vasi ka titiali one tovuol. Ka katau suk, ahin emun mat.
41012023	?Sakini, navong meatin vasi keil imoul eris ran matien, ahin enek hehi ason isei? Veni time oulu (7) keil vasi enek akur ahin enek vi one.”
41012024	Iesu vit kesi vit, “Ileilien onami tamureis. ?Mirkileatei vensa? Veni mirkileatei Tus Votut vuo keihoen onen Ahi.
41012025	En avong koa meatin keil imoul eris ran matien, isuval angelo keil en out nesa koa sakien ten tetaliheien tovuol.
41012026	?Ka en usite ten meatin keil koa imoul eris ran matien, kami mirvulitei selusien koa Mosis mutisi usil holeai koa ahang mul ien ka romukan rekountei? Ekonek mutisi keke Ahi viteni min Mosis vit, ‘Inau navi Ahi onen Ebraham, Ahi onen Aesak, ka Ahi onen Siekob.’ (Eks 3:6)
41012027	?Milonge? Kei vi Ahi onen koakeil amoul, rovitei onen koakeil umat. Rendemien onami romaltei vareis.”
41012028	En avong enek, tiser tai ten mengkatien onen Mosis mul raengon selusien koa Iesu mul viteni min Satusi keil. Kei lesi keke Iesu san selusien koa tahos imok min keil. Sakini kei mea, va ven Iesu ka visi vit, “?Mengkatien koa kave varei vi houlu mok en keil vasi?”
41012029	Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “Mengkatien koa houlu mok en keil keiek, ‘!Me-Isrel keil, mihelonge! Iahova vi Ahi orer, kei tanges varei vi Ahi.
41012030	Emi hehat Iahova koa vi Ahi onami en tinomi, en moulien vasi keil onami, en rendemien vasi keil onami, ka en umen vasi keil onami.’ (Dut 6:4-5)
41012031	Koa katau eni keinek, ‘Em hehat meatin sav hesuval koa keik em vat keik eris.’ (Lev 19:18) Mengkatien tovuol emun valohlin koakeilu ekek.”
41012032	Tiser ten mengkatien vit risi vit, “Tahos imok, Tiser! Anatin suval koa koviteni keke Ahi tas, ahi tateisav tovuol emun.
41012033	Ka ir, er hehat Ahi en tiner, ka en moulien vasi keil orer, en rendemien vasi keil orer, ka en umen vasi keil orer. Ka envatien orer hel en meatin sav hesuval koa er vat ir netin. Koanik tahos imok keke rehendem kati ka rehoumoni, helohlin koa rehoumon sanien votut houlu hehina min Ahi.”
41012034	Iesu long kilea keke selusien onen tahos imok, ka viteni mini vit, “Keik, vesesal hiasuvien onen Ahi val en moulien onom.” Koanek evus, meatin vasi keil ametau varei avahis ris Iesu en etai tounah.
41012035	Navong Iesu mul visein meatin keil en Eim Votut, vis keil vit, “?Vensa varei tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis aviteni avit Mesaea koa Ahi hetie lati hekistal en vatiamal onen asuv houlu Deved telamu?
41012036	Veni Ninin Votut san rendemien min Deved koa sakini viteni vit, ‘Iahova viteni min Asuv onak vit, “Kitondan ekok en usivek matu, hetokol avong koa niling koakeil avi vativieh ral minuk iha en hem.”’ (Sam 110:1)
41012037	Asuv houlu Deved, kei sasen enges, vise Mesaea en ‘Asuv.’ ?Ka veni tata tai sakras vahise natnali en ‘asuv,’ Mesaea heka en vatiamal onen Deved hemukave?” Meatin keil houlu amul along selusien onen Iesu, ka asi keil houlu ven hihiseien onen.
41012038	Navong Iesu mul visein meatin keil vit, “Mihelei kat revi tiser keil ten mengkatien. Keil e vati aval avoual vatal more eisin koa taveah ka e vati mun meatin keil avahouhou min keil en out ten lahruaien.
41012039	Keil alei kan out keil koa asak koe ven mari meatin keil en eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil ka out tetahos emun en avong ten ale.
41012040	Ven metenan one, alah tounah houlu ran vatina keil, ka en meten meatin amul amumon hisien tetaveah. !Mahien koa Ahi hesani min keil hetisa mok helin koa hesani min meatin sav keil!”
41012041	En avong enek, Iesu rondan vesesal en out ten sanien keil koa vakataun umen ten Eim Votut. Mul les meatin keil amul ason mani one va ien. Meatin keil houlu koa tounah one houlu ason mani houlu.
41012042	Evus, vatina tai, kei vi livere, mai son titi mani elu nges.
41012043	Ka navong Iesu lesi, vise ruain meatin onen keil ka viteni min keil vit, “Naviteni min kami, vatina ekek, sanien onen mariso mok va en Eim Votut, lohlin meatin sav keil.
41012044	Veni teisav keil ason koa vi teisao en tounah one keil. Ka vatina ekek vi livere mok, ka kei so vasin mani onen, koa vahi ten anien an.”
41013001	Navong Iesu mea ran Eim Votut, meatin tai onen vit, “Tiser, les tei mau more eim keil ten Eim Votut ka sakien koa amosan eni en more ahat keil.”
41013002	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “?Miles more eim keil ekek? Avong hemai koa ahat keil enek irkapiltei mun, meatin keil imai u rasilin keil vasi.”
41013003	Iesu ral min meatin keil onen avina en Hou Nei Olip, ka Iesu mul rondan en usite va en Eim Votut. Pita, Tiemes, Sion ka Andru telmai veni, keitel saseatel enges.
41013004	Keitel telvisi telvit, “?Hit visi min komeitel, tounah koa koviteni usil Eim Votut enek hekur out nengeis? ?Ka asa varei hekistal hetie lat avong koa tounah keil enek hemai hekur out?”
41013005	Iesu viteni min keitel vit, “Mihelei kat revi kami, ka minamaentei meatin etai naluvos kami.
41013006	Meatin houlu imai ka ihit keil umai en isok ihit, ‘!Inau navi Mesaea!’ Ka iluvos meatin keil hehi houlu.
41013007	Ka minandemkotei navong milonge keke vaeen keil amul vesesal ven kami, vuo mikur longlongien usil rea keil ka amul soutin. Tounah keil enek hemai somok hekistal, ka keil arvitentei avahit avong mai.
41013008	Out tai uas out sav, meteimal keil u ris teisav keil. Alu helu en out tei, ka amai heat meatin houlu. Tounah keil enek hesuval navong eisilin ahin mah, ka hekatau hekur tivava. Mahien teni hemai veah hemariso.
41013009	“Kami, mihelei kat revi kami enges. Avong mul mai koa meatin keil ihuli kat kami ka ikur kami miheha en kot. Keil uas kami mun en eim tahihiseien keil. Ka ven mimusil inau, umon kami mihelomal en meten hetetamen keil ka asuv houlu keil. Hesakini, miheilea mivahiten mormore longlongien usil hiasuvien onen Ahi min keil.
41013010	Veni helamu en tounah enek hekur out, longlongien enek heka vasi out imok.
41013011	Ka munak ihuli kat kami ka ikur kami miheha en kot, minandemkotei ven tounah koa mivahiteni. En avong teni, Ninin Votut hekataun kami en selusien. Hesakini, asa koa mihehiteni hervitei onami, kei heka ven Ninin Votut.
41013012	“Meatin keil imae lat tue kati keil keke uas keil imat, ka tata keil umoni hemukonek min titae keil. Ka titiali keil emun ihiles min tata ka mama one ka imae lat keil keke meatin keil u vini keil.
41013013	Meatin vasi keil tine heat kami veni mimusil inau. Ka kami koa mihelomal hekeih hetokol keite ten sakvisien keil enek, Ahi houtut moulien onami.
41013014	“Ka navong miheles ‘tounah tai koa tisaso en meten Ahi’ (Dan 11:31) hel en out koa romaltei val ien, mal keke koakeil amul en provins ten out Sudea ikalah ilohosai ka ito suai en vatihou keil. (Kami koa milei usil selusien ekek, miheilea aneite teni.)
41013015	Munak meatin etai mul museh hae, avong hervinvintei vaha ris neim vakur etai tounah onen.
41013016	Ka munak meatin tai mum en ah, hervatei mun teim vakur etai eisin.
41013017	En avong enek, hetisa vareis min ahin keil koa ameas vuo koakeil arounat en tivava.
41013018	Ka mihehis min Ahi keke tounah keil enek herkistaltei en avong ten an tisa,
41013019	veni mahien en avong tatisa enek helohlin avong vasi keil ten out netan: en avong Ahi mumon out netan rokol kosa. Ka vati avong enek hetovuol emun en avong keil koa hemai veah.
41013020	Ka Ahi heta koteh etai hati avong tatisa keil ven meatin keil onen koa rie lat keil. Ven munak hermumontei, meatin hetovuol emun hemoul.”
41013021	“Ka en avong enek ihiteni ihit, ‘!Lesi, Mesaea koa Ahi rie lati keiek!’ vuo ‘!Lesi, mul keiva!’ Ka minakurtei anatin en selusien one.
41013022	Veni mesaea taluvosien keil ka provet taluvosien emun imai. Keil umon merikel ka isakin meatin houlu itimanin en keil. Keil isak visi avaluvos vis meatin keil onen Ahi, munak akilea avoumoni.
41013023	Sakini, mihelei kat revi kami, veni navit usil tounah vasi keil tuai koa hemai hekistal.
41013024	“Ka en hati avong enek koa avong tatisa keil enek hevus, ‘Meteiai hemai hemalikelik ka avati hertitintei.’ (Aes 13:10)
41013025	‘Hitu keil imerang ran teilang, ka tounah sav keil emun amul nesa, Ahi hesakulul en keil.’ (Aes 34:4)
41013026	Hevus, meatin keil iles ‘Natin Meatin hel hemita en mahmah keil ten out nesa’ (Dan 7:13) hetal min keihoen ka mari muohien onen.
41013027	Hesila angelo keil ikarahit out netan keke avalah ruain meatin keil koa Ahi rie lat keil avi onen, en usite tai ten out netan hetokol keite teni.”
41013028	Iesu vit risi min Pita keitel vit, “Mihekur hihiseien koa ten vati fik. Navong angoite so lati, mul son oute hau keil. Mukonek rokilea keke avong koa heite vakistal ien mai vesesal.
41013029	En vati sakien netin enek, navong miles tounah keil amul akur out, miheilea keke amairisien onak, Natin Meatin, mul vesesal. Anatin, mul tuai en voiteh.
41013030	Mikilea keke tounah keil enek hekur out helamu en avong meatin keil ten avong kosa imatmat vasi.
41013031	Out netan ral min teilang mun hevuol, ka selusien onak sakras vavuol.”
41013032	Ka Iesu viteni vit, “Meatin tovuol vailea avong koa Natin Meatin hemai: angelo keil en out nesa arkileatei, vuo Natnali mun; Ahi Tamer enges kilea avong teni.
41013033	Mihelei kat revi kami ka mihesak mesei, ven mirkileatei avong koa kei hemai.
41013034	Hesuval koa hetamen tai lokovein teim sen keke vaha en out sav tai koa soutin. Sakini, ling meatin toumien keil onen avalosil kat tounah keil onen, ka avoumon umen savsav keil koa kei sani min keil. Ka kei koa lei kokoe en tounah onen hetosin amairisien onen.
41013035	Sakini, mihelei kat revi kami ven mireingeingen avong koa hetamen ten eim hemai ris eni: nahi en mendilah vuo en vongien; out helan vuo en visokon.
41013036	Munak hekistal, minatimanintei eni. Kei nalestei kami minamatil.
41013037	Asa naviteni min kami, naviteni min meatin keil vasi. !Mihelei kat revi kami!”
41014001	Avong elu sesuk hetokol avong Siu keil amundem kat Avong keil ten Veret koa Is Tovuol Ien. En avong koa mulamu eni amumon Anien ten Mul Laui. Sakini, asuv keil onen pris keil ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis alah ruai keke avatun lekat sise koa ika suai ien ihuli kat Iesu ka uasi hemat.
41014002	Ka amul avit, “Rehermumontei en avong ten ale, veni hetisa meatin keil anoumon rea.”
41014003	Navong Iesu mul veah en meteimal ten out Betani, mul kanian en teim sen Saemon koa mulamu mesaien ten leprosi mul en hiliven. Ka ahin tai mai neim, kur oel koa vite tahos imok, ka mani teni va nesa. Ka kiles lat meten ka mutahi en vatin Iesu vatie lati keke vouhou mini.
41014004	Koanek sakin koakeil amul en out enek avuroh kati ka amul arun kutut eni ral min keil eris avit, “?Vensa varei kei mul purun oel mukok?
41014005	Vahit kei vasalem eni, kilea vakur mani handred etel (300). Evus, kei kilea vasan mani keil enek vaha min koakeil tounah one tovuol.” Sakini avul kati.
41014006	Ka Iesu vit, “!Allokoveini! ?Vensa mimul mimumoni mini mukonek? Kei mumon more tounah minau.
41014007	Koakeil tounah one tovuol ito hetal min kami lises. Ka mikilea mivakataun keil lisenges, mul esuk en kami. Ka inau, nirtotei hetal kami lises.
41014008	Ahin ekek mumon tounah koa kei kilea voumoni. Ka navong mutah oel enau, kei mul sak mesein avek ven tetahinien onak.
41014009	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, en out vasi netan koa ihitehiten more longlongien usil inau, ihiteni mun asa koa ahin enek mumoni minau. Ka hesakin meatin sav keil emun indem silat kei.”
41014010	Navong akanian evus, Sudas Eskariot, tai en meatin teindan elu (12) onen Iesu, va ven asuv keil onen pris keil keke hemae lat Iesu heha en he.
41014011	Keil asi keil navong araengoni, ka avat kati mini avit ihuli. Sakini, Sudas mul lekat sise heka ien hemae lat Iesu min keil.
41014012	Navong Avong keil ten Veret koa Is Tovuol Ien emai, en visokon ten avong tai teni, teim sen Siu vasi keil amul asak mesei avouas sipsip keil koa avaani en Anien ten Mul Laui. Meatin teindan elu (12) onen Iesu avisi avit, “?Out kave em vati mevasak mesein Anien ten Mul Laui ien?”
41014013	Sakini, Iesu viteni min meatin onen elu vit, “Milheha Serusalem, milhehisu min meatin tai koa mul vous veioai, milhousili.
41014014	Ka navong milhelesi va neim, milhehiteni min meatin koa eim onen milhehit, ‘Tiser onomai en vati vailea keke out kave hean Anien ten Mul Laui vatal meatin onen keil ien.’
41014015	Hevus, meatin ten eim hekur kamil mithehina, hetie lat out koa mariso ka sak revi tuai. Milhesak mesein anien en out enek.”
41014016	Sakini, keilu luva Serusalem ka lules tounah vasi suval koa Iesu viteni min keilu. Ka lusak mesein Anien ten Mul Laui en out enek.
41014017	En vongien enek, Iesu ral min meatin onen keil uva en out ten anien.
41014018	Ka navong amul akanian ruai, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tai en kami koa mul kanian ral minau ekok, kei varei hemae lat inau niha en hen meatin tatisa keil.”
41014019	Koanek sakin meatin onen keil alonge tisa, ka keil avis Iesu, tai vis ka teisav, avit, “?Asuv mukave, komundemi kovit inau?”
41014020	Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Tai en kami koa romul rokanian ruai ral minau.
41014021	Ka anatin keke Natin Meatin hemat hesuval koa Tus Votut viteni. Ka hetisa suk min kami tai koa hemae lati. Meatin enek, tahos imok kei vahit avarvasitei, veni Ahi hesan mahien mini hemarite mok.”
41014022	Navong amul akanian, Iesu kur veret ka san masmasien veni. Evus, vul vahasi ka riti min meatin keil onen ka viteni min keil vit, “Mihekuri miheani. Koanik vi avek.”
41014023	Evus, Iesu kur veiuaen, san masmasien veni, ka sani min keil amuni, tai vis ka teisav.
41014024	Ka viteni min keil vit, “Uaen koanik vi rak vasakin hatkatien hau onen Ahi vakeih ka vamai vahi anatin. Rak houe hesakin meatin houlu ikur moulien.
41014025	Anatin eli naviteni min kami, nirmuntei mun uaen koanik hetokol avong koa nimun ris uaen hau en out koa Tata onak vi asuv houlu ien.”
41014026	Navong akanian evus, amusau en souen tai ka asital avina en Hou Nei Olip.
41014027	Navong arokol Hou Nei Olip, Iesu selus min meatin onen keil vit, “Kami vasi mihelokovein inau hesuval koa Ahi viteni en Tus Votut koa vit, ‘Nuas meatin koa losil kat sipsip keil, ka sipsip keil onen iloh rasil.’ (Sak 13:7)
41014028	Ka navong nimoul eris ran matien, nilamu en kami niha en out Kaleli.”
41014029	Pita mea selus vit, “!Nahi koakeil ekek ilokoveinuk, ka inau, nasakras!”
41014030	Ka Iesu vit risi mini vit, “En vongien enek, out hermulantei mau, ka ato herkokorattei mau hatte helu; ka keik, kihiteni hatte hetel keke korkileatei inau.”
41014031	Ka Pita viteni keih tamun vit, “!Vuo, hermukteinek! !Inau, nimat hetal minuk! !Inau, nasakras mahiteni keke mahit inau narkileatei keik!” Ka keil vasi aviteni vatte tas.
41014032	Iesu ral min meatin onen keil, uva en out koa avise en ‘Ketsemane’ ka viteni min keil vit, “Mihetondan ekok, mihetosinau. Maha mau, mahis.”
41014033	Ka kur Pita, Tiemes ka Sion, telmusili. Iesu en von ka mundemko houlu.
41014034	Ka viteni min keitel vit, “Demkoen vil en tinok, vit vahonet inau. Mitheto ekok, mithele hetal minau.”
41014035	Iesu mual ran keitel havivis, retengeiril va netan, ka vis Ahi hekulat avong takeih enek rani.
41014036	Kei viteni vit, “Tata onak eli. Kokilea kovoumon tounah vas. Konoumontei li nau nanalong mahien. Ka kirmumontei hesuval koa inau ek vati. Kumonis hesuval koa keik em vati.”
41014037	Navong Iesu muris, votini keke keitel telmatil. Sakini, viteni min Saemon Pita vit, “?Pita, komatil? ?Kosakras kovatos kovalei avong vahi havivis?
41014038	!Kamitel, telmea! !Telhis keke mithermottei navong sakvisien keil hemai en kamitel. En tinomi, emi vati mivoumon asa koa mal, ka avemi memerau enges.”
41014039	Iesu va ris ka vis en vati hisien koa vis eni mulamu.
41014040	Ka navong muris mai ven keitel, votini keke keitel telmatil eris. Telsakras telvahuli kat metalong. Sakini, telmemou ka telreingeingen tounah koa telhehiteni mini.
41014041	Ka navong Iesu muris ven keitel hatte etel eni, viteni min keitel vit, “?Mitmatil eris? ?Mitmuseh veah? !Vus tuai! ?Mitlesi? Ekek, avong mai avasa lat Natin Meatin vaha en hen meatin tisa keil.
41014042	!Telmea, tovaha! Meatin koa vasa lat nau keie, mai tuai.”
41014043	Navong Iesu mul semau selus, Sudas koa vi tai en meatin teindan elu (12) onen kistal. Ka meatin keil amusili umai, alah kat mari naef ka ai tavaeen keil. Umai musil rendemien onen asuv keil onen pris keil, elda keil ten out Serusalem ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis.
41014044	Sudas vat kati min keil vit, “Meatin koa nimusi, koanek keke mihehuli kati, mihesar kati ka mihekuri miheha.”
41014045	Ka navong Sudas va vesesal ven Iesu, vise vit, “!Tiser!” Evus, kav kati ka musi en vivin.
41014046	Sakini, meatin keil enek avuli kati.
41014047	Ka tai en keil vati mul vesesal en out enek, leh lat mari naef onen ka musah koteh ralingen slev onen asuv houlu onen pris keil.
41014048	Ka Iesu vis meatin keil enek vit, “?Vensa mimai milah kat naef ka ai tavaeen keil? ?Mimai keke mivahuli kat inau vasuval navi tarhena tai?
41014049	En avong vasi navisein meatin keil en teahu ten Eim Votut vesesal ven kami, ka mirvuli kattei nau. Ka tounah koa mimumoni sakin asa koa Tus Votut viteni usil inau hemai hehi anatin.”
41014050	Ka meatin keil vasi onen Iesu alokoveini ka aloh rasil.
41014051	Ka litetai tai koa kav koe en kaliko tas, muleh musil Iesu. Ka navong meatin keil asasa avuli kati,
41014052	lokovein kaliko onen mules ka muloh hon enges.
41014053	Ka meatin keil koa avuli kat Iesu akuri va en asuv houlu onen pris keil. Ka asuv keil onen pris keil, ral min elda keil ten out Serusalem, ka tiser keil emun ten mengkatien onen Mosis alah ruai en out tas ekonek.
41014054	Ka Pita mul lehni musil keil va vio … arokol teahu ten teim sen asuv houlu onen pris keil. Pita rondan ral min meatin taleikokoeien keil koa alosil kat teim enek, ka mul mutae ahang.
41014055	Asuv keil onen pris keil ka hetetamen sav keil emun koa aro en out ten kot enek, amul alekat meatin koa heselus hetisa heha kat usite onen Iesu en kot keke akilea avouasi vamat. Ka arvotin etai meatin.
41014056	Meatin houlu aviten luvosien va kat Iesu, ka en selusien keil one armaitei en rendemien vatas.
41014057	Ka en avong enek, tei en meatin keil amulomal aluvos eni avit,
41014058	“Metlonge keke kei vit hou rasilin Eim Votut koa meatin keil amumoni. Ka en avong etel, houm kes tamun koa meatin tovuol houmoni.”
41014059	Ka en selusien somok enek, tunien one tateisav.
41014060	Sakini, asuv houlu onen pris keil mulomal luhu en keil ka vis Iesu vit, “?Tounah tovuol kovahiteni? ?Kolong selusien somok koa aviteni va katuk?”
41014061	Ka Iesu mules ro raeng, roviten etai selusien. Ka asuv houlu onen pris keil enek vis risi vit, “?Anatin keke keik kovi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati keke hesani? ?Anatin keke kovi Natin Ahi koa romul rovati lat isen?”
41014062	Ka Iesu vit risi vit, “Inau keinek. Ka hervitei tuetin, kami miheles … ‘Natin Meatin hetondan en usite matu onen Ahi Asuv ten Keihoen. Ka mihelesi hemita en mahmah keil ten out nesa!’” (Sam 110:1; Dan 7:13)
41014063	Asuv houlu onen pris keil tin tisa houlu ven selusien onen Iesu. Sakini, rali vas eisin omon ka musel vit, “?!Vensa romul rolekat selusien sav koa vaha kati!?
41014064	?Mitlonge? !Kei selus va kat isen Ahi! Kei rali koteh mengkatien orer. ?Rendemien onami mukave?” Keil vasi umai en rendemien tas avit mal keke Iesu hemat.
41014065	Ka tei en keil amutiv kat Iesu, apar koe meten ka amul amuti. Navong amumoni avit, “?!Ei provet, hit visi, isei mutik!?” Evus, meatin taleikokoeien keil ten eim enek akulat Iesu ran keil, ka keil esuk amul amuasi.
41014066	Navong Pita mul semau en teahu ten eim osen asuv houlu onen pris keil, atouli toumien tai onen mai.
41014067	Ka navong les Pita mul mutae ahang, kei lei mamah eni ka rie lati vit, “!Keik kamil Iesu ten out Nasaret!”
41014068	Ka Pita muun vit, “Rovitei anatin. Inau narkileatei tounah koa komul koviteni.” Ka kei mea mual va en meteau.
41014069	Ka atouli enek lei ris Pita ka viteni min meatin keil koa amul en out enek vit, “!Meatin ekek vi tai en keil!”
41014070	Pita muun eris vit, “!Vuo! Rovitei inau.” Rovitei tuetin, meatin sav keil emun aviteni min Pita avit, “Keik tai en keil keinek. Selusien onom suval koan Kaleli varei.”
41014071	Ka Pita selus keih min keil ka vit, “!Inau narkileatei varei meatin koa mimul miviteni! !Ka Ahi hesan mahien minau munak selusien onak vi luvosien!”
41014072	Mal en avong enek, ato kokorat hatte elu eni. Navong Pita longe, mundem ris asa koa Iesu viteni mini vit, “Ato herkokorattei mau hatte helu, ka keik kihiteni hatte hetel keke korkileatei inau.” Sakini, Pita en von ka murang.
41015001	En visokon semau, asuv keil onen pris keil, elda keil ten out Serusalem, ka tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis ral meatin sav keil emun alah ruai en Kaonsel onen Siu keil. Aselus rahit usite onen Iesu ka umai en rendemien tas keke hemat. Sakini, apar kati ka amulamuni va min Asuv Paelet keke avamae lati mini.
41015002	Paelet vis Iesu vit, “?Keik, kovi asuv houlu onen Siu keil?” Iesu vit kesi vit, “Suval koa koviteni.”
41015003	Ka asuv keil onen pris keil amumon selusien houlu va kat Iesu.
41015004	Ka evus, Paelet viteni min Iesu vit, “?Kirviten etai tounah? ?Korlongtei tisaen keil houlu koa aviteni avit komumoni?”
41015005	Ka Iesu vati raeng eni mules. Ka Paelet mutimanin veni Iesu roviten etai mun selusien.
41015006	Vi sakien matu onen Asuv Paelet keke en avong ten Anien ten Mul Laui, hemae lat meatin tai koa meatin keil e vati va sital ran eim takeih.
41015007	(Ka en avong enek, lariken tai mul en eim takeih, isen Barabas. Avuli kati ral min lariken teisav keil veni amu vini meatin en rea tai veni avuroh kat kavmen.)
41015008	Sakini, meatin keil umai avis Paelet avit vamae lat meatin tai vamaluv vaha ran eim takeih musil sakien matu onen.
41015009	Ka Paelet vis keil vit, “?Emi vati mamae lat asuv houlu onen Siu keil vamaluv vaha?”
41015010	Kei visi mukonek ven lei kilea tuai keke asuv keil onen pris keil akur Iesu vaha mini veni amul avi elu eni.
41015011	Ka tei en asuv keil onen pris keil aling kati tuai keke avaleh rendemien onen vangi meatin keil keke avahis Paelet hemae lat Barabas vamaluv vaha.
41015012	Sakini, Paelet vis ris keil vit, “?Emi vati numon sa en meatin koa mivit vi asuv houlu onen Siu keil?”
41015013	Keil aviso vina mini avit, “!Ti kati en aiveave!”
41015014	Ka Paelet vis keil vit, “?Kei mumon sa koa tisa?” Ka keil aviso keih eris avit, “!Ti kati en aiveave!”
41015015	Sakini, Paelet mae lat Barabas min keil veni en rovattei vapurun rendemien one. Ka viteni min meatin keil tavaeen keke ilamun Iesu iha, itahi en viau koa sineite mul, ka iti kati en aiveave.
41015016	Navong amutah Iesu evus, meatin tavaeen keil amulamuni va en teahu ten mari eim one, ka avise ruai en meatin tavaeen keil vasi umai out tas.
41015017	Keil amul amumon tohtohien eni. Akav koe en kaliko tai koa vilhili suval asuv houlu tai, ka amumon vatluvoluv en viau koa sin mul ien, ka aling kati en vatin.
41015018	Evus, aviso avit, “Mevouhou minuk, asuv houlu onen Siu keil.”
41015019	Evus, amutiv kati ka amuasi en vatin ral min ai tai. Tai, evus, tamun. Ka aretengeiril mini ka amul arohtoh uva netan mini.
41015020	Navong meatin keil tavaeen arohtoh mini evus, akulat ris kaliko onen asuv houlu rani, ka amusin risi en eisin kati omon. Evus, amulamuni avina keke avati kati en aiveave.
41015021	Ka en avong enek, meatin tai ka en out sav, mai netin Serusalem. Isen Saemon ten out Saerin, vi tata onen Aleksanda ka Rupas. Ka meatin tavaeen keil akeih kati vahous aiveave onen Iesu.
41015022	Amulamun Iesu vina en Hou Kolkota, koa aneite teni vi ‘asi ten avat.’
41015023	En out enek, asan uaen koa avilesi ral min mir vamuni keke vasakin mahien onen vaha netan. Ka Iesu seseini.
41015024	Evus, meatin tavaeen keil amuti kat Iesu en aiveave ka ariti eisin omon ven keil. Ka navong Iesu mul murur, keil ason daes keke avales isei hekur eisin koa kave.
41015025	Navong amuti kati, meteiai ma neli tuai nesa.
41015026	Ka en aiveave onen, aling tisien tai nesa koa viteni vensa amuti kati vit, “Koanik vi Asuv Houlu onen Siu Keil.”
41015027	Ka meatin keil tavaeen amuti kat tarhena elu emun en aiveave, tai en usiven matu ka tamun en usiven meil onen Iesu.
41015029	Meatin keil amual vesesal ven out enek, amunge kat Iesu ka aselus kareni avit, “!Ekovei! ?Anatin keke keik kovit kokur keihoen keke ku rasilin Eim Votut ka kum risi en avong hetel enges?
41015030	!Ka hetahos imok keke kikataun keik sasom enges! !Kisuvul ran aiveave!”
41015031	Ka asuv keil onen pris keil ral tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis emun amul arohtoh min Iesu. Amul aviteni min keil eris avit, “!Kei kilea vakataun meatin sav keil, ka sakras vakataun kei sasen enges!
41015032	!Munak vi anatin keke kei vi Mesaea, asuv houlu onen Siu keil, tahos keke hemita netan ran aiveave keitinek! Hesakini, ir rehelesi ka rehekur anatin eni.” Ka tarhena keilu mun lumul luselus kareni.
41015033	En taviai, mankoli mai mutaluh koe out vasi, ka meteiai tovuol rokol haoa etel.
41015034	Ka navong haoa etel enek evus, Iesu viso keih en selusien kati onen ten Arameak vit, “!Ilae! !Ilae! ?Lama sabaktani?” (Sam 22:1) Aneite ten selusien enek vi, ‘!Ahi onak! !Ahi onak! ?Vensa kolokoveinau?’
41015035	Navong tei en koakeil amul en out enek araengoni, keil avit, “?Milonge? Kei mul vise provet Ilae-tsa.”
41015036	Ka tai en keil muloh vina, kur tounah koa suval soke eisin tai, ka rang rinduni en uaen takon. Evus, lingi en kele ai tai ka mai sani vina ven Iesu vasimi. Evus, viteni vit, “Veitir mau ka rovales visi. ?Ilaetsa hemai hekulati hemita netan ran aiveave, vuo hermaitei?”
41015037	Ka Iesu mis roha, leh kor en eang, ka mat.
41015038	En hati avong enesek, kaliko koa matetel koa aleh koe hati out tai koa vi votut vis vi votut imok en Eim Votut, sipasi en ngolite nesa vita varei rokol ngolite netan.
41015039	Avat tai onen meatin keil tavaeen mules vati vesesal ven aiveave. Lesi mukave Iesu mat, ka vit, “Anatin eli, kei vi Natin Ahi varei.”
41015040	Ahin houlu avati keil soutin neli ran aiveave ka amul arapehai avalesi. Keil amusil Iesu umai en out Serusalem. Ka etel en keil, Meri ten out Makdela, Salome, ka Meri mama onen Iosev keilu Tiemes; mulamu telmusil Iesu navong mul en out Kaleli ka telkatauni.
41015042	Vesesal out vavong ka Sabat vamai. Sakini, Siu keil amul asak mesei veni.
41015043	Meatin tai, isen Siosep ten out Aramatea, metauen tovuol ien ka kei va vis Asuv Paelet ven teiai onen Iesu. Kei vi hetamen tai ten Kaonsel onen Siu keil koa avouhou mini. Kei mun, mul rosin avong koa hiasuvien onen Ahi hekistal en out netan.
41015044	Paelet mutimanin navong raengoni keke Iesu mat tuai. Sakini vise avat onen meatin keil tavaeen vamai veni ka visi vit, “?Iesu mat imok tuai?”
41015045	Navong avat enek viteni mini keke anatin mat tuai, Paelet mae lat teiai onen Iesu suk min Siosep.
41015046	Sakini, Siosep va, vul kaliko tamuoh tai, ka va kulat teiai onen Iesu ran aiveave. Evus, kav koe en kaliko ka lingi va en valengeihat tai koa arei meseini tuai. Evus, rein mari ahat vita mul koe voiteh ten valengeihat enek.
41015047	Ka Meri ten out Makdela ka Meri, mama onen Iosev keilu Tiemes, lumul soutin neli, ka lules out koa kei ling teiai onen Iesu mul ien.
41016001	Ka en mendilah, navong Sabat evus, Meri ten out Makdela, Salome, ka Meri mama onen Iosev keilu Tiemes, telvul oel koa vite tahos keke telvasahula en teiai onen Iesu.
41016002	Ka en Sande, visokon semau, navong meteiai kistal, telva keke telvasao en valengeihat.
41016003	Navong telmul telmual veah en sise, telvis keitel eris telvit, “?Isei hetei lat mari ahat ten voiteh min iatel?”
41016004	Ka navong telvina tellesi keke ahat arei lati tuai, ka ahat enek mariso.
41016005	Sakini, telva neim. Ka navong telva neim, telles meatin hau tai rondan en usite matu, musin en eisin tamuoh. Ka navong tellesi, telmutimanin eni.
41016006	Ka kei viteni min keitel vit, “!Mitnametautei! Mitlekat Iesu ten out Nasaret koa amuti kati en aiveave. Kei moul eris ran matien tuai ka rorotei mun ekok. Mitkilea mitvales out koa aling teiai onen mul ien.
41016007	Ka mitheha, mithehiteni min meatin keil onen, ka mithehit kati mok min Pita, keke Iesu helamu en keil heha provins ten out Kaleli. Keil ilesi en out enek hesuval koa kei viteni tuai min keil.”
41016008	Navong teluahin telsital ran valengeihat, annivul kat keitel, telmaleilei ka tellohosai. Veni telmetau houlu, telroviten etai tounah koa tellesi min meatin sav en sise.
41016009	Navong Iesu moul eris ran matien en visokon semau en Sande, kei kistal mulamu ven Meri ten out Makdela koa mulamu vile lat ninin tisa oulu (7) rani.
41016010	Ahin enek va, viten asa koa kur out min meatin keil onen koa amul amurang.
41016011	Ka navong araengoni keke Meri les Iesu moul eris ran matien, arkurtei anatin eni.
41016012	Katau ris, Iesu kistal ven meatin onen elu navong lumul luva en out sav. Ka keilu lurlei kileatei veni nan viles.
41016013	Ka navong lukilea suk, lumuris ka luviteni min teisav keil luvit lules Iesu, ka keil esuk arkurtei anatin en selusien onealu.
41016014	Katau suk, Iesu kistal ven teindan tai (11) onen navong amul akanian. Ka vul kat keil veni demkatien one tovuol ka vatie keih ramat veni arkurtei anatin en selusien onen koakeil avit leini avit alesi moul eris ran matien.
41016015	Ka kei viteni min keil vit, “Miheha, miheka vasi out ka mihehitehiten more longlongien min meatin vasi keil ten out netan.
41016016	Ka meatin koa heling demkatien onen en more longlongien usil inau, mihehi baptaes en keil keke vatie lat anatinien teni. Hesakini, kei hekur moulien hau. Ka meatin koa rokurtei anatin en more longlongien enek, Ahi helei rahit usite one.
41016017	Koakeil akur anatinien, ikur keihoen koa hesakin keil umon merikel. Ihile lat ninin tisa en isok, ka iselus en selusien sav keil emun.
41016018	Ka munak ikur tetal vuo imun oai tatisa koa hesakini imat, tounah hetovuol hesut keil. Keil iling he en koakeil amesai, ka itali lat keil ran mesaien one.”
41016019	Navong Iesu selus ral min meatin teindan tai (11) onen evus, Ahi kulati ran keil ka kuri vina nesa. En out nesa, Iesu rondan en usite matu onen Ahi.
41016020	Ka meatin keil onen uva ka avitehiten selusien onen Ahi en out vasi. Ka Asuv Iesu mul kataun keil ka sakin merikel keil akistal en he. Koanek sakin meatin keil houlu akur anatin en selusien one. Koanek vi keite ten more longlongien usil Iesu Kristo koa Mak mutisi. Anatin.
42001001	More visokon minuk Teopolis, hetamen onak. Navong Iesu moul semau en out netan, meatin houlu ales tounah keil koa kei mumoni ka amusili. Tei en keil umai avi eiloheh keil onen ka avit usil tounah keil koa ales Iesu mumoni. Ka meatin houlu koa alonge amutis kat revi.
42001003	Ka inau, Luk, namusil revi tounah vasi keil enek emun, mukave avasi va rokol mukave va ris en out nesa. Sakini, namundemi navit tahos keke inau mun nitis retai en tounah keil housil sakien koa akistal ien. Hemukonek, keik, Teopolis, hetamen onak,
42001004	kokilea kovailea anatinien ten tounah keil koa mesav keil amul aviseinuk eni.
42001005	En avong koa Mari Herod vi asuv houlu ten provins ten out Sudea, pris tai mul, isen Sakaraea. Kei vi tai en vangi pris keil onen Abitsa. Ahin onen, isen Elsavet, koa kei emun ka en mari vatiamal onen pris Eron telamu.
42001006	Sakaraea ka ahin onen lumal en meten Ahi ka lumusil kat revi mengkatien keil onen.
42001007	Sakaraea vi ulmatu tuai ka titiali onealu tovuol veni tovuli onen vi lumalum.
42001008	En avong tai, vangi pris keil koa Sakaraea mul ien uva avoum en Eim Votut onen Ahi, ka kei mul mumon umen keil onen ral min keil.
42001009	Musil sakien matu onen pris keil, aleh isen tai en keil koa heha neim en Eim Votut vanit senta vaha min Ahi. Sakini, aleh isen Sakaraea.
42001010	Ka navong Sakaraea mul neim, koakeil umai keke avaha netan min Ahi amul en teahu ten Eim Votut ka amul avis.
42001011	Hatte tas, angelo tai onen Iahova mai kistal ven Sakaraea ka mulomal en usite matu en avet koa kei munit senta ien.
42001012	Navong Sakaraea les angelo enek, mutimanin ka metau vis metau.
42001013	Ka angelo viteni mini vit, “!Sakaraea, konametautei! Ahi long hisien onom tuai. Ahin onom, Elsavet, hervitei tuetin hekur natmali tai, ka kiling isen hehi ‘Sion.’
42001014	Hasuen onen hesakin kamil milhesi kamil, ka meatin sav emun keil isi keil veni.
42001015	Natmali hemai hehi hetamen tai en meten Iahova. Hehi votut en moulien vasi onen ka hermuntei varei uaen vuo oai takeih. Navong hel semau en vangen mama onen, Ninin Votut hehilelau eni.
42001016	Ka kei hesakin houlu en me-Isrel keil ihiles ran tisaen keil one, iha ris min Iahova, Ahi one.
42001017	Keihoen onen Ninin Votut hel ien hesuval koa mul en provet Ilaetsa mulamu. Heha helamu en Ahi Asuv keke valah ruain tata keil vatal min titiali keil one en tomat, ka vasakin koakeil arlong kattei Ahi, avahiles ran tisaen keil one ka usil meteisauen onen koakeil amal en meten. Kei hesakin meatin keil onen Ahi isak mesei revi ven amaien onen Asuv one.”
42001018	Sakaraea viteni min angelo vit, “Inau navi ulmatu tuai ka ahin onak vi tovuli ramat emun. ?Sakini, inau nikur titiali hemukave? ?Kumon sa keke makur anatin en selusien onom?”
42001019	Ka angelo vit kesi mini vit, “Inau Kavriel, avat onen angelo keil, koa namulomal en meten Ahi lisenges. Kei varei sila nau mahit mesein more longlongien enek minuk.
42001020	Ka veni korkurtei anatin en asa koa naviteni minuk, keik kihi ameng. Kosakras emun kovaselus hetokol avong koa tounah enek hekur out.”
42001021	Ka navong Sakaraea mul semau en Eim Votut, vangi meatin keil koa amul arosini amundemi avit, “?Vensa kei mul neim taveah ramat mukok?”
42001022	Ka navong Sakaraea sital, sakras vaselus. Kei mules sak visi vaselus min keil en hen veni vi ameng. Sakini alei kilea keke Ahi rie lat tounah tai mini.
42001023	Sakaraea mumon umen savsav keil en Eim Votut rokol avong koa umen onen vangi pris keil onen evus. Mumoni evus, va ris teim sen.
42001024	Ka navong Sakaraea va les ahin onen, Elsavet mai meas en tivava. Ka Elsavet ros teim rokol avong koa avati onen vi elim (5).
42001025	Ka navong ros teim, vit sasen eni vit, “Iahova en mahis inau koa navi lumalum. Kei rokol kat nau ka sakinau makur tivava. Anatin, kei kulat memouen onak en meten meatin keil.”
42001026	Navong avati onen Elsavet vi ahetai (6), Ahi sila angelo Kavriel va en meteimal ten out Nasaret koa mul en provins ten out Kaleli.
42001027	Kavriel kur selusien tai keke vahit meseini min ahin hau tai, isen Meri. Meri, asak koe tuai vatetalihe vatal min meatin tai, isen Siosep, koa ka en mari vatiamal onen asuv houlu Deved telamu.
42001028	Navong angelo koanek mai kistal min Meri, viteni mini vit, “Tomat heto venuk. Iahova si kei venuk ka ro ral minuk.”
42001029	Ka navong Meri longe mukok, mundemko houlu ka mundem usil aneite ten selusien enek.
42001030	Ka angelo viteni min Meri vit, “Meri, konametautei. Ahi si kei houlu mok venuk.
42001031	Keik kimeas en tivava tai ka kikuri hehi meahos. Hevus, kiling isen hehi ‘Iesu’ koa aneite teni vi ‘Ahi mutut meatin keil.’
42001032	Kei hehi hetamen tai ka ihise en ‘Natin Ahi koa ro en out nesa.’ Ka Ahi Asuv helingi hehi asuv houlu tai hesuval avu onen telamu, asuv houlu Deved.
42001033	Lisenges, kei helosil kat revi me-Isrel keil, koakeil akistal en ara onen avu Siekob telamu. Ka hiasuvien onen, keite teni hetovuol.”
42001034	Meri vit kesi min angelo vit, “?Ka inau nikur tivava enek hemukave, veni nareingeingen meatin veah?”
42001035	Sakini, angelo viteni mini vit, “ Ninin Votut hemai venuk ka keihoen onen Ahi hesakinuk kimeas. Hesakini, ehon koa kikuri hehi votut, ka ihise en ‘Natin Ahi.’
42001036	?Kokilea tumahin Elsavet? Kei emun hekur natnali, avaseini vi tovuli tuai. !Anatin eli! Elsavet koa meatin keil avit vi lumalum, kosa, avati onen vi ahetai (6).
42001037	Sakini, konandemkotei veni Ahi kilea voumon tounah vasi ka tounah tovuol koa sakras voumoni.”
42001038	Navong longe mukok, Meri viteni min angelo vit, “Tahosis. Moulien onak mul en hen Ahi ka numon asa koa en vati. Houmoni minau hesuval koa koviteni.” Evus, angelo mea ka lokoveini va.
42001039	Katau en avong enek, Meri mea ka kalah, va en meteimal koa Elsavet mul ien koa mul en hou keil ten provins ten out Sudea.
42001040	Navong rokol meteimal koanek, va neim en teim sen Sakaraea, ka vise Elsavet.
42001041	Ka navong Elsavet long ren Meri, tivava onen kaikai en vangen. Evus, Ninin Votut mai sien Elsavet
42001042	ka kei viso keih vit, “!Tokolkatien onen Ahi mul enuk mulin ahin sav keil, ka tokolkatien onen mul en tivava koa mul en vangom!
42001043	Inau narvinvintei keke mama onen Asuv onak hemai hesao enau.
42001044	Nalong kilea en tounah enek veni navong nalonguk kovise nau, tivava onak si kei ka kaikai en vangok.
42001045	Tokolkatien onen Ahi mul enuk veni kokur anatin en selusien onen keke tounah enek hekistal enuk hesuval koa kei viteni minuk.”
42001046	Ka Meri viteni vit, “En rendemien onak, namul navati lat isen Ahi Asuv.
42001047	Nasi nau houlu ven Ahi onak koa mul mutut inau.
42001048	Kei en rovobongentei nau, avaseini navi ahin kuren toumien onen enges. Kosa heha, meatin vasi ihitehiteni keke Ahi rokol kat inau.
42001049	Ahi ten keihoen mumon marmari tounah keil minau ka isen vi votut.
42001050	Kei en mahis koakeil amul avouhou mini, koakeil aro kosa, ka koakeil imai ikatau veah.
42001051	Ral min keihoen onen, Ahi mumon marmari tounah keil, ka likat rasilin koakeil akur rendemien ten hetetamenien mul en keil.
42001052	Kei lah lat asuv houlu keil ran vulie ten keihoen, ka vati lat meatin kuren keil esuk.
42001053	Navong meatin keil koa amai kat keil umai ven Ahi, mul san more anien min keil. Ka navong koakeil tounah one houlu umai veni, sila lin keil uva avi heite hon.
42001054	Kei mai san kataunien min me-Isrel keil koa aka en mari vatiamal onen avu Siekob telamu, koa vi meatin toumien onen. Kei mul kataun keil veni mundem kat hatkatien onen keke hetie lat enmahisien min keil.
42001055	Kei mum musil hatkatien keil koa mumoni ral min avu keil orer, min Ebraham ka min vatiamal keil onen koa avi me-Isrel keil. Hatkatien koanik onen sakras vavus.”
42001056	Ka Meri ro ral min Elsavet avati etel (3). Evus, va ris teim sen.
42001057	Avong mai vinvin keke Elsavet vakur tivava onen, ka kei kuri vi meahos.
42001058	Navong vatiamal keil onen ka meatin sav keil emun koa aro vesesal veni alonge keke Ahi Asuv mumoni tahos mini en sakien koa san ehon tai mini, keil asi keil houlu.
42001059	Ka navong avong onen tivava enek vi outel (8), musil sakien onen Siu keil, akuri va en vekahoi. Koakeil umai avalesi, e vati avaling isen tata onen en kei, koa vi ‘Sakaraea.’
42001060	Ka Elsavet vit, “!Vuo! Isen hehi ‘Sion.’”
42001061	Ka aviteni mini avit, “!Meatin tovuol veah en vatiamal onealu koa isen vamukonek!”
42001062	Sakini, uva asak visi avaselus min tata onen tivava enek vaka en he keke avahisi en vati valing isen vahi isei.
42001063	Ka Sakaraea vis keil avasan tounah tatisien tai mini. Ka mutisi vit, “Isen Sion.” Navong avuli, amutimanin esuk eni.
42001064	En hati avong enesek, Sakaraea kilea vaselus eris, ka vati lat isen Ahi ral min selusien keil onen.
42001065	Navong vatiamal onealu ka koakeil amul vesesal ven keilu ales merikel koa kur out, amutimanin. Sakini, longlongien ten tounah keil enek koa kistal en Sakaraea, Elsavet ka tivava onealu karahit meteimal keil koa mul en hou keil ten provins ten out Sudea.
42001066	Koakeil alonglong eni alei kilea keke keihoen onen Ahi mul en moulien onen tivava enek ka amundemi avit, “?Navong hemoul hemarite, hemai hekur mari umen sa varei?”
42001067	Ka en avong enek, Ninin Votut mai sien Sakaraea ka kei vit luvat asa koa hemai vit,
42001068	“Rihemasmas Iahova, Ahi onen me-Isrel keil, veni kei mai sao en meatin keil onen ka sakin keil iha imaluv.
42001069	Ahi sani min ir meatin ten mututien koa kur keihoen. Kei ka en vatiamal onen asuv houlu Deved koa vi meatin toumien onen Ahi.
42001070	Ahi vat kati ka en provet votut keil onen telamu
42001071	keke meatin enek houtut ir ran hen vativieh keil orer, ka ran keihoen onen koakeil tine kat ir.
42001072	Ahi vat kati emun keke hetie enmahisien onen min avu keil orer telamu, ka hendem kat hatkatien takeih onen
42001073	koa mumoni ral min avu orer Ebraham ral min selusien tai koa keih.
42001074	Ahi vat kati keke helah lat ir ran hen vativieh keil orer keke rokilea rovaha netan mini ka rovousil kati en sakien koa rehermetautei mun.
42001075	Anatin, rokilea rovaha netan mini en avong vasi en moulien orer vatal moulien tai koa vi votut ka mal en meten.”
42001076	Evus, Sakaraea viteni min tivava onen vit, “Keik, natkuli, ihisok en provet tai onen Ahi ten out nesa. Ka keik kilamu en Asuv keke kovasak mesein sise onen.
42001077	Kitie lati min meatin keil onen keke Ahi houtut keil ka herleletei mun hetisa en keil ven tisaen keil one.
42001078	Kei vilelau en envatien ka enmahisien. Hesan ‘meatin ten mututien’ keke hemai hekistal ven ir, hesuval koa meteiai mai kistal ka san meneai min ir.
42001079	Anatin, selusien onen hesuval meneai koa hetitin rahit koakeil amul en mankoli koa ametaun matien. Hetitin emun vatie lat sise ten tomat min ir keke rovousili.” Selus evus, uva ris teim.
42001080	Sua keil muli va, ka tivava enek moul mai vi litetai tai. Ka keihoen onen Ninin Votut mai sieni. Navong mai mariso, ro en out volvol rokol avong koa mai kistal min me-Isrel keil ka kur rohtoh en umen onen.
42002001	En avong keil ekek koa avasi Sion ien, Ogastas vi Sisa ten out Rom. Kei san ren vit hetetamen keil onen ten kavmen iha, ihuli meatin vasi keil koa amul en out vasi koa kei losil kati, ka itis ise heha en tus tai onen.
42002002	Koanek vi hulhulien rohtoh koa amumoni en avong koa Karinias vi hetamen ten kavmen en out Siria koa provins ten out Sudea mul ien.
42002003	Sakini, meatin vasi keil koa aro rasil iha ris en meteimal kati onen vatiamal one keke kavmen kilea vahuli revi keil ka vakur ise.
42002004	Sakini, en avong enek, Siosep mea, lokovein meteimal ten out Nasaret koa mul en provins ten out Kaleli. Evus, musil sise koa tetaveah vaha en out Betlehem koa mul en provins ten out Sudea. Uva Betlehem veni vi meteimal kati onen asuv houlu Deved, ka Siosep vi tai en vatiamal onen.
42002005	Siosep kur Meri lumual luva en meteimal ten out Betlehem, veni kei sak koe tuai vakuri vamai vahi ahin onen. Meri meas tuai ka hervitei tuetin hekur tivava.
42002006	Ka navong lumul semau en out Betlehem, avong mal vinvin vakur tivava.
42002007	Keilu luva luro en eim omon buluk ka sipsip keil, veni out rovinvintei en eim tato ien. Ka en out enek, Meri kur moeite onen koa vi meahos. Par koe revi en kaliko tai, ka lingi matil en avet koa arivin oumunai an buluk keil mul ien.
42002008	En vongien enek, meatin keil alosil kat sipsip keil en mari mesai tai vesesal en out Betlehem.
42002009	Hatte tas, angelo tai onen Ahi Asuv mita kistal en keil, ka titinien ten muohien onen Ahi ritin rahit meatin keil enek. Ka keil amutimanin eni ka ametau houlu.
42002010	Ka angelo viteni min keil vit, “!Minametautei! Numai ral min more longlongien tai koa hesakin meatin keil vasi ihilelau en sien.
42002011	Kosa etin, en meteimal ten out Betlehem, meteimal kati onen asuv houlu Deved telamu, meatin ten mututien avasi tuai ven kami. Kei vi Mesaea koa Ahi Asuv vat kati keke hesani hemai.
42002012	Sise koa mihelei kilea eni hemukok: mihehotin tivava tai koa apar koe en kaliko tai, ka alingi matil en avet koa arivin oumunai an buluk keil mul ien.”
42002013	Navong angelo enek mul veah selus, hatte tas, mari vangi angelo keil onen Ahi aka en out nesa aro vesesal mini. Ka en meten meatin keil amusau amasmas Ahi avit,
42002014	“!Houhouen min Ahi ten out nesa, en out netan tomat vamai en meatin keil vasi koa Ahi si ven keil.”
42002015	Navong amusau evus, angelo keil alokovein keil ka avina ris en out nesa. Evus, meatin keil koa alosil kat sipsip aviteni min keil eris avit, “Rovaha Betlehem, rovales asa koa Ahi Asuv viteni min ir.”
42002016	Sakini, aro kekerat uva ka avotin out koa Meri keilu Siosep luro ien. Ka ales tivava onealu mul matil en avet koa oumunai an buluk keil mul ien.
42002017	Navong keil ales tivava Iesu, aviten asa koa angelo viteni min keil.
42002018	Ka koakeil vasi along tunien one, keil amutimanin eni.
42002019	Ka navong Meri long selusien keil ekek, kur kati mul en rendemien onen, ka mundem usili lisenges.
42002020	Navong meatin keil ten sipsip uva ris, amasmas Ahi ka avati lat isen ven tounah vasi koa araengoni ka alesi. Tounah keil vasi kistal suval asa koa angelo keil aviteni min keil.
42002021	Navong avong onen tivava Iesu vi outel (8) semau, musil sakien onen Siu keil, tata ka mama onen lukuri va en vekahoi. En avong enek, aling isen vi ‘Iesu’ suval koa angelo viteni min Meri navong romeastei veah eni.
42002022	Avong hanumau elu (40) katau en avong avasi, Siosep keilu Meri lukur Iesu telva en out Serusalem keke luvoumon asa koa mengkatien onen Mosis viteni keke Meri vato ris. Keilu lukur ame elu va en Eim Votut ka lusan keilu luvi sanien votut onealu min Ahi. En avong enek emun, lukur tivava Iesu keke luvatie min Ahi Asuv keke pris tai vatokol kati vasuval mengkatien onen Mosis viteni koa vit, “Moei ehon vasi keil ihi ehon votut keil onen Iahova.” (Eks 13:2,12)
42002025	Navong Meri, Siosep ka Iesu telro veah en Eim Votut, meatin tai mul ekonek, isen Simeon. Sakien keil onen mal ka envatien onen mul en Ahi. Kei mul rosin avong koa Ahi hesan Mesaea hemai koa hesakin me-Isrel keil imaluv ran hen kavmen sav keil. Ninin Votut mul ien
42002026	ka viteni mini keke hermattei mau hetokol avong koa heles Mesaea koa Ahi Asuv vat kati keke hesani hemai.
42002027	Ka navong Meri keilu Siosep lukur Iesu va en teahu ten Eim Votut keke avalekat meatin vatokol kati vasuval asa koa mengkatien onen Ahi viteni, Ninin Votut viteni min Simeon keke vaha en out enek.
42002028	Ka navong Simeon les keitel, va ven keitel ka vous tivava Iesu. Navong mul vousi, kei masmas Ahi vit,
42002029	“Ahi Asuv, inau navi meatin toumien onom. Ka kosa, kokilea kovamaenau mamat en tomat, veni asa koa kovat kati minau kistal tuai.
42002030	Inau nales ehon enek tuai en metok koa houtut meatin keil onom.
42002031	Ka kumon meatin vasi keil en out netan ilesi.
42002032	Kei hesakin koakeil arvitei Siu ito en meneai onom, keke keil ilei kilea enuk ka ihouhou minuk. Ka hehati lat isen me-Isrel keil koa avi meatin keil onom.”
42002033	Navong tata ka mama onen Iesu lulong asa koa Simeon vit usili, lumutimanin houlu.
42002034	Evus, Simeon san tokolkatien tai min keitel ka viteni mun min Meri vit, “Tivava onom hesakin meatin houlu ten out Isrel usil kat Ahi, ka hesakin tei en keil emun ihiles ran Ahi. Tivava enek hehi metai tai onen Ahi koa meatin houlu iseseini.
42002035	Hesakin rendemien suai keil onen meatin keil imai en mesai. Ka asa koa hekistal eni, hesakin keik emun kilonge hetisa, hesuval koa naef mul sal vinik.”
42002036	En hati avong enek, provet tai mul en teahu ten Eim Votut, isen Anna. Kei vi tovuli tuai ka vi natnahin Vanuel koa mul en vatiamal onen pris Aser. Navong vi ahin hau semau, retalihe. Ka navong sua oulu (7) mai muli, meatin onen mat.
42002037	Sakini, vi vatina va vio … sua onen mai rokol hanumau ehat ka ehat emun (84). Ka en avong vasi, visokon va rokol vongien, kei va netan min Ahi en teahu ten Eim Votut, ka avong houlu mul val ran anien keke vahis.
42002038	Ka navong Siosep keilu Meri lumul veah en teahu ten Eim Votut ral min tivava Iesu, Anna mai ven keitel ka masmas Ahi ven tivava enek. Ka katau eni, kei mul run usil tivava enek min meatin keil vasi koa arosin avong koa Ahi hesan Mesaea onen hemai hesakin koakeil ten out Serusalem iha imaluv.
42002039	Navong Siosep keilu Meri lumum vasin tounah koa mengkatien onen Ahi viteni, telva ris Nasaret, meteimal kati oneatel koa mul en provins ten out Kaleli.
42002040	Ka tivava Iesu moul ka aven mai keih. Navong mul moul, mai vilelau en meteisauen, ka tokolkatien onen Ahi mul en moulien onen.
42002041	Ka en sua vasi keil, tata ka mama onen Iesu luva en out Serusalem keke luvoumon Anien ten Mul Laui ien.
42002042	Sakini, navong sua onen Iesu rokol teindan elu (12), luva en anien enek suval koa lumumoni lisenges, ka lukur Iesu telva.
42002043	Navong Anien ten Mul Laui mai muli, tata ka mama onen lukur sise keke luvaha ris teim, ka lureingeingeni keke Iesu mul veah en out Serusalem.
42002044	Sakini lukaka avong tai ral min vangi meatin keil veni lumundemi keke Iesu mul musil tunali tai vuo meatin sav tai en vatiamal one. Ka navong out vong, lulekati suk.
42002045	Ka navong lurvotintei en vangi meatin keil koa lumul ien, keilu luva ris Serusalem keke luvalekat visi en out enek.
42002046	Lulekat Iesu avong etel (3), ka luvotini suk mul rondan en teahu ten Eim Votut. Kei mul long hihiseien keil onen tiser keil onen Siu keil ka mul vis keil usili.
42002047	Keil vasi koa along selusien onen Iesu amutimanin en ileilien onen ka selusien koa mul vit kesi min tiser keil.
42002048	Navong Siosep keilu Meri luvotini, lumutimanin houlu. Ka mama onen viteni mini vit, “?Natkuli, vensa komumoni mukok min komal? Komumon komal melmundemko houlu ka melmul mellekatuk en out vasi.”
42002049	Ka Iesu vit kesi min keilu vit, “?Millekat nau vensa? ?Milreingeingeni keke nil nito en teim sen Tata onak?”
42002050	Ka keilu lureingeingen aneite ten selusien onen.
42002051	Ka mama onen, kei kur kat asa koa kistal mul en rendemien onen, ka mundem usili lisenges. Evus, Iesu va ris Nasaret ral min keilu, ka long kat keilu.
42002052	Kei moul, mai vi mari meatin koa vilelau en meteisauen. Ka Ahi ral min meatin keil emun asi keil veni.
42003001	En avong koa Taebirias vi Sisa ten out Rom sua teindan elim (15), meatin ehat (4) sav emun amul akataun losilkatien onen: Herod Antipas vi asuv houlu ten out Kaleli; tunali Pilip vi asuv houlu ten out Ituria ka Trakonaetas; Lisanias vi asuv houlu ten out Abilin; ka Pontias Paelet vi avat ten kavmen ten out Sudea.
42003002	Ka en avong enek, Annas ka Kaiafas lukur umen ten asuv houlu onen pris keil. En avong enek, Ahi selus min Sion, natin Sakaraea, en out volvol.
42003003	Sakini Sion karahit out vasi vesesal en Oaisal Sodan ka vitehiten selusien onen Ahi min meatin keil vit, “!Mihehiles moulien onami ran tisaen! Hevus, mihemai minau ka nihi baptaes en kami hetie lati keke methos onen Ahi mul en kami.”
42003004	Provet Aesea telamu mutis luvati usil Sion vit, “Itaengon rea tai hehiso hekeih en out volvol hehit, ‘Mihesak mesein sise onen Asuv. Anatin, mihesak revi sise onen hemal.
42003005	Mihetahin revi poal vasi keil ka vatihou keil vasi miheil lati hehi aet. Out keil koa akalkali, mihoumoni hemai hemal revi, ka mihetahin vasi vulvul keil.
42003006	Hevus, meatin keil vasi ilesi hemukave Ahi houtut moulien one.’” (Aes 40:3-5)
42003007	Vangi meatin keil houlu umai ven Sion keke vahi baptaes en keil. Ka Sion selus keih min hetetamen onen Siu keil koa umai veni vit, “!Ei, kami mivi vangi tetal tisa keil koa mimul mirili meatin keil en ongomi! ?Isei sel kat kami keke mivalohosai ran mahien koa Ahi hesani min kami?
42003008	Hetahos imok keke, helamu, mihoumon sakien koa hetie lati keke miviles ran tisaen keil onami anatin. Ka minahitentei minahit, ‘Komai meherkurtei mahien veni Ebraham vi vati avu onomai ka Ahi rie lat komai mevi onen.’ Ka naviteni min kami keke koanek rovitei anatin, veni Ahi kilea vatie lat ahat keil ekek ka hesakin keil imai ihi ekek avahi havin Ebraham keil keke avahi meatin keil kati onen.
42003009	Keitinek, Ahi sak mesein teiai onen tuai vatei lat vatiai keil koa arsontei heite koa tahos. Anatin, itei lat keil ka ison keil iha en ahang.”
42003010	Ka vangi meatin keil enek avis Sion avit, “?Hesakini, komai mehoumon sa?”
42003011	Sion viteni min keil vit, “Munak tai en kami, eisin omon elu, hesan tai min meatin koa omon tovuol. Munak tai en kami, anien an mul, hesan tei min meatin sav koa an tovuol.”
42003012	Evus, meatin keil ten takis emun umai keke Sion vahi baptaes en keil, ka avisi avit, “?Tiser, mehoumon sa varei keke mevamal en meten Ahi?”
42003013	Sakini, Sion viteni min keil vit, “Minalahtei mani ten takis nalin asa koa mengkatien ten kavmen viteni.”
42003014	Ka meatin tavaeen keil emun umai avisi avit, “?Ka mukave en komai? ?Mehoumon sa keke mevamal en meten Ahi?” Sakini, Sion viteni min keil vit, “Minakeih kattei meatin keil keke avasan mani min kami. Ka minakurtei mani en sise koa miluvos isen meatin sav tai en kot. Mihelonge hetahos enges en ui umen koa mimul mikuri.”
42003015	Navong meatin keil along tounah koa Sion mul viteni, amundemi houlu usili ral min sien ka aviteni min keil eris avit, “Vahesa Sion varei vi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati keke hesani hemai.”
42003016	Navong Sion longe mukok, vit risi min keil vit, “Narvitei Mesaea. Inau namul navi baptaes en kami en oai enges. Ka kei koa hemai hekatau enau, kei hehi hetetamen imok helin nau, ka narvinvintei makulat sandel onen. Kei varei hehi baptaes en kami en Ninin Votut ka en ahang.
42003017	Kei sak mesei tuai vatiti vas meatin vasi keil hesuval meatin koa kur savel keke vaso lelat uti uit vaha ran ingeite. Uti uit koa hetahos, helah ruaini heha en eim onen; ka ingeite keil teni, heniti en mari ahang koa sakras vamat.”
42003018	En sakien enek, Sion sel kat meatin keil ka vitehiten more longlongien onen Ahi min keil.
42003019	Ka navong Sion mul mumon umen onen, selus keih va kat asuv houlu Herod Antipas veni kur ahin onen tunali mai vi ahin onen, isen Herodias. Sion selus emun va kat Herod ven tounah sav vasi keil koa mumoni koa romaltei.
42003020	Sakini, Herod mumon tounah tai koa tisa mok mulin tounah sav keil koa mumoni: kei viteni keke meatin tavaeen keil onen avaha avahuli kat Sion ka avasoni vaha en eim takeih.
42003021	Navong semau Sion vi baptaes en meatin keil, Iesu emun mai veni keke Sion vahi baptaes eni. Ka navong Iesu mul vis, voiteh ten out nesa mutah
42003022	ka Ninin Votut muka mita suval ame ka rondan en kei. Ka rea tai viso ka en out nesa vit, “Keik kovi natkuli kati anatin koa envatien onak mul enuk, ka nasi nau mok venuk.”
42003023	Navong Iesu kur rohtoh en umen onen, sua onen hanumau tai ka halualim emun (30). Meatin vasi amundemi avit kei vi natin Siosep. Ka avu keil ten vatiamal onen Siosep, eis keil one mukok: Siosep vi natin Heli.
42003024	Ka Heli vi natin Matat, koa vi natin Livae, koa vi natin Melki, koa vi natin Sanae, koa vi natin Siosep.
42003025	Siosep vi natin Matataeas, koa vi natin Amos, koa vi natin Neham, koa vi natin Esli, koa vi natin Nakae.
42003026	Nakae vi natin Mahat, koa vi natin Matataeas, koa vi natin Semein, koa vi natin Sosek, koa vi natin Soda.
42003027	Soda vi natin Soanan, koa vi natin Resa, koa vi natin Serubabel, koa vi natin Seltil, koa vi natin Neri.
42003028	Neri vi natin Melki, koa vi natin Adi, koa vi natin Kosam, koa vi natin Elmadam, koa vi natin Er.
42003029	Er vi natin Sosua, koa vi natin Eliesar, koa vi natin Sorim, koa vi natin Matat, koa vi natin Livae.
42003030	Livae vi natin Simeon, koa vi natin Sudah, koa vi natin Siosep, koa vi natin Sonam, koa vi natin Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim vi natin Melea, koa vi natin Mena, koa vi natin Matataha, koa vi natin Netan, koa vi natin Deved.
42003032	Ka Deved vi natin Tiese, koa vi natin Obed, koa vi natin Boas, koa vi natin Salmon, koa vi natin Nason.
42003033	Nason vi natin Aminatap, koa vi natin Atmin, koa vi natin Ani, koa vi natin Hesron, koa vi natin Peres, koa vi natin Sudah.
42003034	Sudah vi natin Siekob, koa vi natin Aesak, koa vi natin Ebraham, koa vi natin Terah, koa vi natin Nahor.
42003035	Nahor vi natin Seruk, koa vi natin Rehu, koa vi natin Pelek, koa vi natin Eber, koa vi natin Sela.
42003036	Sela vi natin Kenan, koa vi natin Arpaksat, koa vi natin Sem, koa vi natin Noah, koa vi natin Lamek.
42003037	Lamek vi natin Metusela, koa vi natin Inok, koa vi natin Sared, koa vi natin Mahalalel, koa vi natin Kenan.
42003038	Kenan vi natin Inos, koa vi natin Set, koa vi natin Adam. Ka Adam vi natin Ahi.
42004001	Navong Iesu lokovein out koa Oaisal Sodan mul ien, Ninin Votut koa mul ien mulamuni va en out volvol.
42004002	En out enek, Temat sak vis Iesu avong hanumau elu (40). En avong keil enek, Iesu rokaniantei, sakini en keite ten avong enek, amai kati houlu.
42004003	Ven koanek, Temat sak visi vit, “Munak kovi Natin Ahi anatin, kimeng kat ahat ekek vahiles vamai vahi veret am.”
42004004	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “!Vuo! Nirmumontei ven Tus Votut viteni vit, ‘Meatin romoultei en anien enges.’” (Dut 8:3)
42004005	Evus, Temat mulamun Iesu vina nesa en mari hou tai ka, en avong tas, rie lat kantri vasi keil ten out netan mini.
42004006	Ka sak visi vit, “Keihoen ten out vasi keil enek asani mul en hek. Ka inau nakilea nisani min meatin sa koa ek vati masani mini. Sakini, nakilea nilinguk kihi asuv houlu kovalosil kati ka tounah keil koa mul ien hehi onom.
42004007	Munak kiha netan minau enges, nisan tounah vasi keil enek minuk.”
42004008	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “Inau nirmumontei veni Tus Votut viteni vit, ‘!Miheha netan min Iahova koa vi Ahi onami ka mihelong kat kei enges!’” (Dut 6:13)
42004009	Evus, Temat kur Iesu va en out Serusalem, ka lingi mulomal en out tai nesa mok en hoi Eim Votut onen Ahi. En out enek, Temat viteni mini vit, “Munak kovi Natin Ahi anatin, kihut kihita netan vahotini keke Ahi ro ral minuk,
42004010	veni Tus Votut viteni vit, ‘Ahi hemeng kat angelo keil onen avating koe revi keik.’ (Sam 91:11)
42004011	ka ‘Keil ihati latuk hehina nesa en he, hesakini kirmusavoitei en alom en ahat tai.’” (Sam 91:12)
42004012	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “!Vuo! Nirmumontei, veni Tus Votut viteni mun vit, ‘Minasak vistei Iahova koa vi Ahi onami keke mivahotini kei mul ral min kami.’” (Dut 6:16)
42004013	Navong Temat sak vis Iesu en sise vasi keil, lokoveini va rokol avong sav koa heles ahho tai keke vasak vis risi.
42004014	Navong Iesu lokovein out volvol, va ris en provins ten out Kaleli, ka keihoen onen Ninin Votut mai vilelau eni. Longlongien usili karahit out vasi keil koa mul vesesal en out enek.
42004015	Kei va en eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil ka visein meatin keil ien. Ka meatin vasi keil koa along usili avati lat isen.
42004016	Iesu mual rokol taon ten out Nasaret, out koa kei moul ien. En Sabat, va en eim tahihiseien suval koa lises mumoni. Ka navong mulomal vahuli Tus Votut onen Ahi,
42004017	keil asani mini tus koa tisien onen provet Aesea mul ien. Kei vue, votin out koa selusien enek mul ien ka vuli vit,
42004018	“Ninin Votut onen Iahova mai sienau, veni rie lat nau mahitehiten more longlongien min koakeil tounah one tovuol. Kei sila nau mahiteni min koakeil amul en eim takeih, akilea avasital rani. Ka min koakeil mete var, ilele ris, min koakeil amul en hen mesav keil, imaluv iha.
42004019	Kei sila nau mahitehiteni keke Iahova rie lat avong koanek vasan kataunien min meatin keil onen.” (Aes 61:1-2)
42004020	Navong vuli evus, Iesu koteh kat tus, san risi min meatin takataunien, ka rondan keke vahisein meatin keil. Navong meten meatin vasi keil en eim enek va kati,
42004021	viteni min keil vit, “Tus Votut onen Ahi koa milonge navuli min kami, kosa etin, selusien keil teni mai vi anatin.”
42004022	Navong meatin keil along mormore hihiseien keil koa sani min keil, keil vasi amutimanin ka avati lati en selusien one. Ka evus, tei en keil amundem maeni avit, “Ei, kei vi natin Siosep etin.”
42004023	Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Nakilea keke mihehiteni minau selusien matu koa vit, ‘Dokta, kisak revi onom keil helamu,’ veni emi vati keke num en out enek, en meteimal kati onak, tounah vasi keil koa milonge namumoni en meteimal ten out Kapaniam keke mihekur anatin enau.
42004024	Ka naviteni anatin min kami, provet tovuol veah koa onen keil avakur revi en meteimal kati onen.
42004025	Mulamu, en avong onen provet Ilaetsa, ous romustei sua etel ka hap teni (3½), ka meatin keil vasi, amai kat keil. Ka en me-Isrel keil, vatina keil avi houlu.
42004026	Ka Ahi sila Ilaetsa ka mal vaha ven vatina tai koa rovitei ten out Isrel. Kei ka en meteimal ten out Sarevat vesesal en taon ten out Saedon.
42004027	Ka tamun, en avong onen provet Elisa, meatin houlu ten out Isrel, mesaien ten leprosi mul muas ave. Ka Elisa romumontei ave vato ris, kei sak revis Neman ten out Siria koa rovitei ten out Isrel.”
42004028	Navong meatin keil koa amul en eim tahihiseien along selusien onen, keil vasi avuroh kati.
42004029	Amea, ka aring lelati ran meteimal one ka amulamuni va vesesal en vali hou tai koa mul en hakot ten meteimal one veni e vati avatue lat Iesu vamot vahita netan eni.
42004030	Ka Iesu, kei viles, mual va luhu en vangi meatin keil enek, ka lokovein keil keke vaha ris en sise onen.
42004031	Evus, Iesu va en meteimal ten out Kapaniam koa mul en provins ten out Kaleli. En Sabat, Iesu mul visein meatin keil ekonek.
42004032	Meatin keil amutimanin en hihiseien keil onen veni mul vit luvati suval koa kur aneite teni ka ven Ahi varei.
42004033	En avong enek, meatin tai koa ninin tisa mul ien mul en eim tahihiseien. Kei viso keih va ven Iesu vit,
42004034	“!Ei, Iesu ten out Nasaret! ?!Kovit kovoumon sa min komai!? ?Kumai keke kovou lin komai? !Inau nakileak, keik kovi Meatin Votut onen Ahi!”
42004035	Iesu selus keih va min ninin tisa enek vit, “!Kito raeng, ka kimea ran meatin ekek!” Ninin tisa mu lat meatin enek va netan en meten meatin vasi keil. Evus, mea rani ka tounah tovuol vasuti.
42004036	Meatin keil vasi amutimanin ka avis keil eris avit, “?Vati hihiseien sa enek? Meatin enek selus ral min keihoen, ka navong selus keih min ninin tisa keil, along kati ka alokovein meatin keil.”
42004037	Sakini, longlongien usil Iesu karahit out vasi vesesal en meteimal ten out Kapaniam.
42004038	Navong Iesu lokovein eim tahihiseien en out Kapaniam, va en teim sen meatin tai, isen Saemon Pita. Navong rokol teim sen, longe keke avu ahin onen Saemon Pita, aven mutin ramat. Sakini avis Iesu vasak revi.
42004039	Sakini Iesu va veni ka musel kat mesaien enek vit, “!Mea rani!” Ka hatte tas, ahin enek longe tahos, mea, ka va mumon anien vahi ae.
42004040	Navong meteiai va netan ka Sabat evus, meatin keil akilea avoumon tounah. Sakini meatin houlu avous koakeil amesai en mesaien savsav keil uva ven Iesu. Kei ling hen en retai en keil, ka sak revi keil vasi umai atahos.
42004041	Ka navong Iesu vile lat ninin tisa keil ran meatin houlu, avisohiso keih va mini avit, “!Keik kovi Natin Ahi anatin!” Ka kei ring koe keil keke anaselustei veni akilea kei vi Mesaea koa Ahi rie lati.
42004042	En visokon semau, Iesu va sasen en out volvol tai. Ka navong meatin keil alesi vuol, uva alekati. Navong avotini, asak visi avapeahi herlokoveintei keil.
42004043	Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Niha nihitehiten more longlongien usil hiasuvien onen Ahi min meatin keil koa amul en out sav emun. Veni Ahi sila nau numai moumon vati umen koanek.”
42004044	Sakini, Iesu va en meteimal keil onen Siu keil ka mul vitehiten more longlongien onen Ahi en eim tahihiseien keil one.
42005001	En avong tai, Iesu mul mulomal en vali Oai Kaleli, vesesal en out Kenesaret. Ka meatin keil avi houlu mok. Umai amuting kati keke avalonge mul vit luvat selusien onen Ahi min keil.
42005002	Iesu les vot elu koa meatin keil teni alokoveini lumules en out ut keke uva avakas motein net one.
42005003	Sakini, Iesu vut va en vot tai onen Saemon Pita, ka visi vatui lat vot vahita vahi havivi ran out ut. Evus, Iesu rondan eni ka mul visein mari vangi meatin keil koa amul ut.
42005004	Navong Iesu visein keil evus, kei viteni min Saemon Pita vit, “Kami, mihehalis lat vot onami miheha en huinev, ka miheson net onami keke mivalah tei mesau.”
42005005	Ka Saemon Pita vit risi min Iesu vit, “Asuv, mendilah rokol visokon koanek, komai memum keih ka merlahtei mesau varei. Ka veni keik koviteni, tahosis, nihiteni keke meheha meheson ris net onomai.”
42005006	Ka navong ason net vita netan, alah mesau keil houlu vis houlu mok. Net one vesesal vamahoi.
42005007	Sakini, akuvin he va ven tue sav keil keke avahalis en vot one avamai avakataun keil. Ka navong arokol keil, asien vot keilu vasi va vio … vesesal luvamarindu.
42005008	Saemon Pita ka meatin vasi keil koa amul en vot keilu enek amutimanin keke mesau keil koa alahi avi houlu vis avi houlu mok. Ka navong Saemon Pita lei kilea en asa koa kur out, kei va ven Iesu, retengeiril en meten ka viteni mini vit, “!O Asuv, narvinvintei! Mea ranau li veni navi meatin tisa tai.”
42005010	Ka Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “!Konametautei! Rokol kosa, keik kolah mesau keil enges, ka kosa heha, kilah meatin keil.” Meatin elu mun koa lumum vituai ral min Saemon Pita, isealu Tiemes ka Sion, tamealu Sepeti. Keilu mun lules tounah koa kur out ka lumutimanin eni.
42005011	Sakini, navong aleh vot keilu one va ut, Pita, Tiemes ka Sion tellokovein tounah vasi keil oneatel, ka telmusil Iesu.
42005012	En avong tai, Iesu va en taon tai. Ka en out enek, meatin tai mul ien koa mesaien ten leprosi purun aven. Ka navong meatin enek les Iesu, va retengeiril vita netan mini, veinan rokol atan. Evus, peahi vit, “!O asuv eli, munak keik em vati li, kokilea kovasak revi avek vamai vato ris!”
42005013	Sakini, Iesu mutelan hen va rokoli ka viteni vit, “Ek vati li moumoni. !Avem heto ris!” Hatte tas, mesaien onen evus varei.
42005014	Ka Iesu selus keih mini vit, “Konahitehitentei min meatin sav, ka kiha mau, kitie latuk min pris tai koa mul en Eim Votut keke valei revi en avem. Hevus, kisan sanien votut onom koa housil asa koa mengkatien onen Mosis viteni. En sise enek, meatin vasi keil ilea keke mesaien onom vus, ka komuto tuai.”
42005015	Avaseini, longlongien usil Iesu va mok ka rokol out vasi keil emun koa soutin. Sakini, vangi meatin keil houlu umai mini keke avalong hihiseien keil onen ka avahisi vasak revi keil ran mesaien keil one.
42005016	Ka avong houlu, Iesu mea ran meatin keil keke vato sasen enges ka vahis.
42005017	En avong tai, navong Iesu mul visein vangi meatin keil, tei en Farasi ka tiser keil ten mengkatien keil onen Mosis umai arondan vesesal ka amul araengoni. Keil aka en provins ten out Kaleli ka Sudea ka taon ten out Serusalem keke avales Iesu. Ka Ahi Asuv san keihoen min Iesu vasakini kei kilea vasak revi meatin houlu ran mesaien keil one.
42005018	En avong enek, meatin tei keil umai, amul avou kakan meatin tai koa mules matil en vulin veni hati usiven tai mat. Ka navong asak visi avakuri vaha neim keke avalingi en meten Iesu,
42005019	alesi keke asak ras veni vangi meatin keil amutiting houlu. Mukos, aveou avina en hoi eim nesa ka aleng ahho tai. Evus, arutun vulin koa meatin enek mul ien vita mal en out koa Iesu mul ien, luhu varei en meatin keil.
42005020	Navong Iesu les asa koa amumoni ka lei kilea en demkatien one, viteni min meatin koa hati usiven tai mat vit, “Tuak, Ahi roleletei mun vatisa enuk ven tisaen keil onom.”
42005021	Navong Farasi keil ka Tiser keil ten mengkatien keil onen Mosis alonge mukok, asel kutut kati en rendemien one avit, “?Ei, meatin koanek mundemi vit kei vi isei? !Kei mul selus kekar va kat Ahi! !Kei enga vit kur keihoen suval onen Ahi, veni Ahi enges kilea vakulat tisaen!”
42005022	Ka Iesu kilea rendemien one, ka viteni min keil vit, “?Vensa mimul mimundemi keke narkurtei keihoen vavinvin makulat tisaen?
42005023	?Asa mae imok keke mahiteni min meatin enek, ‘Ahi roleletei mun vatisa minuk,’ vuo ‘Kimea kual’? Maes keke nihiteni keke Ahi roleletei mun vatisa eni veni misakras mivalei kilea keke kur out vuo rokurtei out.
42005024	Ka kosa mihelesi keke Natin Meatin kur keihoen en out netan vasakin methos onen Ahi val en meatin keil heka en merikel koanek.” Evus, Iesu viteni min meatin koanek vit, “Mea, lah vulum ka kual kiha ris teim.”
42005025	Hatte tas, meatin enek mea en meten meatin keil. Kei lah vulin, ka mual va ris teim sen. Ka navong mul en sise, kei san masmasien va min Ahi.
